data.english: Is there in their hearts a disease? If they doubt, or fear that God would deal unjustly with them — or would His messenger: — nay, it is they who are the wrongdoers.
data.arabic: أَفِى قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٌ أَمِ ٱرْتَابُوٓا۟ أَمْ يَخَافُونَ أَن يَحِيفَ ٱللَّـهُ عَلَيْهِمْ وَرَسُولُهُۥ بَلْ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلظَّـٰلِمُونَ

data.english: The only word of the believers, when they are invited to God and His messenger, that he judge between them, is that they say: “We hear and we obey,” — and it is they who are the successful.
data.arabic: إِنَّمَا كَانَ قَوْلَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ إِذَا دُعُوٓا۟ إِلَى ٱللَّـهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ لِيَحْكُمَ بَيْنَهُمْ أَن يَقُولُوا۟ سَمِعْنَا وَأَطَعْنَا وَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْمُفْلِحُونَ

data.english: And whoso obeys God and His messenger, and fears God, and is in prudent fear of Him: — it is they who are the attainers of success.
data.arabic: وَمَن يُطِعِ ٱللَّـهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ وَيَخْشَ ٱللَّـهَ وَيَتَّقْهِ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْفَآئِزُونَ

data.english: And they swore by God their strongest oaths, that if thou shouldst command them, they would go forth. Say thou: “Swear not — obedience is known”; God is aware of what you do.
data.arabic: وَأَقْسَمُوا۟ بِٱللَّـهِ جَهْدَ أَيْمَـٰنِهِمْ لَئِنْ أَمَرْتَهُمْ لَيَخْرُجُنَّ قُل لَّا تُقْسِمُوا۟ طَاعَةٌ مَّعْرُوفَةٌ إِنَّ ٱللَّـهَ خَبِيرٌۢ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ

data.english: Say thou: “Obey God and obey the Messenger.” Then if you turn away, then upon him is what he has been given to bear, and upon you is what you have been given to bear. And if you obey him, you will be guided. And upon the Messenger is only the clear notification,
data.arabic: قُلْ أَطِيعُوا۟ ٱللَّـهَ وَأَطِيعُوا۟ ٱلرَّسُولَ فَإِن تَوَلَّوْا۟ فَإِنَّمَا عَلَيْهِ مَا حُمِّلَ وَعَلَيْكُم مَّا حُمِّلْتُمْ وَإِن تُطِيعُوهُ تَهْتَدُوا۟ وَمَا عَلَى ٱلرَّسُولِ إِلَّا ٱلْبَلَـٰغُ ٱلْمُبِينُ

data.english: (God has promised those who heed warning among you and do righteous deeds that He will make them successors in the earth, even as He made those successors who were before them. And He will establish for them their doctrine which He approved for them, and will give them in exchange after their fear, safety. They serve Me; they ascribe not a partnership with Me to anything — and whoso denies after that: — it is they who are the perfidious.)
data.arabic: وَعَدَ ٱللَّـهُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ مِنكُمْ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ لَيَسْتَخْلِفَنَّهُمْ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ كَمَا ٱسْتَخْلَفَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ وَلَيُمَكِّنَنَّ لَهُمْ دِينَهُمُ ٱلَّذِى ٱرْتَضَىٰ لَهُمْ وَلَيُبَدِّلَنَّهُم مِّنۢ بَعْدِ خَوْفِهِمْ أَمْنًا يَعْبُدُونَنِى لَا يُشْرِكُونَ بِى شَيْـًٔا وَمَن كَفَرَ بَعْدَ ذَٰلِكَ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْفَـٰسِقُونَ

data.english: And uphold the duty and render the purity, and obey the Messenger, that you might obtain mercy.
data.arabic: وَأَقِيمُوا۟ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَءَاتُوا۟ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَأَطِيعُوا۟ ٱلرَّسُولَ لَعَلَّكُمْ تُرْحَمُونَ

data.english: Think not that those who ignore warning can escape in the earth; and their shelter is the Fire, and evil is the journey’s end.
data.arabic: لَا تَحْسَبَنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مُعْجِزِينَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَأْوَىٰهُمُ ٱلنَّارُ وَلَبِئْسَ ٱلْمَصِيرُ

data.english: O you who heed warning: let ask leave of you those whom your right hands possess and those who have not reached puberty among you at three times: before the duty of the dawn, and when you lay aside your garments at noon, and after the duty of the night: three times of nakedness for you; you and they do no wrong beyond them, some of you moving about among others of you. Thus God makes plain to you the proofs; and God is knowing and wise.
data.arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ لِيَسْتَـْٔذِنكُمُ ٱلَّذِينَ مَلَكَتْ أَيْمَـٰنُكُمْ وَٱلَّذِينَ لَمْ يَبْلُغُوا۟ ٱلْحُلُمَ مِنكُمْ ثَلَـٰثَ مَرَّٰتٍ مِّن قَبْلِ صَلَوٰةِ ٱلْفَجْرِ وَحِينَ تَضَعُونَ ثِيَابَكُم مِّنَ ٱلظَّهِيرَةِ وَمِنۢ بَعْدِ صَلَوٰةِ ٱلْعِشَآءِ ثَلَـٰثُ عَوْرَٰتٍ لَّكُمْ لَيْسَ عَلَيْكُمْ وَلَا عَلَيْهِمْ جُنَاحٌۢ بَعْدَهُنَّ طَوَّٰفُونَ عَلَيْكُم بَعْضُكُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ كَذَٰلِكَ يُبَيِّنُ ٱللَّـهُ لَكُمُ ٱلْـَٔايَـٰتِ وَٱللَّـهُ عَلِيمٌ حَكِيمٌ

data.english: And when the children among you reach puberty, then let them ask leave even as those before them asked; thus God makes plain to you His proofs. And God is knowing and wise.
data.arabic: وَإِذَا بَلَغَ ٱلْأَطْفَـٰلُ مِنكُمُ ٱلْحُلُمَ فَلْيَسْتَـْٔذِنُوا۟ كَمَا ٱسْتَـْٔذَنَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ كَذَٰلِكَ يُبَيِّنُ ٱللَّـهُ لَكُمْ ءَايَـٰتِهِۦ وَٱللَّـهُ عَلِيمٌ حَكِيمٌ

data.english: And those past child-bearing among the women who have no hope of marriage: they do no wrong that they lay aside their garments, without displaying adornment; but that they refrain is best for them. And God is hearing and knowing.
data.arabic: وَٱلْقَوَٰعِدُ مِنَ ٱلنِّسَآءِ ٱلَّـٰتِى لَا يَرْجُونَ نِكَاحًا فَلَيْسَ عَلَيْهِنَّ جُنَاحٌ أَن يَضَعْنَ ثِيَابَهُنَّ غَيْرَ مُتَبَرِّجَـٰتٍۭ بِزِينَةٍ وَأَن يَسْتَعْفِفْنَ خَيْرٌ لَّهُنَّ وَٱللَّـهُ سَمِيعٌ عَلِيمٌ

data.english: No blame is there upon the blind, nor any blame upon the lame, nor any blame upon the sick, nor upon yourselves, that you eat of your houses, or the houses of your fathers, or the houses of your mothers, or the houses of your brothers, or the houses of your sisters, or the houses of your paternal uncles, or the houses of your paternal aunts, or the houses of your maternal uncles, or the houses of your maternal aunts, or that whereof you hold the keys, or of your friend; you do no wrong to eat together or separately. But when you enter houses, greet one another with a greeting from God, blessed and good. Thus God makes plain to you the proofs, that you might use reason.
data.arabic: لَّيْسَ عَلَى ٱلْأَعْمَىٰ حَرَجٌ وَلَا عَلَى ٱلْأَعْرَجِ حَرَجٌ وَلَا عَلَى ٱلْمَرِيضِ حَرَجٌ وَلَا عَلَىٰٓ أَنفُسِكُمْ أَن تَأْكُلُوا۟ مِنۢ بُيُوتِكُمْ أَوْ بُيُوتِ ءَابَآئِكُمْ أَوْ بُيُوتِ أُمَّهَـٰتِكُمْ أَوْ بُيُوتِ إِخْوَٰنِكُمْ أَوْ بُيُوتِ أَخَوَٰتِكُمْ أَوْ بُيُوتِ أَعْمَـٰمِكُمْ أَوْ بُيُوتِ عَمَّـٰتِكُمْ أَوْ بُيُوتِ أَخْوَٰلِكُمْ أَوْ بُيُوتِ خَـٰلَـٰتِكُمْ أَوْ مَا مَلَكْتُم مَّفَاتِحَهُۥٓ أَوْ صَدِيقِكُمْ لَيْسَ عَلَيْكُمْ جُنَاحٌ أَن تَأْكُلُوا۟ جَمِيعًا أَوْ أَشْتَاتًا فَإِذَا دَخَلْتُم بُيُوتًا فَسَلِّمُوا۟ عَلَىٰٓ أَنفُسِكُمْ تَحِيَّةً مِّنْ عِندِ ٱللَّـهِ مُبَـٰرَكَةً طَيِّبَةً كَذَٰلِكَ يُبَيِّنُ ٱللَّـهُ لَكُمُ ٱلْـَٔايَـٰتِ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَعْقِلُونَ

data.english: The believers are but those who believe in God and His messenger, and when they are with him on a common matter, go not away until they ask leave of him. They who ask leave of thee: those are they who believe in God and His messenger. So when they ask leave of thee for some matter of theirs, give thou leave to whom thou wilt among them, and ask thou forgiveness of God for them; God is forgiving and merciful.
data.arabic: إِنَّمَا ٱلْمُؤْمِنُونَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ بِٱللَّـهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ وَإِذَا كَانُوا۟ مَعَهُۥ عَلَىٰٓ أَمْرٍ جَامِعٍ لَّمْ يَذْهَبُوا۟ حَتَّىٰ يَسْتَـْٔذِنُوهُ إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يَسْتَـْٔذِنُونَكَ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ يُؤْمِنُونَ بِٱللَّـهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ فَإِذَا ٱسْتَـْٔذَنُوكَ لِبَعْضِ شَأْنِهِمْ فَأْذَن لِّمَن شِئْتَ مِنْهُمْ وَٱسْتَغْفِرْ لَهُمُ ٱللَّـهَ إِنَّ ٱللَّـهَ غَفُورٌ رَّحِيمٌ

data.english: Make not the calling of the Messenger among yourselves as your call one of another. God knows those who slip away surreptitiously among you. And let those who oppose His command beware lest a means of denial befall them, or there befall them a painful punishment.
data.arabic: لَّا تَجْعَلُوا۟ دُعَآءَ ٱلرَّسُولِ بَيْنَكُمْ كَدُعَآءِ بَعْضِكُم بَعْضًا قَدْ يَعْلَمُ ٱللَّـهُ ٱلَّذِينَ يَتَسَلَّلُونَ مِنكُمْ لِوَاذًا فَلْيَحْذَرِ ٱلَّذِينَ يُخَالِفُونَ عَنْ أَمْرِهِۦٓ أَن تُصِيبَهُمْ فِتْنَةٌ أَوْ يُصِيبَهُمْ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ

data.english: In truth, to God belongs what is in the heavens and the earth. He knows upon what you stand. And the day they are returned to Him, then will He inform them of what they did; and God knows all things.
data.arabic: أَلَآ إِنَّ لِلَّـهِ مَا فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ قَدْ يَعْلَمُ مَآ أَنتُمْ عَلَيْهِ وَيَوْمَ يُرْجَعُونَ إِلَيْهِ فَيُنَبِّئُهُم بِمَا عَمِلُوا۟ وَٱللَّـهُ بِكُلِّ شَىْءٍ عَلِيمٌۢ

data.english: In the name of God, the Almighty, the Merciful.
data.arabic: بِسْمِ ٱللَّـهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ

data.english: Blessed be He who has sent down the Division upon His servant, that he might be a warner to all mankind,
data.arabic: تَبَارَكَ ٱلَّذِى نَزَّلَ ٱلْفُرْقَانَ عَلَىٰ عَبْدِهِۦ لِيَكُونَ لِلْعَـٰلَمِينَ نَذِيرًا

data.english: He to whom belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth, and has not taken a son or had a partner in dominion, but created everything, then ordained it entirely.
data.arabic: ٱلَّذِى لَهُۥ مُلْكُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَلَمْ يَتَّخِذْ وَلَدًا وَلَمْ يَكُن لَّهُۥ شَرِيكٌ فِى ٱلْمُلْكِ وَخَلَقَ كُلَّ شَىْءٍ فَقَدَّرَهُۥ تَقْدِيرًا

data.english: And they have taken, besides Him, gods which create nothing, but are created, and possess for themselves neither harm nor benefit; and they possess neither death nor life nor resurrection.
data.arabic: وَٱتَّخَذُوا۟ مِن دُونِهِۦٓ ءَالِهَةً لَّا يَخْلُقُونَ شَيْـًٔا وَهُمْ يُخْلَقُونَ وَلَا يَمْلِكُونَ لِأَنفُسِهِمْ ضَرًّا وَلَا نَفْعًا وَلَا يَمْلِكُونَ مَوْتًا وَلَا حَيَوٰةً وَلَا نُشُورًا

data.english: And those who ignore warning say: “This is only a falsehood; he invented it, and other people assisted him in it.” And they have brought injustice and falsehood.
data.arabic: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓا۟ إِنْ هَـٰذَآ إِلَّآ إِفْكٌ ٱفْتَرَىٰهُ وَأَعَانَهُۥ عَلَيْهِ قَوْمٌ ءَاخَرُونَ فَقَدْ جَآءُو ظُلْمًا وَزُورًا

data.english: And they say: “Legends of the former peoples he has written, and they are dictated to him morning and evening.”
data.arabic: وَقَالُوٓا۟ أَسَـٰطِيرُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ ٱكْتَتَبَهَا فَهِىَ تُمْلَىٰ عَلَيْهِ بُكْرَةً وَأَصِيلًا

data.english: Say thou: “He sent it down who knows the secret in the heavens and the earth; He is forgiving and merciful.”
data.arabic: قُلْ أَنزَلَهُ ٱلَّذِى يَعْلَمُ ٱلسِّرَّ فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ غَفُورًا رَّحِيمًا

data.english: And they say: “What is this messenger that eats food and walks in the markets? Oh, that an angel were but sent down to him to be a warner with him!
data.arabic: وَقَالُوا۟ مَالِ هَـٰذَا ٱلرَّسُولِ يَأْكُلُ ٱلطَّعَامَ وَيَمْشِى فِى ٱلْأَسْوَاقِ لَوْلَآ أُنزِلَ إِلَيْهِ مَلَكٌ فَيَكُونَ مَعَهُۥ نَذِيرًا

data.english: “Or a treasure were but sent to him! Or there were for him but a garden from which he ate!” And the wrongdoers say: “You follow only a man taken by sorcery.”
data.arabic: أَوْ يُلْقَىٰٓ إِلَيْهِ كَنزٌ أَوْ تَكُونُ لَهُۥ جَنَّةٌ يَأْكُلُ مِنْهَا وَقَالَ ٱلظَّـٰلِمُونَ إِن تَتَّبِعُونَ إِلَّا رَجُلًا مَّسْحُورًا

data.english: See thou how they strike similitudes for thee, and go astray, and cannot find a path.
data.arabic: ٱنظُرْ كَيْفَ ضَرَبُوا۟ لَكَ ٱلْأَمْثَـٰلَ فَضَلُّوا۟ فَلَا يَسْتَطِيعُونَ سَبِيلًا

data.english: Blessed be He who, if He wills, will make for thee better than that, — gardens beneath which rivers flow — and will make for thee palaces!
data.arabic: تَبَارَكَ ٱلَّذِىٓ إِن شَآءَ جَعَلَ لَكَ خَيْرًا مِّن ذَٰلِكَ جَنَّـٰتٍ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ وَيَجْعَل لَّكَ قُصُورًۢا

data.english: The truth is, they have denied the Hour; and We have prepared for him who denies the Hour an inferno.
data.arabic: بَلْ كَذَّبُوا۟ بِٱلسَّاعَةِ وَأَعْتَدْنَا لِمَن كَذَّبَ بِٱلسَّاعَةِ سَعِيرًا

data.english: When it sees them from a place far away, they will hear the fury and the roaring thereof.
data.arabic: إِذَا رَأَتْهُم مِّن مَّكَانٍۭ بَعِيدٍ سَمِعُوا۟ لَهَا تَغَيُّظًا وَزَفِيرًا

data.english: And when they are cast therefrom into a narrow place bound together, they will call thereupon for destruction.
data.arabic: وَإِذَآ أُلْقُوا۟ مِنْهَا مَكَانًا ضَيِّقًا مُّقَرَّنِينَ دَعَوْا۟ هُنَالِكَ ثُبُورًا

data.english: “Call not this day for one destruction, but call for many destructions!”
data.arabic: لَّا تَدْعُوا۟ ٱلْيَوْمَ ثُبُورًا وَٰحِدًا وَٱدْعُوا۟ ثُبُورًا كَثِيرًا

data.english: Say thou: “Is that better, or the Garden of Eternity which is promised to those of prudent fear?” It will be for them a reward and a journey’s end.
data.arabic: قُلْ أَذَٰلِكَ خَيْرٌ أَمْ جَنَّةُ ٱلْخُلْدِ ٱلَّتِى وُعِدَ ٱلْمُتَّقُونَ كَانَتْ لَهُمْ جَزَآءً وَمَصِيرًا

data.english: They have therein all that they desire, they abiding eternally; it is upon thy Lord a promise requested.
data.arabic: لَّهُمْ فِيهَا مَا يَشَآءُونَ خَـٰلِدِينَ كَانَ عَلَىٰ رَبِّكَ وَعْدًا مَّسْـُٔولًا

data.english: And the day He gathers them and what they serve, besides God, and says: “Was it you who led astray these My servants, or did they stray from the path?”
data.arabic: وَيَوْمَ يَحْشُرُهُمْ وَمَا يَعْبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّـهِ فَيَقُولُ ءَأَنتُمْ أَضْلَلْتُمْ عِبَادِى هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ أَمْ هُمْ ضَلُّوا۟ ٱلسَّبِيلَ

data.english: They will say: “Glory be to Thee! It behoved us not to take, besides Thee, any allies! But Thou didst give them and their fathers enjoyment until they forgot the remembrance and became a people ruined.”
data.arabic: قَالُوا۟ سُبْحَـٰنَكَ مَا كَانَ يَنۢبَغِى لَنَآ أَن نَّتَّخِذَ مِن دُونِكَ مِنْ أَوْلِيَآءَ وَلَـٰكِن مَّتَّعْتَهُمْ وَءَابَآءَهُمْ حَتَّىٰ نَسُوا۟ ٱلذِّكْرَ وَكَانُوا۟ قَوْمًۢا بُورًا

data.english: “They have denied you for what you say,” — and you are able neither to avert nor to find help; and whoso does wrong among you, We will let him taste a great punishment.
data.arabic: فَقَدْ كَذَّبُوكُم بِمَا تَقُولُونَ فَمَا تَسْتَطِيعُونَ صَرْفًا وَلَا نَصْرًا وَمَن يَظْلِم مِّنكُمْ نُذِقْهُ عَذَابًا كَبِيرًا

data.english: And We sent not before thee any emissaries, but that they ate food and walked in the markets. And We made some of you a means of denial for others. Will you be patient? And thy Lord is seeing.
data.arabic: وَمَآ أَرْسَلْنَا قَبْلَكَ مِنَ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ إِلَّآ إِنَّهُمْ لَيَأْكُلُونَ ٱلطَّعَامَ وَيَمْشُونَ فِى ٱلْأَسْوَاقِ وَجَعَلْنَا بَعْضَكُمْ لِبَعْضٍ فِتْنَةً أَتَصْبِرُونَ وَكَانَ رَبُّكَ بَصِيرًا

data.english: And those who look not for a meeting with Us say: “Oh, that the angels were but sent down upon us, or we but saw our Lord!” They have waxed proud concerning themselves, and scornful with great scorn.
data.arabic: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَرْجُونَ لِقَآءَنَا لَوْلَآ أُنزِلَ عَلَيْنَا ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ أَوْ نَرَىٰ رَبَّنَا لَقَدِ ٱسْتَكْبَرُوا۟ فِىٓ أَنفُسِهِمْ وَعَتَوْ عُتُوًّا كَبِيرًا

data.english: The day they see the angels: — no glad tidings, that day, for the lawbreakers; and they will say: “A complete partition!”
data.arabic: يَوْمَ يَرَوْنَ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةَ لَا بُشْرَىٰ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُجْرِمِينَ وَيَقُولُونَ حِجْرًا مَّحْجُورًا

data.english: And We will come to what they did of deeds, and make it scattered dust.
data.arabic: وَقَدِمْنَآ إِلَىٰ مَا عَمِلُوا۟ مِنْ عَمَلٍ فَجَعَلْنَـٰهُ هَبَآءً مَّنثُورًا

data.english: The companions of the Garden, that day, are better in dwelling-place and better in resting-place.
data.arabic: أَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلْجَنَّةِ يَوْمَئِذٍ خَيْرٌ مُّسْتَقَرًّا وَأَحْسَنُ مَقِيلًا

data.english: And the day the sky is rent asunder with the clouds, and the angels are sent down in successive descent,
data.arabic: وَيَوْمَ تَشَقَّقُ ٱلسَّمَآءُ بِٱلْغَمَـٰمِ وَنُزِّلَ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ تَنزِيلًا

data.english: True dominion, that day, belongs to the Almighty; and it will be a difficult day for the false claimers of guidance.
data.arabic: ٱلْمُلْكُ يَوْمَئِذٍ ٱلْحَقُّ لِلرَّحْمَـٰنِ وَكَانَ يَوْمًا عَلَى ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ عَسِيرًا

data.english: And the day the wrongdoer will bite his hands, he will say: “Would that I had taken with the Messenger a path!
data.arabic: وَيَوْمَ يَعَضُّ ٱلظَّالِمُ عَلَىٰ يَدَيْهِ يَقُولُ يَـٰلَيْتَنِى ٱتَّخَذْتُ مَعَ ٱلرَّسُولِ سَبِيلًا

data.english: “Woe is me! Would that I had not taken such-and-such for a friend!
data.arabic: يَـٰوَيْلَتَىٰ لَيْتَنِى لَمْ أَتَّخِذْ فُلَانًا خَلِيلًا

data.english: “He led me astray from the remembrance after it reached me.” And the satan is to man a traitor.
data.arabic: لَّقَدْ أَضَلَّنِى عَنِ ٱلذِّكْرِ بَعْدَ إِذْ جَآءَنِى وَكَانَ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنُ لِلْإِنسَـٰنِ خَذُولًا

data.english: And the Messenger will say: “O my Lord: my people took this Qur’an as a thing abandoned.”
data.arabic: وَقَالَ ٱلرَّسُولُ يَـٰرَبِّ إِنَّ قَوْمِى ٱتَّخَذُوا۟ هَـٰذَا ٱلْقُرْءَانَ مَهْجُورًا

data.english: And thus We appointed for every prophet an enemy from among the lawbreakers; but thy Lord suffices as a guide and a helper.
data.arabic: وَكَذَٰلِكَ جَعَلْنَا لِكُلِّ نَبِىٍّ عَدُوًّا مِّنَ ٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ وَكَفَىٰ بِرَبِّكَ هَادِيًا وَنَصِيرًا

data.english: And those who ignore warning say: “Oh, that the Qur’an were but sent down upon him all at once!” Thus — that We might strengthen thy heart thereby; and We have recited it distinctly.
data.arabic: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ لَوْلَا نُزِّلَ عَلَيْهِ ٱلْقُرْءَانُ جُمْلَةً وَٰحِدَةً كَذَٰلِكَ لِنُثَبِّتَ بِهِۦ فُؤَادَكَ وَرَتَّلْنَـٰهُ تَرْتِيلًا

data.english: And they bring thee not a similitude save We bring thee the truth and better in explanation.
data.arabic: وَلَا يَأْتُونَكَ بِمَثَلٍ إِلَّا جِئْنَـٰكَ بِٱلْحَقِّ وَأَحْسَنَ تَفْسِيرًا

data.english: Those who are gathered on their faces into Gehenna: those are worse in position, and further astray in the path.
data.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يُحْشَرُونَ عَلَىٰ وُجُوهِهِمْ إِلَىٰ جَهَنَّمَ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ شَرٌّ مَّكَانًا وَأَضَلُّ سَبِيلًا

data.english: And We gave Moses the Writ, and appointed with him his brother Aaron as an assistant.
data.arabic: وَلَقَدْ ءَاتَيْنَا مُوسَى ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ وَجَعَلْنَا مَعَهُۥٓ أَخَاهُ هَـٰرُونَ وَزِيرًا

data.english: And We said: “Go to the people who have denied Our proofs”; then We annihilated them completely.
data.arabic: فَقُلْنَا ٱذْهَبَآ إِلَى ٱلْقَوْمِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا فَدَمَّرْنَـٰهُمْ تَدْمِيرًا

data.english: And the people of Noah: when they denied the messengers, We drowned them, and made of them for mankind a proof; and We have prepared for the wrongdoers a painful punishment.
data.arabic: وَقَوْمَ نُوحٍ لَّمَّا كَذَّبُوا۟ ٱلرُّسُلَ أَغْرَقْنَـٰهُمْ وَجَعَلْنَـٰهُمْ لِلنَّاسِ ءَايَةً وَأَعْتَدْنَا لِلظَّـٰلِمِينَ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًا

data.english: And ʿĀd, and Thamūd, and the companions of Al-Rass, and many generations in-between,
data.arabic: وَعَادًا وَثَمُودَا۟ وَأَصْحَـٰبَ ٱلرَّسِّ وَقُرُونًۢا بَيْنَ ذَٰلِكَ كَثِيرًا

data.english: And for each We struck similitudes; and each We destroyed utterly.
data.arabic: وَكُلًّا ضَرَبْنَا لَهُ ٱلْأَمْثَـٰلَ وَكُلًّا تَبَّرْنَا تَتْبِيرًا

data.english: And they have passed by the city whereon rained a rain of evil; so did they not see it? The truth is, they expect not a resurrection.
data.arabic: وَلَقَدْ أَتَوْا۟ عَلَى ٱلْقَرْيَةِ ٱلَّتِىٓ أُمْطِرَتْ مَطَرَ ٱلسَّوْءِ أَفَلَمْ يَكُونُوا۟ يَرَوْنَهَا بَلْ كَانُوا۟ لَا يَرْجُونَ نُشُورًا

data.english: And when they see thee, they only take thee in mockery: “Is this he whom God sent as messenger?
data.arabic: وَإِذَا رَأَوْكَ إِن يَتَّخِذُونَكَ إِلَّا هُزُوًا أَهَـٰذَا ٱلَّذِى بَعَثَ ٱللَّـهُ رَسُولًا

data.english: “He had almost led us astray from our gods, were we not steadfast towards them.” And they will know, when they see the punishment, who is further astray in the path.
data.arabic: إِن كَادَ لَيُضِلُّنَا عَنْ ءَالِهَتِنَا لَوْلَآ أَن صَبَرْنَا عَلَيْهَا وَسَوْفَ يَعْلَمُونَ حِينَ يَرَوْنَ ٱلْعَذَابَ مَنْ أَضَلُّ سَبِيلًا

data.english: Hast thou seen him who has taken as his god his vain desire? Wouldst thou then be a guardian over him?
data.arabic: أَرَءَيْتَ مَنِ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَـٰهَهُۥ هَوَىٰهُ أَفَأَنتَ تَكُونُ عَلَيْهِ وَكِيلًا

data.english: If thou thinkest that most of them hear or reason — they are only as the cattle; nay, they are further astray in the path.
data.arabic: أَمْ تَحْسَبُ أَنَّ أَكْثَرَهُمْ يَسْمَعُونَ أَوْ يَعْقِلُونَ إِنْ هُمْ إِلَّا كَٱلْأَنْعَـٰمِ بَلْ هُمْ أَضَلُّ سَبِيلًا

data.english: Hast thou not considered thy Lord, how He spread the shadow? And had He willed, He would have made it still. Then We made the sun its guide;
data.arabic: أَلَمْ تَرَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ كَيْفَ مَدَّ ٱلظِّلَّ وَلَوْ شَآءَ لَجَعَلَهُۥ سَاكِنًا ثُمَّ جَعَلْنَا ٱلشَّمْسَ عَلَيْهِ دَلِيلًا

data.english: Then We took it to Ourselves in an easy taking.
data.arabic: ثُمَّ قَبَضْنَـٰهُ إِلَيْنَا قَبْضًا يَسِيرًا

data.english: And He it is that appointed for you the night as a covering, and sleep as a rest, and appointed the day as a resurrection.
data.arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِى جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلَّيْلَ لِبَاسًا وَٱلنَّوْمَ سُبَاتًا وَجَعَلَ ٱلنَّهَارَ نُشُورًا

data.english: And He it is that sends the winds as glad tidings at the time of His mercy. And We send down from the sky pure water,
data.arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَرْسَلَ ٱلرِّيَـٰحَ بُشْرًۢا بَيْنَ يَدَىْ رَحْمَتِهِۦ وَأَنزَلْنَا مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءً طَهُورًا

data.english: That We might give life thereby to a dead land, and give it as drink to many of what We have created of cattle and men.
data.arabic: لِّنُحْـِۧىَ بِهِۦ بَلْدَةً مَّيْتًا وَنُسْقِيَهُۥ مِمَّا خَلَقْنَآ أَنْعَـٰمًا وَأَنَاسِىَّ كَثِيرًا

data.english: (And We have expounded it among them that they might take heed; but most men refuse save denial.
data.arabic: وَلَقَدْ صَرَّفْنَـٰهُ بَيْنَهُمْ لِيَذَّكَّرُوا۟ فَأَبَىٰٓ أَكْثَرُ ٱلنَّاسِ إِلَّا كُفُورًا

data.english: And had We willed, We would have raised up in every city a warner;
data.arabic: وَلَوْ شِئْنَا لَبَعَثْنَا فِى كُلِّ قَرْيَةٍ نَّذِيرًا

data.english: So obey thou not the false claimers of guidance, and strive thou against them thereby with a great striving.)
data.arabic: فَلَا تُطِعِ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ وَجَـٰهِدْهُم بِهِۦ جِهَادًا كَبِيرًا

data.english: And He it is that loosed the two seas: the one fresh and sweet, and the other salty and bitter, and made between them a barrier, and a complete partition.
data.arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِى مَرَجَ ٱلْبَحْرَيْنِ هَـٰذَا عَذْبٌ فُرَاتٌ وَهَـٰذَا مِلْحٌ أُجَاجٌ وَجَعَلَ بَيْنَهُمَا بَرْزَخًا وَحِجْرًا مَّحْجُورًا

data.english: And He it is that created from water a mortal, and made for him blood relations and marriage relations; and thy Lord is powerful.
data.arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ مِنَ ٱلْمَآءِ بَشَرًا فَجَعَلَهُۥ نَسَبًا وَصِهْرًا وَكَانَ رَبُّكَ قَدِيرًا

data.english: And they serve, besides God, what neither benefits them nor harms them; and the false claimer of guidance is a helper against his Lord.
data.arabic: وَيَعْبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّـهِ مَا لَا يَنفَعُهُمْ وَلَا يَضُرُّهُمْ وَكَانَ ٱلْكَافِرُ عَلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ ظَهِيرًا

data.english: And We sent thee only as a bearer of glad tidings and a warner.
data.arabic: وَمَآ أَرْسَلْنَـٰكَ إِلَّا مُبَشِّرًا وَنَذِيرًا

data.english: Say thou: “I ask not of you for it any reward save that whoso wills might take to his Lord a path.”
data.arabic: قُلْ مَآ أَسْـَٔلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ أَجْرٍ إِلَّا مَن شَآءَ أَن يَتَّخِذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ سَبِيلًا

data.english: And place thou thy trust in the Living, who dies not; and give thou glory with His praise. And sufficient is He, of the transgressions of His servants, as one aware
data.arabic: وَتَوَكَّلْ عَلَى ٱلْحَىِّ ٱلَّذِى لَا يَمُوتُ وَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِهِۦ وَكَفَىٰ بِهِۦ بِذُنُوبِ عِبَادِهِۦ خَبِيرًا

data.english: Who created the heavens and the earth and what is between them in six days, then established Himself upon the Throne — the Almighty — so ask thou about it one aware.
data.arabic: ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا فِى سِتَّةِ أَيَّامٍ ثُمَّ ٱسْتَوَىٰ عَلَى ٱلْعَرْشِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ فَسْـَٔلْ بِهِۦ خَبِيرًا

data.english: And when it is said to them: “Submit to the Almighty,” they say: “And what is the Almighty? Are we to submit to what thou commandest us?” And it increases them in aversion.
data.arabic: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ ٱسْجُدُوا۟ لِلرَّحْمَـٰنِ قَالُوا۟ وَمَا ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ أَنَسْجُدُ لِمَا تَأْمُرُنَا وَزَادَهُمْ نُفُورًا

data.english: Blessed be He who has made in the sky constellations, and made therein a torch, and an illuminating moon.
data.arabic: تَبَارَكَ ٱلَّذِى جَعَلَ فِى ٱلسَّمَآءِ بُرُوجًا وَجَعَلَ فِيهَا سِرَٰجًا وَقَمَرًا مُّنِيرًا

data.english: And He it is that made the night and the day a succession for him who desires to take heed, or desires gratitude.
data.arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِى جَعَلَ ٱلَّيْلَ وَٱلنَّهَارَ خِلْفَةً لِّمَنْ أَرَادَ أَن يَذَّكَّرَ أَوْ أَرَادَ شُكُورًا

data.english: And the servants of the Almighty are they who walk upon the earth modestly, and when the ignorant address them, they speak peace;
data.arabic: وَعِبَادُ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلَّذِينَ يَمْشُونَ عَلَى ٱلْأَرْضِ هَوْنًا وَإِذَا خَاطَبَهُمُ ٱلْجَـٰهِلُونَ قَالُوا۟ سَلَـٰمًا

data.english: And who spend the night to their Lord submitting and standing;
data.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ يَبِيتُونَ لِرَبِّهِمْ سُجَّدًا وَقِيَـٰمًا

data.english: And who say: “Our Lord: avert Thou from us the punishment of Gehenna”; (the punishment thereof is unrelenting,
data.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ يَقُولُونَ رَبَّنَا ٱصْرِفْ عَنَّا عَذَابَ جَهَنَّمَ إِنَّ عَذَابَهَا كَانَ غَرَامًا

data.english: Evil is it as a dwelling-place and a residence)
data.arabic: إِنَّهَا سَآءَتْ مُسْتَقَرًّا وَمُقَامًا

data.english: And who, when they spend, are neither extravagant nor miserly; — and there is a place in-between —
data.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ إِذَآ أَنفَقُوا۟ لَمْ يُسْرِفُوا۟ وَلَمْ يَقْتُرُوا۟ وَكَانَ بَيْنَ ذَٰلِكَ قَوَامًا

data.english: And who call not, with God, to another god, nor kill the soul which God has made unlawful save with justice, nor commit unlawful sexual intercourse; (and whoso does that will meet with a penalty,
data.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَدْعُونَ مَعَ ٱللَّـهِ إِلَـٰهًا ءَاخَرَ وَلَا يَقْتُلُونَ ٱلنَّفْسَ ٱلَّتِى حَرَّمَ ٱللَّـهُ إِلَّا بِٱلْحَقِّ وَلَا يَزْنُونَ وَمَن يَفْعَلْ ذَٰلِكَ يَلْقَ أَثَامًا

data.english: The punishment will be doubled for him on the Day of Resurrection, and he will abide eternally therein, humiliated,
data.arabic: يُضَـٰعَفْ لَهُ ٱلْعَذَابُ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ وَيَخْلُدْ فِيهِۦ مُهَانًا

data.english: Save he who repents and believes and works righteousness, and those: God will change their evil deeds to good deeds; and God is forgiving and merciful;
data.arabic: إِلَّا مَن تَابَ وَءَامَنَ وَعَمِلَ عَمَلًا صَـٰلِحًا فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ يُبَدِّلُ ٱللَّـهُ سَيِّـَٔاتِهِمْ حَسَنَـٰتٍ وَكَانَ ٱللَّـهُ غَفُورًا رَّحِيمًا

data.english: And whoso repents and works righteousness, it is he who repents to God completely.)
data.arabic: وَمَن تَابَ وَعَمِلَ صَـٰلِحًا فَإِنَّهُۥ يَتُوبُ إِلَى ٱللَّـهِ مَتَابًا

data.english: And who do not bear witness to falsehood, and when they pass by vain speech, pass by with dignity;
data.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَشْهَدُونَ ٱلزُّورَ وَإِذَا مَرُّوا۟ بِٱللَّغْوِ مَرُّوا۟ كِرَامًا

data.english: And who when they are reminded of the proofs of their Lord, fall not down upon them deaf and blind;
data.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ إِذَا ذُكِّرُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِ رَبِّهِمْ لَمْ يَخِرُّوا۟ عَلَيْهَا صُمًّا وَعُمْيَانًا

data.english: And who say: “Our Lord: give Thou to us from our wives and our progeny a comfort of the eyes, and make Thou us a model for those of prudent fear,”
data.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ يَقُولُونَ رَبَّنَا هَبْ لَنَا مِنْ أَزْوَٰجِنَا وَذُرِّيَّـٰتِنَا قُرَّةَ أَعْيُنٍ وَٱجْعَلْنَا لِلْمُتَّقِينَ إِمَامًا

data.english: Those will be rewarded with the upper chamber because they were patient, and they will be met therein with greetings and peace,
data.arabic: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ يُجْزَوْنَ ٱلْغُرْفَةَ بِمَا صَبَرُوا۟ وَيُلَقَّوْنَ فِيهَا تَحِيَّةً وَسَلَـٰمًا

data.english: They abiding eternally therein; good as a dwelling-place and a residence.
data.arabic: خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا حَسُنَتْ مُسْتَقَرًّا وَمُقَامًا

data.english: Say thou: “My Lord would not concern Himself with you were it not for your call; but you have denied, so it will be requisite.”
data.arabic: قُلْ مَا يَعْبَؤُا۟ بِكُمْ رَبِّى لَوْلَا دُعَآؤُكُمْ فَقَدْ كَذَّبْتُمْ فَسَوْفَ يَكُونُ لِزَامًۢا

data.english: In the name of God, the Almighty, the Merciful.
data.arabic: بِسْمِ ٱللَّـهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ

data.english: ṭā sīn mīm
data.arabic: طسٓمٓ

data.english: Those are the proofs of the Clear Writ.
data.arabic: تِلْكَ ءَايَـٰتُ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ ٱلْمُبِينِ

data.english: Thou mightest destroy thy soul from grief that they are not believers.
data.arabic: لَعَلَّكَ بَـٰخِعٌ نَّفْسَكَ أَلَّا يَكُونُوا۟ مُؤْمِنِينَ

data.english: If We will, We can send down upon them from the sky a proof to which their necks will remain humbled.
data.arabic: إِن نَّشَأْ نُنَزِّلْ عَلَيْهِم مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ ءَايَةً فَظَلَّتْ أَعْنَـٰقُهُمْ لَهَا خَـٰضِعِينَ

data.english: And there comes not to them any new remembrance from the Almighty, save they turn away therefrom.
data.arabic: وَمَا يَأْتِيهِم مِّن ذِكْرٍ مِّنَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ مُحْدَثٍ إِلَّا كَانُوا۟ عَنْهُ مُعْرِضِينَ

data.english: Then have they denied; and there will come to them the report of that whereat they mocked.
data.arabic: فَقَدْ كَذَّبُوا۟ فَسَيَأْتِيهِمْ أَنۢبَـٰٓؤُا۟ مَا كَانُوا۟ بِهِۦ يَسْتَهْزِءُونَ

data.english: Have they not seen the earth: how much We have caused to grow therein of every noble kind?
data.arabic: أَوَلَمْ يَرَوْا۟ إِلَى ٱلْأَرْضِ كَمْ أَنۢبَتْنَا فِيهَا مِن كُلِّ زَوْجٍ كَرِيمٍ

data.english: In that is a proof, but most of them are not believers.
data.arabic: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَةً وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ

data.english: And thy Lord: He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.
data.arabic: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَهُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

data.english: And when thy Lord called Moses: “Go thou to the wrongdoing people,
data.arabic: وَإِذْ نَادَىٰ رَبُّكَ مُوسَىٰٓ أَنِ ٱئْتِ ٱلْقَوْمَ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ

data.english: “The people of Pharaoh: — will they not be in prudent fear?”
data.arabic: قَوْمَ فِرْعَوْنَ أَلَا يَتَّقُونَ

data.english: He said: “My Lord: I fear that they will deny me,
data.arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّىٓ أَخَافُ أَن يُكَذِّبُونِ

data.english: “And my breast will be straitened, and my tongue not proceed; so send Thou for Aaron.
data.arabic: وَيَضِيقُ صَدْرِى وَلَا يَنطَلِقُ لِسَانِى فَأَرْسِلْ إِلَىٰ هَـٰرُونَ

data.english: “And they have a transgression against me, so I fear that they will kill me.”
data.arabic: وَلَهُمْ عَلَىَّ ذَنۢبٌ فَأَخَافُ أَن يَقْتُلُونِ

data.english: He said: “By no means! Go with Our proofs; We are with you, listening.”
data.arabic: قَالَ كَلَّا فَٱذْهَبَا بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَآ إِنَّا مَعَكُم مُّسْتَمِعُونَ

data.english: “And go to Pharaoh, and say: ‘We are a messenger of the Lord of All Creation.
data.arabic: فَأْتِيَا فِرْعَوْنَ فَقُولَآ إِنَّا رَسُولُ رَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ

data.english: “‘Send thou with us the children of Israel.’”
data.arabic: أَنْ أَرْسِلْ مَعَنَا بَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ

data.english: Said he: “Did we not bring thee up among us as a child? And thou tarriedst among us years of thy life;
data.arabic: قَالَ أَلَمْ نُرَبِّكَ فِينَا وَلِيدًا وَلَبِثْتَ فِينَا مِنْ عُمُرِكَ سِنِينَ

data.english: “And thou didst thy deed which thou didst, and wast of the false claimers of guidance.”
data.arabic: وَفَعَلْتَ فَعْلَتَكَ ٱلَّتِى فَعَلْتَ وَأَنتَ مِنَ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ

data.english: He said: “I did it when I was of those who stray.
data.arabic: قَالَ فَعَلْتُهَآ إِذًا وَأَنَا۠ مِنَ ٱلضَّآلِّينَ

data.english: “And I fled from you when I feared you. Then my Lord gave me judgment and made me among the emissaries.
data.arabic: فَفَرَرْتُ مِنكُمْ لَمَّا خِفْتُكُمْ فَوَهَبَ لِى رَبِّى حُكْمًا وَجَعَلَنِى مِنَ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ

data.english: “And that favour wherewith thou reproachest me is that thou hast enslaved the children of Israel.”
data.arabic: وَتِلْكَ نِعْمَةٌ تَمُنُّهَا عَلَىَّ أَنْ عَبَّدتَّ بَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ

data.english: Said Pharaoh: “And what is the Lord of All Creation?”
data.arabic: قَالَ فِرْعَوْنُ وَمَا رَبُّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ

data.english: He said: “The Lord of the Heavens and the Earth and what is between them; if you are certain––”
data.arabic: قَالَ رَبُّ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَآ إِن كُنتُم مُّوقِنِينَ

data.english: Said he to those round about him: “Do you not hear!”
data.arabic: قَالَ لِمَنْ حَوْلَهُۥٓ أَلَا تَسْتَمِعُونَ

data.english: He said: “Your Lord, and the Lord of your fathers of old––”
data.arabic: قَالَ رَبُّكُمْ وَرَبُّ ءَابَآئِكُمُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ

data.english: Said he: “Your messenger who has been sent to you is possessed!”
data.arabic: قَالَ إِنَّ رَسُولَكُمُ ٱلَّذِىٓ أُرْسِلَ إِلَيْكُمْ لَمَجْنُونٌ

data.english: He said: “The Lord of the East and the West, and what is between them; if you use reason––”
data.arabic: قَالَ رَبُّ ٱلْمَشْرِقِ وَٱلْمَغْرِبِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَآ إِن كُنتُمْ تَعْقِلُونَ

data.english: Said he: “If thou takest a god other than me, I will place thee among those imprisoned.”
data.arabic: قَالَ لَئِنِ ٱتَّخَذْتَ إِلَـٰهًا غَيْرِى لَأَجْعَلَنَّكَ مِنَ ٱلْمَسْجُونِينَ

data.english: He said: “Even though I brought thee something clear?”
data.arabic: قَالَ أَوَلَوْ جِئْتُكَ بِشَىْءٍ مُّبِينٍ

data.english: Said he: “Then bring thou it, if thou be of the truthful.”
data.arabic: قَالَ فَأْتِ بِهِۦٓ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّـٰدِقِينَ

data.english: And he cast his staff, and then it was a clear serpent;
data.arabic: فَأَلْقَىٰ عَصَاهُ فَإِذَا هِىَ ثُعْبَانٌ مُّبِينٌ

data.english: And he drew forth his hand, and then it was white for all to see.
data.arabic: وَنَزَعَ يَدَهُۥ فَإِذَا هِىَ بَيْضَآءُ لِلنَّـٰظِرِينَ

data.english: Said he to the eminent ones round about him: “This is a learned sorcerer.
data.arabic: قَالَ لِلْمَلَإِ حَوْلَهُۥٓ إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَسَـٰحِرٌ عَلِيمٌ

data.english: “He wants to turn you out of your land by his sorcery; then what do you command?”
data.arabic: يُرِيدُ أَن يُخْرِجَكُم مِّنْ أَرْضِكُم بِسِحْرِهِۦ فَمَاذَا تَأْمُرُونَ

data.english: They said: “Delay thou him and his brother, and raise thou up in the cities gatherers
data.arabic: قَالُوٓا۟ أَرْجِهْ وَأَخَاهُ وَٱبْعَثْ فِى ٱلْمَدَآئِنِ حَـٰشِرِينَ

data.english: “Who will bring thee every learned sorcerer.”
data.arabic: يَأْتُوكَ بِكُلِّ سَحَّارٍ عَلِيمٍ

data.english: And the sorcerers were assembled at the appointed time of a known day.
data.arabic: فَجُمِعَ ٱلسَّحَرَةُ لِمِيقَـٰتِ يَوْمٍ مَّعْلُومٍ

data.english: And it was said to the people: “Will you assemble
data.arabic: وَقِيلَ لِلنَّاسِ هَلْ أَنتُم مُّجْتَمِعُونَ

data.english: So we might follow the sorcerers, if they are the victors?”
data.arabic: لَعَلَّنَا نَتَّبِعُ ٱلسَّحَرَةَ إِن كَانُوا۟ هُمُ ٱلْغَـٰلِبِينَ

data.english: And when the sorcerers came they said to Pharaoh: “Will there be a reward for us, if we are the victors?”
data.arabic: فَلَمَّا جَآءَ ٱلسَّحَرَةُ قَالُوا۟ لِفِرْعَوْنَ أَئِنَّ لَنَا لَأَجْرًا إِن كُنَّا نَحْنُ ٱلْغَـٰلِبِينَ

data.english: He said: “Yea; and you will then be of those brought near.”
data.arabic: قَالَ نَعَمْ وَإِنَّكُمْ إِذًا لَّمِنَ ٱلْمُقَرَّبِينَ

data.english: Moses said to them: “Cast what you will cast.”
data.arabic: قَالَ لَهُم مُّوسَىٰٓ أَلْقُوا۟ مَآ أَنتُم مُّلْقُونَ

data.english: And they cast their ropes and their staffs, and said: “By the power and glory of Pharaoh are we the victors!”
data.arabic: فَأَلْقَوْا۟ حِبَالَهُمْ وَعِصِيَّهُمْ وَقَالُوا۟ بِعِزَّةِ فِرْعَوْنَ إِنَّا لَنَحْنُ ٱلْغَـٰلِبُونَ

data.english: Then Moses cast his staff; and then it swallowed up what they falsified;
data.arabic: فَأَلْقَىٰ مُوسَىٰ عَصَاهُ فَإِذَا هِىَ تَلْقَفُ مَا يَأْفِكُونَ

data.english: Then were the sorcerers cast down in submission,
data.arabic: فَأُلْقِىَ ٱلسَّحَرَةُ سَـٰجِدِينَ

data.english: They said: “We believe in the Lord of All Creation,
data.arabic: قَالُوٓا۟ ءَامَنَّا بِرَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ

data.english: “The Lord of Moses and Aaron.”
data.arabic: رَبِّ مُوسَىٰ وَهَـٰرُونَ

data.english: Said he: “You have believed him before I gave you leave. He is your chief who taught you sorcery. And you will come to know! I will cut off your hands and your feet on opposite sides, and crucify you all together.”
data.arabic: قَالَ ءَامَنتُمْ لَهُۥ قَبْلَ أَنْ ءَاذَنَ لَكُمْ إِنَّهُۥ لَكَبِيرُكُمُ ٱلَّذِى عَلَّمَكُمُ ٱلسِّحْرَ فَلَسَوْفَ تَعْلَمُونَ لَأُقَطِّعَنَّ أَيْدِيَكُمْ وَأَرْجُلَكُم مِّنْ خِلَـٰفٍ وَلَأُصَلِّبَنَّكُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ

data.english: They said: “No harm! To our Lord are we returning.
data.arabic: قَالُوا۟ لَا ضَيْرَ إِنَّآ إِلَىٰ رَبِّنَا مُنقَلِبُونَ

data.english: “We hope that our Lord will forgive us our offences because we were the first of the believers.”
data.arabic: إِنَّا نَطْمَعُ أَن يَغْفِرَ لَنَا رَبُّنَا خَطَـٰيَـٰنَآ أَن كُنَّآ أَوَّلَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ

data.english: And We instructed Moses: “Travel thou by night with My servants; you will be followed.”
data.arabic: وَأَوْحَيْنَآ إِلَىٰ مُوسَىٰٓ أَنْ أَسْرِ بِعِبَادِىٓ إِنَّكُم مُّتَّبَعُونَ

data.english: And Pharaoh sent into the cities gatherers:
data.arabic: فَأَرْسَلَ فِرْعَوْنُ فِى ٱلْمَدَآئِنِ حَـٰشِرِينَ

data.english: “These are but a little band
data.arabic: إِنَّ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ لَشِرْذِمَةٌ قَلِيلُونَ

data.english: “But they do enrage us
data.arabic: وَإِنَّهُمْ لَنَا لَغَآئِظُونَ

data.english: “And we are a cautious assembly.”
data.arabic: وَإِنَّا لَجَمِيعٌ حَـٰذِرُونَ

data.english: And We turned them out of gardens and springs,
data.arabic: فَأَخْرَجْنَـٰهُم مِّن جَنَّـٰتٍ وَعُيُونٍ

data.english: And treasures and a noble station.
data.arabic: وَكُنُوزٍ وَمَقَامٍ كَرِيمٍ

data.english: Thus! And We caused the children of Israel to inherit them.
data.arabic: كَذَٰلِكَ وَأَوْرَثْنَـٰهَا بَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ

data.english: And they followed them at sunrise;
data.arabic: فَأَتْبَعُوهُم مُّشْرِقِينَ

data.english: And when the two hosts saw each other, the companions of Moses said: “We are overtaken!”
data.arabic: فَلَمَّا تَرَٰٓءَا ٱلْجَمْعَانِ قَالَ أَصْحَـٰبُ مُوسَىٰٓ إِنَّا لَمُدْرَكُونَ

data.english: He said: “By no means! My Lord is with me; He will guide me.”
data.arabic: قَالَ كَلَّآ إِنَّ مَعِىَ رَبِّى سَيَهْدِينِ

data.english: Then We instructed Moses: “Strike thou the sea with thy staff”; and it parted, and each part was like a great towering mountain.
data.arabic: فَأَوْحَيْنَآ إِلَىٰ مُوسَىٰٓ أَنِ ٱضْرِب بِّعَصَاكَ ٱلْبَحْرَ فَٱنفَلَقَ فَكَانَ كُلُّ فِرْقٍ كَٱلطَّوْدِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ

data.english: And We brought nigh thereto the others,
data.arabic: وَأَزْلَفْنَا ثَمَّ ٱلْـَٔاخَرِينَ

data.english: And We delivered Moses and those with him all together.
data.arabic: وَأَنجَيْنَا مُوسَىٰ وَمَن مَّعَهُۥٓ أَجْمَعِينَ

data.english: Then drowned We the others.
data.arabic: ثُمَّ أَغْرَقْنَا ٱلْـَٔاخَرِينَ

data.english: In that is a proof, but most of them are not believers.
data.arabic: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَةً وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ

data.english: And thy Lord: He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.
data.arabic: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَهُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

data.english: And recite thou to them the report of Abraham
data.arabic: وَٱتْلُ عَلَيْهِمْ نَبَأَ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ

data.english: When he said to his father and his people: “What do you serve?”
data.arabic: إِذْ قَالَ لِأَبِيهِ وَقَوْمِهِۦ مَا تَعْبُدُونَ

data.english: They said: “We serve idols, and remain to them devoted.”
data.arabic: قَالُوا۟ نَعْبُدُ أَصْنَامًا فَنَظَلُّ لَهَا عَـٰكِفِينَ

data.english: He said: “Do they hear you when you call,
data.arabic: قَالَ هَلْ يَسْمَعُونَكُمْ إِذْ تَدْعُونَ

data.english: “Or benefit you, or do harm?”
data.arabic: أَوْ يَنفَعُونَكُمْ أَوْ يَضُرُّونَ

data.english: They said: “Nay — we found our fathers doing thus.”
data.arabic: قَالُوا۟ بَلْ وَجَدْنَآ ءَابَآءَنَا كَذَٰلِكَ يَفْعَلُونَ

data.english: He said: “Have you considered what you have been serving,
data.arabic: قَالَ أَفَرَءَيْتُم مَّا كُنتُمْ تَعْبُدُونَ

data.english: “You, and your fathers the ancients?
data.arabic: أَنتُمْ وَءَابَآؤُكُمُ ٱلْأَقْدَمُونَ

data.english: “And they are an enemy to me save the Lord of All Creation
data.arabic: فَإِنَّهُمْ عَدُوٌّ لِّىٓ إِلَّا رَبَّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ

data.english: “Who created me; and He guides me,
data.arabic: ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَنِى فَهُوَ يَهْدِينِ

data.english: “And it is He who feeds me and gives me drink,
data.arabic: وَٱلَّذِى هُوَ يُطْعِمُنِى وَيَسْقِينِ

data.english: “And when I am sick, He heals me,
data.arabic: وَإِذَا مَرِضْتُ فَهُوَ يَشْفِينِ

data.english: “And who will give me death, then give me life,
data.arabic: وَٱلَّذِى يُمِيتُنِى ثُمَّ يُحْيِينِ

data.english: “And who I hope will forgive me my offences on the Day of Judgment.”
data.arabic: وَٱلَّذِىٓ أَطْمَعُ أَن يَغْفِرَ لِى خَطِيٓـَٔتِى يَوْمَ ٱلدِّينِ

data.english: “My Lord: give Thou me judgment, and join Thou me with the righteous,
data.arabic: رَبِّ هَبْ لِى حُكْمًا وَأَلْحِقْنِى بِٱلصَّـٰلِحِينَ

data.english: “And appoint Thou for me a tongue of truth among those who come later.
data.arabic: وَٱجْعَل لِّى لِسَانَ صِدْقٍ فِى ٱلْـَٔاخِرِينَ

data.english: “And make Thou me among the inheritors of the Garden of Bliss.
data.arabic: وَٱجْعَلْنِى مِن وَرَثَةِ جَنَّةِ ٱلنَّعِيمِ

data.english: “And forgive Thou my father; he is of those who go astray.
data.arabic: وَٱغْفِرْ لِأَبِىٓ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ مِنَ ٱلضَّآلِّينَ

data.english: “And disgrace Thou me not the day they are raised:
data.arabic: وَلَا تُخْزِنِى يَوْمَ يُبْعَثُونَ

data.english: “The day wealth and sons benefit not
data.arabic: يَوْمَ لَا يَنفَعُ مَالٌ وَلَا بَنُونَ

data.english: “Save him who comes to God with a pure heart.”
data.arabic: إِلَّا مَنْ أَتَى ٱللَّـهَ بِقَلْبٍ سَلِيمٍ

data.english: And the Garden will be brought nigh to those of prudent fear,
data.arabic: وَأُزْلِفَتِ ٱلْجَنَّةُ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ

data.english: And Hell will be made manifest to those who err,
data.arabic: وَبُرِّزَتِ ٱلْجَحِيمُ لِلْغَاوِينَ

data.english: And it will be said to them: “Where is what you served,
data.arabic: وَقِيلَ لَهُمْ أَيْنَ مَا كُنتُمْ تَعْبُدُونَ

data.english: “Besides God? Do they help you, or help themselves?”
data.arabic: مِن دُونِ ٱللَّـهِ هَلْ يَنصُرُونَكُمْ أَوْ يَنتَصِرُونَ

data.english: And they will be hurled therein, they and those who err,
data.arabic: فَكُبْكِبُوا۟ فِيهَا هُمْ وَٱلْغَاوُۥنَ

data.english: And the forces of Iblīs all together.
data.arabic: وَجُنُودُ إِبْلِيسَ أَجْمَعُونَ

data.english: They will say while they dispute therein:
data.arabic: قَالُوا۟ وَهُمْ فِيهَا يَخْتَصِمُونَ

data.english: “By God, we were in manifest error
data.arabic: تَٱللَّـهِ إِن كُنَّا لَفِى ضَلَـٰلٍ مُّبِينٍ

data.english: “When we made you equal with the Lord of All Creation!
data.arabic: إِذْ نُسَوِّيكُم بِرَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ

data.english: “And none but the lawbreakers led us astray,
data.arabic: وَمَآ أَضَلَّنَآ إِلَّا ٱلْمُجْرِمُونَ

data.english: “So now we have no intercessors,
data.arabic: فَمَا لَنَا مِن شَـٰفِعِينَ

data.english: “Nor sincere loyal friend.
data.arabic: وَلَا صَدِيقٍ حَمِيمٍ

data.english: “Would that we might return and be among the believers!”
data.arabic: فَلَوْ أَنَّ لَنَا كَرَّةً فَنَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ

data.english: In that is a proof, but most of them are not believers.
data.arabic: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَةً وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ

data.english: And thy Lord: He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.
data.arabic: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَهُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

data.english: The people of Noah denied the emissaries
data.arabic: كَذَّبَتْ قَوْمُ نُوحٍ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ

data.english: When their brother Noah said to them: “Will you not be in prudent fear?
data.arabic: إِذْ قَالَ لَهُمْ أَخُوهُمْ نُوحٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ

data.english: “I am to you a trustworthy messenger,
data.arabic: إِنِّى لَكُمْ رَسُولٌ أَمِينٌ

data.english: “So be in prudent fear of God, and obey me.
data.arabic: فَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّـهَ وَأَطِيعُونِ

data.english: “And I ask of you for it no reward; my reward is only upon the Lord of All Creation;
data.arabic: وَمَآ أَسْـَٔلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ أَجْرٍ إِنْ أَجْرِىَ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ

data.english: “So be in prudent fear of God, and obey me.”
data.arabic: فَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّـهَ وَأَطِيعُونِ

data.english: They said: “Are we to believe thee when the abject follow thee?”
data.arabic: قَالُوٓا۟ أَنُؤْمِنُ لَكَ وَٱتَّبَعَكَ ٱلْأَرْذَلُونَ

data.english: He said: “And what knowledge have I of what they did?
data.arabic: قَالَ وَمَا عِلْمِى بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَعْمَلُونَ

data.english: “Their reckoning is only upon my Lord, were you to perceive.
data.arabic: إِنْ حِسَابُهُمْ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّى لَوْ تَشْعُرُونَ

data.english: “And I am not one to drive away the believers.
data.arabic: وَمَآ أَنَا۠ بِطَارِدِ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ

data.english: “I am only a clear warner.”
data.arabic: إِنْ أَنَا۠ إِلَّا نَذِيرٌ مُّبِينٌ

data.english: They said: “If thou cease not, O Noah, thou wilt be of those stoned.”
data.arabic: قَالُوا۟ لَئِن لَّمْ تَنتَهِ يَـٰنُوحُ لَتَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلْمَرْجُومِينَ

data.english: He said: “My Lord: my people have denied me,
data.arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنَّ قَوْمِى كَذَّبُونِ

data.english: “So decide Thou between me and them, and deliver Thou me and those with me among the believers.”
data.arabic: فَٱفْتَحْ بَيْنِى وَبَيْنَهُمْ فَتْحًا وَنَجِّنِى وَمَن مَّعِىَ مِنَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ

data.english: So We delivered him and those with him in the laden ship.
data.arabic: فَأَنجَيْنَـٰهُ وَمَن مَّعَهُۥ فِى ٱلْفُلْكِ ٱلْمَشْحُونِ

data.english: Then We drowned thereafter those remaining.
data.arabic: ثُمَّ أَغْرَقْنَا بَعْدُ ٱلْبَاقِينَ

data.english: In that is a proof, but most of them are not believers.
data.arabic: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَةً وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ

data.english: And thy Lord: He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.
data.arabic: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَهُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

data.english: ʿĀd denied the emissaries
data.arabic: كَذَّبَتْ عَادٌ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ

data.english: When their brother Hūd said to them: “Will you not be in prudent fear?
data.arabic: إِذْ قَالَ لَهُمْ أَخُوهُمْ هُودٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ

data.english: “I am to you a trustworthy messenger,
data.arabic: إِنِّى لَكُمْ رَسُولٌ أَمِينٌ

data.english: “So be in prudent fear of God, and obey me.
data.arabic: فَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّـهَ وَأَطِيعُونِ

data.english: “And I ask of you for it no reward; my reward is only upon the Lord of All Creation.
data.arabic: وَمَآ أَسْـَٔلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ أَجْرٍ إِنْ أَجْرِىَ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ

data.english: “Build you a proof on every prominence, amusing yourselves
data.arabic: أَتَبْنُونَ بِكُلِّ رِيعٍ ءَايَةً تَعْبَثُونَ

data.english: “And take you constructions, that you might abide eternally,
data.arabic: وَتَتَّخِذُونَ مَصَانِعَ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَخْلُدُونَ

data.english: “And when you lay hold, lay you hold as tyrants?
data.arabic: وَإِذَا بَطَشْتُم بَطَشْتُمْ جَبَّارِينَ

data.english: “So be in prudent fear of God, and obey me.
data.arabic: فَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّـهَ وَأَطِيعُونِ

data.english: “And be in prudent fear of Him who has supplied you with what you know:
data.arabic: وَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَمَدَّكُم بِمَا تَعْلَمُونَ

data.english: “Supplied you with cattle and sons,
data.arabic: أَمَدَّكُم بِأَنْعَـٰمٍ وَبَنِينَ

data.english: “And gardens and springs.
data.arabic: وَجَنَّـٰتٍ وَعُيُونٍ

data.english: “I fear for you the punishment of a tremendous day.”
data.arabic: إِنِّىٓ أَخَافُ عَلَيْكُمْ عَذَابَ يَوْمٍ عَظِيمٍ

data.english: They said: “It is the same to us whether thou admonishest, or be not of the admonishers.
data.arabic: قَالُوا۟ سَوَآءٌ عَلَيْنَآ أَوَعَظْتَ أَمْ لَمْ تَكُن مِّنَ ٱلْوَٰعِظِينَ

data.english: “This is only the tradition of the former peoples,
data.arabic: إِنْ هَـٰذَآ إِلَّا خُلُقُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ

data.english: “And we are not to be punished.”
data.arabic: وَمَا نَحْنُ بِمُعَذَّبِينَ

data.english: And they denied him, then We destroyed them. In that is a proof, but most of them are not believers.
data.arabic: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَأَهْلَكْنَـٰهُمْ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَةً وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ

data.english: And thy Lord: He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.
data.arabic: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَهُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

data.english: Thamūd denied the emissaries
data.arabic: كَذَّبَتْ ثَمُودُ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ

data.english: When their brother Ṣāliḥ said to them: “Will you not be in prudent fear?
data.arabic: إِذْ قَالَ لَهُمْ أَخُوهُمْ صَـٰلِحٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ

data.english: “I am to you a trustworthy messenger,
data.arabic: إِنِّى لَكُمْ رَسُولٌ أَمِينٌ

data.english: “So be in prudent fear of God, and obey me.
data.arabic: فَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّـهَ وَأَطِيعُونِ

data.english: “And I ask of you for it no reward; my reward is only upon the Lord of All Creation.
data.arabic: وَمَآ أَسْـَٔلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ أَجْرٍ إِنْ أَجْرِىَ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ

data.english: “Are you to be left secure in what is here,
data.arabic: أَتُتْرَكُونَ فِى مَا هَـٰهُنَآ ءَامِنِينَ

data.english: “Among gardens and springs,
data.arabic: فِى جَنَّـٰتٍ وَعُيُونٍ

data.english: “And tilled fields, and date-palms with slender spathes,
data.arabic: وَزُرُوعٍ وَنَخْلٍ طَلْعُهَا هَضِيمٌ

data.english: “And to hew out houses from the mountains skilfully?
data.arabic: وَتَنْحِتُونَ مِنَ ٱلْجِبَالِ بُيُوتًا فَـٰرِهِينَ

data.english: “So be in prudent fear of God, and obey me.
data.arabic: فَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّـهَ وَأَطِيعُونِ

data.english: “And obey not the command of the committers of excess:
data.arabic: وَلَا تُطِيعُوٓا۟ أَمْرَ ٱلْمُسْرِفِينَ

data.english: “Those who work corruption in the land, and do not right.”
data.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يُفْسِدُونَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَلَا يُصْلِحُونَ

data.english: They said: “Thou art but one taken by sorcery.
data.arabic: قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّمَآ أَنتَ مِنَ ٱلْمُسَحَّرِينَ

data.english: “Thou art only a mortal like us; then bring thou a proof, if thou be of the truthful.”
data.arabic: مَآ أَنتَ إِلَّا بَشَرٌ مِّثْلُنَا فَأْتِ بِـَٔايَةٍ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّـٰدِقِينَ

data.english: He said: “This is a she-camel; to her a drink and to you a drink on a day appointed.
data.arabic: قَالَ هَـٰذِهِۦ نَاقَةٌ لَّهَا شِرْبٌ وَلَكُمْ شِرْبُ يَوْمٍ مَّعْلُومٍ

data.english: “And touch her not with evil lest there take you the punishment of a tremendous day.”
data.arabic: وَلَا تَمَسُّوهَا بِسُوٓءٍ فَيَأْخُذَكُمْ عَذَابُ يَوْمٍ عَظِيمٍ

data.english: But they hamstrung her, then they became remorseful,
data.arabic: فَعَقَرُوهَا فَأَصْبَحُوا۟ نَـٰدِمِينَ

data.english: And the punishment seized them. In that is a proof, but most of them are not believers.
data.arabic: فَأَخَذَهُمُ ٱلْعَذَابُ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَةً وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ

data.english: And thy Lord: He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.
data.arabic: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَهُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

data.english: The people of Lot denied the emissaries
data.arabic: كَذَّبَتْ قَوْمُ لُوطٍ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ

data.english: When their brother Lot said to them: “Will you not be in prudent fear?
data.arabic: إِذْ قَالَ لَهُمْ أَخُوهُمْ لُوطٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ

data.english: “I am to you a trustworthy messenger,
data.arabic: إِنِّى لَكُمْ رَسُولٌ أَمِينٌ

data.english: “So be in prudent fear of God, and obey me.
data.arabic: فَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّـهَ وَأَطِيعُونِ

data.english: “And I ask of you for it no reward; my reward is only upon the Lord of All Creation.
data.arabic: وَمَآ أَسْـَٔلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ أَجْرٍ إِنْ أَجْرِىَ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ

data.english: “Do you approach the males among all mankind,
data.arabic: أَتَأْتُونَ ٱلذُّكْرَانَ مِنَ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ

data.english: “And leave what your Lord created for you among your wives? The truth is, you are a transgressing people.”
data.arabic: وَتَذَرُونَ مَا خَلَقَ لَكُمْ رَبُّكُم مِّنْ أَزْوَٰجِكُم بَلْ أَنتُمْ قَوْمٌ عَادُونَ

data.english: They said: “If thou cease not, O Lot, thou wilt be of those turned out.”
data.arabic: قَالُوا۟ لَئِن لَّمْ تَنتَهِ يَـٰلُوطُ لَتَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلْمُخْرَجِينَ

data.english: He said: “I am of those who abhor your deed.”
data.arabic: قَالَ إِنِّى لِعَمَلِكُم مِّنَ ٱلْقَالِينَ

data.english: “My Lord: deliver Thou me and my household from what they do.”
data.arabic: رَبِّ نَجِّنِى وَأَهْلِى مِمَّا يَعْمَلُونَ

data.english: And We delivered him and his household all together,
data.arabic: فَنَجَّيْنَـٰهُ وَأَهْلَهُۥٓ أَجْمَعِينَ

data.english: Save an old woman among those who stayed behind;
data.arabic: إِلَّا عَجُوزًا فِى ٱلْغَـٰبِرِينَ

data.english: Then We annihilated the others,
data.arabic: ثُمَّ دَمَّرْنَا ٱلْـَٔاخَرِينَ

data.english: And We rained upon them a rain; and evil is the rain of those who were warned.
data.arabic: وَأَمْطَرْنَا عَلَيْهِم مَّطَرًا فَسَآءَ مَطَرُ ٱلْمُنذَرِينَ

data.english: In that is a proof, but most of them are not believers.
data.arabic: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَةً وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ

data.english: And thy Lord: He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.
data.arabic: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَهُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

data.english: And the companions of the woods denied the emissaries
data.arabic: كَذَّبَ أَصْحَـٰبُ لْـَٔيْكَةِ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ

data.english: When Shuʿayb said to them: “Will you not be in prudent fear?
data.arabic: إِذْ قَالَ لَهُمْ شُعَيْبٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ

data.english: “I am to you a trustworthy messenger,
data.arabic: إِنِّى لَكُمْ رَسُولٌ أَمِينٌ

data.english: “So be in prudent fear of God, and obey me.
data.arabic: فَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّـهَ وَأَطِيعُونِ

data.english: “And I ask of you for it no reward; my reward is only upon the Lord of All Creation.
data.arabic: وَمَآ أَسْـَٔلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ أَجْرٍ إِنْ أَجْرِىَ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ

data.english: “Fulfil the measure, and be not of those who cause loss.
data.arabic: أَوْفُوا۟ ٱلْكَيْلَ وَلَا تَكُونُوا۟ مِنَ ٱلْمُخْسِرِينَ

data.english: “And weigh with the straight balance.
data.arabic: وَزِنُوا۟ بِٱلْقِسْطَاسِ ٱلْمُسْتَقِيمِ

data.english: “And deprive not men of their possessions, and commit not evil in the earth, working corruption.
data.arabic: وَلَا تَبْخَسُوا۟ ٱلنَّاسَ أَشْيَآءَهُمْ وَلَا تَعْثَوْا۟ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ مُفْسِدِينَ

data.english: “And be in prudent fear of Him who created you and the generations of the former peoples.”
data.arabic: وَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَكُمْ وَٱلْجِبِلَّةَ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ

data.english: They said: “Thou art but one taken by sorcery;
data.arabic: قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّمَآ أَنتَ مِنَ ٱلْمُسَحَّرِينَ

data.english: “And thou art only a mortal like us; and we consider thee a liar.
data.arabic: وَمَآ أَنتَ إِلَّا بَشَرٌ مِّثْلُنَا وَإِن نَّظُنُّكَ لَمِنَ ٱلْكَـٰذِبِينَ

data.english: “Then cause thou pieces of the sky to fall upon us, if thou be of the truthful.”
data.arabic: فَأَسْقِطْ عَلَيْنَا كِسَفًا مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّـٰدِقِينَ

data.english: He said: “My Lord best knows what you do.”
data.arabic: قَالَ رَبِّىٓ أَعْلَمُ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ

data.english: Then they denied him; then there seized them the punishment of the Day of Shadow; it was the punishment of a tremendous day.
data.arabic: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَأَخَذَهُمْ عَذَابُ يَوْمِ ٱلظُّلَّةِ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ عَذَابَ يَوْمٍ عَظِيمٍ

data.english: In that is a proof, but most of them are not believers.
data.arabic: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَةً وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ

data.english: And thy Lord: He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.
data.arabic: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَهُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

data.english: And it is a revelation of the Lord of All Creation,
data.arabic: وَإِنَّهُۥ لَتَنزِيلُ رَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ

data.english: Brought down by the Faithful Spirit
data.arabic: نَزَلَ بِهِ ٱلرُّوحُ ٱلْأَمِينُ

data.english: Upon thy heart — that thou be of the warners —
data.arabic: عَلَىٰ قَلْبِكَ لِتَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلْمُنذِرِينَ

data.english: In a clear Arabic tongue.
data.arabic: بِلِسَانٍ عَرَبِىٍّۢ مُّبِينٍ

data.english: And it is in the writings of the former peoples.
data.arabic: وَإِنَّهُۥ لَفِى زُبُرِ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ

data.english: Is it not a proof to them that the learned of the children of Israel know it?
data.arabic: أَوَلَمْ يَكُن لَّهُمْ ءَايَةً أَن يَعْلَمَهُۥ عُلَمَـٰٓؤُا۟ بَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ

data.english: And had We sent it down upon any of the non-Arabs,
data.arabic: وَلَوْ نَزَّلْنَـٰهُ عَلَىٰ بَعْضِ ٱلْأَعْجَمِينَ

data.english: And he had recited it to them, they would not have been believers in it.
data.arabic: فَقَرَأَهُۥ عَلَيْهِم مَّا كَانُوا۟ بِهِۦ مُؤْمِنِينَ

data.english: Thus have We put it in the hearts of the lawbreakers:
data.arabic: كَذَٰلِكَ سَلَكْنَـٰهُ فِى قُلُوبِ ٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ

data.english: “They will not believe in it until they see the painful punishment,
data.arabic: لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ بِهِۦ حَتَّىٰ يَرَوُا۟ ٱلْعَذَابَ ٱلْأَلِيمَ

data.english: “And it will come upon them unexpectedly, when they perceive not,”
data.arabic: فَيَأْتِيَهُم بَغْتَةً وَهُمْ لَا يَشْعُرُونَ

data.english: Then will they say: “Can we be granted respite?”
data.arabic: فَيَقُولُوا۟ هَلْ نَحْنُ مُنظَرُونَ

data.english: Is it then Our punishment they seek to hasten?
data.arabic: أَفَبِعَذَابِنَا يَسْتَعْجِلُونَ

data.english: Hast thou then considered: if We give them enjoyment for years,
data.arabic: أَفَرَءَيْتَ إِن مَّتَّعْنَـٰهُمْ سِنِينَ

data.english: Then there comes to them what they were promised,
data.arabic: ثُمَّ جَآءَهُم مَّا كَانُوا۟ يُوعَدُونَ

data.english: What will it avail them, what they enjoyed?
data.arabic: مَآ أَغْنَىٰ عَنْهُم مَّا كَانُوا۟ يُمَتَّعُونَ

data.english: And We destroyed no city save it had warners
data.arabic: وَمَآ أَهْلَكْنَا مِن قَرْيَةٍ إِلَّا لَهَا مُنذِرُونَ

data.english: As a reminder; and We were not wrongdoers.
data.arabic: ذِكْرَىٰ وَمَا كُنَّا ظَـٰلِمِينَ

data.english: And the satans did not bring it down;
data.arabic: وَمَا تَنَزَّلَتْ بِهِ ٱلشَّيَـٰطِينُ

data.english: And it does not behove them, nor are they able.
data.arabic: وَمَا يَنۢبَغِى لَهُمْ وَمَا يَسْتَطِيعُونَ

data.english: They are excluded from hearing.
data.arabic: إِنَّهُمْ عَنِ ٱلسَّمْعِ لَمَعْزُولُونَ

data.english: And call thou not, with God, to another god lest thou be of those punished.
data.arabic: فَلَا تَدْعُ مَعَ ٱللَّـهِ إِلَـٰهًا ءَاخَرَ فَتَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلْمُعَذَّبِينَ

data.english: And warn thou thy relatives.
data.arabic: وَأَنذِرْ عَشِيرَتَكَ ٱلْأَقْرَبِينَ

data.english: And lower thou thy wing to those who follow thee among the believers.
data.arabic: وَٱخْفِضْ جَنَاحَكَ لِمَنِ ٱتَّبَعَكَ مِنَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ

data.english: And if they oppose thee, say thou: “I am quit of what you do.”
data.arabic: فَإِنْ عَصَوْكَ فَقُلْ إِنِّى بَرِىٓءٌ مِّمَّا تَعْمَلُونَ

data.english: And place thou thy trust in the Exalted in Might, the Merciful:
data.arabic: وَتَوَكَّلْ عَلَى ٱلْعَزِيزِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ

data.english: Who sees thee when thou arisest,
data.arabic: ٱلَّذِى يَرَىٰكَ حِينَ تَقُومُ

data.english: And thy going to and fro among those who submit;
data.arabic: وَتَقَلُّبَكَ فِى ٱلسَّـٰجِدِينَ

data.english: He is the Hearing, the Knowing.
data.arabic: إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلْعَلِيمُ

data.english: Shall I inform you upon whom the satans descend?
data.arabic: هَلْ أُنَبِّئُكُمْ عَلَىٰ مَن تَنَزَّلُ ٱلشَّيَـٰطِينُ

data.english: They descend upon every sinful deceiver:
data.arabic: تَنَزَّلُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ أَفَّاكٍ أَثِيمٍ

data.english: They give ear, and most of them are liars.
data.arabic: يُلْقُونَ ٱلسَّمْعَ وَأَكْثَرُهُمْ كَـٰذِبُونَ

data.english: And the poets: those who err follow them.
data.arabic: وَٱلشُّعَرَآءُ يَتَّبِعُهُمُ ٱلْغَاوُۥنَ

data.english: Dost thou not see that they wander in every valley,
data.arabic: أَلَمْ تَرَ أَنَّهُمْ فِى كُلِّ وَادٍ يَهِيمُونَ

data.english: And that they say what they do not?
data.arabic: وَأَنَّهُمْ يَقُولُونَ مَا لَا يَفْعَلُونَ

data.english: Save those who heed warning and do righteous deeds, and remember God much, and help themselves after they have been wronged; and those who do wrong will come to know to what final destination they will be returned.
data.arabic: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ وَذَكَرُوا۟ ٱللَّـهَ كَثِيرًا وَٱنتَصَرُوا۟ مِنۢ بَعْدِ مَا ظُلِمُوا۟ وَسَيَعْلَمُ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوٓا۟ أَىَّ مُنقَلَبٍ يَنقَلِبُونَ

data.english: In the name of God, the Almighty, the Merciful.
data.arabic: بِسْمِ ٱللَّـهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ

data.english: ṭā sīn Those are the proofs of the Qur’an and of a Clear Writ
data.arabic: طسٓ تِلْكَ ءَايَـٰتُ ٱلْقُرْءَانِ وَكِتَابٍ مُّبِينٍ

data.english: As guidance and glad tidings for the believers,
data.arabic: هُدًى وَبُشْرَىٰ لِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ

data.english: Those who uphold the duty, and render the purity, and of the Hereafter they are certain.
data.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يُقِيمُونَ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَيُؤْتُونَ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَهُم بِٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ هُمْ يُوقِنُونَ

data.english: Those who believe not in the Hereafter, We have made their deeds fair to them, so they wander blindly.
data.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ بِٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ زَيَّنَّا لَهُمْ أَعْمَـٰلَهُمْ فَهُمْ يَعْمَهُونَ

data.english: Those are they for whom is the evil of punishment, and in the Hereafter are they the greatest losers.
data.arabic: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَهُمْ سُوٓءُ ٱلْعَذَابِ وَهُمْ فِى ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ هُمُ ٱلْأَخْسَرُونَ

data.english: And thou receivest the Qur’an from one wise and knowing.
data.arabic: وَإِنَّكَ لَتُلَقَّى ٱلْقُرْءَانَ مِن لَّدُنْ حَكِيمٍ عَلِيمٍ

data.english: When Moses said to his people: “I perceive a fire. I will bring you news from it, or bring you a flaming brand, that you might warm yourselves.”
data.arabic: إِذْ قَالَ مُوسَىٰ لِأَهْلِهِۦٓ إِنِّىٓ ءَانَسْتُ نَارًا سَـَٔاتِيكُم مِّنْهَا بِخَبَرٍ أَوْ ءَاتِيكُم بِشِهَابٍ قَبَسٍ لَّعَلَّكُمْ تَصْطَلُونَ

data.english: Then when he came to it, he was called: — blessed is He who is in the fire and who is round about it, and glory be to God, the Lord of All Creation! —
data.arabic: فَلَمَّا جَآءَهَا نُودِىَ أَنۢ بُورِكَ مَن فِى ٱلنَّارِ وَمَنْ حَوْلَهَا وَسُبْحَـٰنَ ٱللَّـهِ رَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ

data.english: “O Moses: it is I, God, the Exalted in Might, the Wise.
data.arabic: يَـٰمُوسَىٰٓ إِنَّهُۥٓ أَنَا ٱللَّـهُ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلْحَكِيمُ

data.english: “And cast thou thy staff.” And when he saw it stirring as if it were a dominus, he turned away, and did not return. “O Moses: fear thou not; the emissaries fear not in My presence,
data.arabic: وَأَلْقِ عَصَاكَ فَلَمَّا رَءَاهَا تَهْتَزُّ كَأَنَّهَا جَآنٌّ وَلَّىٰ مُدْبِرًا وَلَمْ يُعَقِّبْ يَـٰمُوسَىٰ لَا تَخَفْ إِنِّى لَا يَخَافُ لَدَىَّ ٱلْمُرْسَلُونَ

data.english: “Save whoso did wrong; then he changed to good after evil, so am I forgiving and merciful.
data.arabic: إِلَّا مَن ظَلَمَ ثُمَّ بَدَّلَ حُسْنًۢا بَعْدَ سُوٓءٍ فَإِنِّى غَفُورٌ رَّحِيمٌ

data.english: “And enter thou thy hand into thy bosom; it will come forth white, without evil — among nine proofs to Pharaoh and his people; they are a perfidious people.”
data.arabic: وَأَدْخِلْ يَدَكَ فِى جَيْبِكَ تَخْرُجْ بَيْضَآءَ مِنْ غَيْرِ سُوٓءٍ فِى تِسْعِ ءَايَـٰتٍ إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ وَقَوْمِهِۦٓ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا۟ قَوْمًا فَـٰسِقِينَ

data.english: And when Our visible proofs came to them, they said: “This is obvious sorcery”;
data.arabic: فَلَمَّا جَآءَتْهُمْ ءَايَـٰتُنَا مُبْصِرَةً قَالُوا۟ هَـٰذَا سِحْرٌ مُّبِينٌ

data.english: And they rejected them, though their souls were convinced thereof, in injustice and arrogance. So see thou how was the final outcome of the workers of corruption.
data.arabic: وَجَحَدُوا۟ بِهَا وَٱسْتَيْقَنَتْهَآ أَنفُسُهُمْ ظُلْمًا وَعُلُوًّا فَٱنظُرْ كَيْفَ كَانَ عَـٰقِبَةُ ٱلْمُفْسِدِينَ

data.english: And We gave to David and Solomon knowledge; and they said: “Praise belongs to God who has preferred us above many of His believing servants.”
data.arabic: وَلَقَدْ ءَاتَيْنَا دَاوُۥدَ وَسُلَيْمَـٰنَ عِلْمًا وَقَالَا ٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّـهِ ٱلَّذِى فَضَّلَنَا عَلَىٰ كَثِيرٍ مِّنْ عِبَادِهِ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ

data.english: And Solomon inherited from David; and he said: “O mankind: we have been taught the speech of birds, and have been given of every thing; this is the clear favour.”
data.arabic: وَوَرِثَ سُلَيْمَـٰنُ دَاوُۥدَ وَقَالَ يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ عُلِّمْنَا مَنطِقَ ٱلطَّيْرِ وَأُوتِينَا مِن كُلِّ شَىْءٍ إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَهُوَ ٱلْفَضْلُ ٱلْمُبِينُ

data.english: And there were gathered to Solomon his forces of domini and servi and birds; and they were marshalled.
data.arabic: وَحُشِرَ لِسُلَيْمَـٰنَ جُنُودُهُۥ مِنَ ٱلْجِنِّ وَٱلْإِنسِ وَٱلطَّيْرِ فَهُمْ يُوزَعُونَ

data.english: When they had reached the valley of the ants, an ant said: “O ants: enter your dwellings lest Solomon and his forces crush you when they perceive not!”
data.arabic: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَآ أَتَوْا۟ عَلَىٰ وَادِ ٱلنَّمْلِ قَالَتْ نَمْلَةٌ يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّمْلُ ٱدْخُلُوا۟ مَسَـٰكِنَكُمْ لَا يَحْطِمَنَّكُمْ سُلَيْمَـٰنُ وَجُنُودُهُۥ وَهُمْ لَا يَشْعُرُونَ

data.english: And he smiled, laughing at her speech, and he said: “My Lord: direct Thou me to be grateful for Thy favour wherewith Thou favoured me and my parents, and to work righteousness pleasing to Thee; and make Thou me enter, by Thy mercy, among Thy righteous servants.”
data.arabic: فَتَبَسَّمَ ضَاحِكًا مِّن قَوْلِهَا وَقَالَ رَبِّ أَوْزِعْنِىٓ أَنْ أَشْكُرَ نِعْمَتَكَ ٱلَّتِىٓ أَنْعَمْتَ عَلَىَّ وَعَلَىٰ وَٰلِدَىَّ وَأَنْ أَعْمَلَ صَـٰلِحًا تَرْضَىٰهُ وَأَدْخِلْنِى بِرَحْمَتِكَ فِى عِبَادِكَ ٱلصَّـٰلِحِينَ

data.english: And he inspected the birds, and said: “How is it with me that I see not the hoopoe? Or is he among the absent?
data.arabic: وَتَفَقَّدَ ٱلطَّيْرَ فَقَالَ مَا لِىَ لَآ أَرَى ٱلْهُدْهُدَ أَمْ كَانَ مِنَ ٱلْغَآئِبِينَ

data.english: “I will punish him with a severe punishment, or I will slaughter him, unless he brings me a clear authority.”
data.arabic: لَأُعَذِّبَنَّهُۥ عَذَابًا شَدِيدًا أَوْ لَأَا۟ذْبَحَنَّهُۥٓ أَوْ لَيَأْتِيَنِّى بِسُلْطَـٰنٍ مُّبِينٍ

data.english: But he tarried not long, and said: “I have encompassed what thou hast not encompassed; and I come to thee from Saba’ with a certain report.
data.arabic: فَمَكَثَ غَيْرَ بَعِيدٍ فَقَالَ أَحَطتُ بِمَا لَمْ تُحِطْ بِهِۦ وَجِئْتُكَ مِن سَبَإٍۭ بِنَبَإٍ يَقِينٍ

data.english: “I found a woman ruling them; and she has been given of every thing; and she has a great throne.
data.arabic: إِنِّى وَجَدتُّ ٱمْرَأَةً تَمْلِكُهُمْ وَأُوتِيَتْ مِن كُلِّ شَىْءٍ وَلَهَا عَرْشٌ عَظِيمٌ

data.english: “I found her and her people submitting to the sun, rather than to God.” (And the satan made their deeds fair to them; he turned them away from the path, so they are not guided
data.arabic: وَجَدتُّهَا وَقَوْمَهَا يَسْجُدُونَ لِلشَّمْسِ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّـهِ وَزَيَّنَ لَهُمُ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنُ أَعْمَـٰلَهُمْ فَصَدَّهُمْ عَنِ ٱلسَّبِيلِ فَهُمْ لَا يَهْتَدُونَ

data.english: That they submit not to God who brings forth the hidden in the heavens and the earth, and knows what you hide and what you make known;
data.arabic: أَلَّا يَسْجُدُوا۟ لِلَّـهِ ٱلَّذِى يُخْرِجُ ٱلْخَبْءَ فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَيَعْلَمُ مَا تُخْفُونَ وَمَا تُعْلِنُونَ

data.english: God, there is no god save He, Lord of the Great Throne.)
data.arabic: ٱللَّـهُ لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ رَبُّ ٱلْعَرْشِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ

data.english: He said: “We will see if thou hast spoken truly or art of the liars.
data.arabic: قَالَ سَنَنظُرُ أَصَدَقْتَ أَمْ كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلْكَـٰذِبِينَ

data.english: “Go thou with this my writ; cast thou it unto them, then turn thou away from them and see thou what they will return.”
data.arabic: ٱذْهَب بِّكِتَـٰبِى هَـٰذَا فَأَلْقِهْ إِلَيْهِمْ ثُمَّ تَوَلَّ عَنْهُمْ فَٱنظُرْ مَاذَا يَرْجِعُونَ

data.english: She said: “O eminent ones: there has been cast unto me a noble writ;
data.arabic: قَالَتْ يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلْمَلَؤُا۟ إِنِّىٓ أُلْقِىَ إِلَىَّ كِتَـٰبٌ كَرِيمٌ

data.english: “It is from Solomon, and it is: ‘In the name of God, the Almighty, the Merciful:
data.arabic: إِنَّهُۥ مِن سُلَيْمَـٰنَ وَإِنَّهُۥ بِسْمِ ٱللَّـهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ

data.english: “‘Exalt not yourselves against me, but come to me submitting!’”
data.arabic: أَلَّا تَعْلُوا۟ عَلَىَّ وَأْتُونِى مُسْلِمِينَ

data.english: She said: “O eminent ones: counsel me in my affair; I decide no affair until you bear me witness.”
data.arabic: قَالَتْ يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلْمَلَؤُا۟ أَفْتُونِى فِىٓ أَمْرِى مَا كُنتُ قَاطِعَةً أَمْرًا حَتَّىٰ تَشْهَدُونِ

data.english: They said: “We possess power and possess strong might, but the command is for thee; see thou what thou wilt command.”
data.arabic: قَالُوا۟ نَحْنُ أُو۟لُوا۟ قُوَّةٍ وَأُو۟لُوا۟ بَأْسٍ شَدِيدٍ وَٱلْأَمْرُ إِلَيْكِ فَٱنظُرِى مَاذَا تَأْمُرِينَ

data.english: She said: “Kings, when they enter a city, spoil it and make its most honoured people abject; and thus will they do.
data.arabic: قَالَتْ إِنَّ ٱلْمُلُوكَ إِذَا دَخَلُوا۟ قَرْيَةً أَفْسَدُوهَا وَجَعَلُوٓا۟ أَعِزَّةَ أَهْلِهَآ أَذِلَّةً وَكَذَٰلِكَ يَفْعَلُونَ

data.english: “And I will send a gift to them, and see with what the emissaries return.”
data.arabic: وَإِنِّى مُرْسِلَةٌ إِلَيْهِم بِهَدِيَّةٍ فَنَاظِرَةٌۢ بِمَ يَرْجِعُ ٱلْمُرْسَلُونَ

data.english: So when he came to Solomon, he said: “Would you supply me with wealth? But what God has given me is better than what He has given you; the truth is, it is you who exult in your gift.
data.arabic: فَلَمَّا جَآءَ سُلَيْمَـٰنَ قَالَ أَتُمِدُّونَنِ بِمَالٍ فَمَآ ءَاتَىٰنِۦَ ٱللَّـهُ خَيْرٌ مِّمَّآ ءَاتَىٰكُم بَلْ أَنتُم بِهَدِيَّتِكُمْ تَفْرَحُونَ

data.english: “Return thou to them: ‘We will come to them with forces they have no power to resist, and we will drive them therefrom in abjection; and they will be brought low.’”
data.arabic: ٱرْجِعْ إِلَيْهِمْ فَلَنَأْتِيَنَّهُم بِجُنُودٍ لَّا قِبَلَ لَهُم بِهَا وَلَنُخْرِجَنَّهُم مِّنْهَآ أَذِلَّةً وَهُمْ صَـٰغِرُونَ

data.english: He said: “O eminent ones: which of you will bring me her throne before they come to me submitting?”
data.arabic: قَالَ يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلْمَلَؤُا۟ أَيُّكُمْ يَأْتِينِى بِعَرْشِهَا قَبْلَ أَن يَأْتُونِى مُسْلِمِينَ

data.english: A mischievous one among the domini said: “I will bring it to thee before thou canst rise from thy place; and I am for this strong and trustworthy.”
data.arabic: قَالَ عِفْرِيتٌ مِّنَ ٱلْجِنِّ أَنَا۠ ءَاتِيكَ بِهِۦ قَبْلَ أَن تَقُومَ مِن مَّقَامِكَ وَإِنِّى عَلَيْهِ لَقَوِىٌّ أَمِينٌ

data.english: Said one with knowledge of the writ: “I will bring it to thee before thy glance return to thee.” And when he saw it set before him, he said: “This is of the bounty of my Lord, that He might try me, whether I am grateful or ungrateful; and whoso is grateful, he is but grateful for his soul; and whoso is ungrateful, then is my Lord free from need and generous.
data.arabic: قَالَ ٱلَّذِى عِندَهُۥ عِلْمٌ مِّنَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ أَنَا۠ ءَاتِيكَ بِهِۦ قَبْلَ أَن يَرْتَدَّ إِلَيْكَ طَرْفُكَ فَلَمَّا رَءَاهُ مُسْتَقِرًّا عِندَهُۥ قَالَ هَـٰذَا مِن فَضْلِ رَبِّى لِيَبْلُوَنِىٓ ءَأَشْكُرُ أَمْ أَكْفُرُ وَمَن شَكَرَ فَإِنَّمَا يَشْكُرُ لِنَفْسِهِۦ وَمَن كَفَرَ فَإِنَّ رَبِّى غَنِىٌّ كَرِيمٌ

data.english: (He said: “Disguise her throne for her; we will see if she is guided, or if she is of those not guided.”
data.arabic: قَالَ نَكِّرُوا۟ لَهَا عَرْشَهَا نَنظُرْ أَتَهْتَدِىٓ أَمْ تَكُونُ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَهْتَدُونَ

data.english: And when she came, it was said: “Is thy throne like this?” She said: “As though the same.”) “And we were given knowledge before her; and we were submitting.
data.arabic: فَلَمَّا جَآءَتْ قِيلَ أَهَـٰكَذَا عَرْشُكِ قَالَتْ كَأَنَّهُۥ هُوَ وَأُوتِينَا ٱلْعِلْمَ مِن قَبْلِهَا وَكُنَّا مُسْلِمِينَ

data.english: “And what she served, besides God, diverted her; she was of a people of false claimers of guidance.”
data.arabic: وَصَدَّهَا مَا كَانَت تَّعْبُدُ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّـهِ إِنَّهَا كَانَتْ مِن قَوْمٍ كَـٰفِرِينَ

data.english: (It was said to her: “Enter thou the palace.” But when she saw it, she thought it a body of water and uncovered her legs. He said: “It is a palace made smooth with glass.”) She said, “My Lord: I have wronged my soul, and I submit with Solomon to God, the Lord of All Creation.”
data.arabic: قِيلَ لَهَا ٱدْخُلِى ٱلصَّرْحَ فَلَمَّا رَأَتْهُ حَسِبَتْهُ لُجَّةً وَكَشَفَتْ عَن سَاقَيْهَا قَالَ إِنَّهُۥ صَرْحٌ مُّمَرَّدٌ مِّن قَوَارِيرَ قَالَتْ رَبِّ إِنِّى ظَلَمْتُ نَفْسِى وَأَسْلَمْتُ مَعَ سُلَيْمَـٰنَ لِلَّـهِ رَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ

data.english: And We sent to Thamūd their brother Ṣāliḥ: “— That you serve God,” but then were they two factions quarrelling.
data.arabic: وَلَقَدْ أَرْسَلْنَآ إِلَىٰ ثَمُودَ أَخَاهُمْ صَـٰلِحًا أَنِ ٱعْبُدُوا۟ ٱللَّـهَ فَإِذَا هُمْ فَرِيقَانِ يَخْتَصِمُونَ

data.english: He said: “O my people: why will you hasten on the evil before the good? Oh, that you did but ask pardon of God, that you might obtain mercy!”
data.arabic: قَالَ يَـٰقَوْمِ لِمَ تَسْتَعْجِلُونَ بِٱلسَّيِّئَةِ قَبْلَ ٱلْحَسَنَةِ لَوْلَا تَسْتَغْفِرُونَ ٱللَّـهَ لَعَلَّكُمْ تُرْحَمُونَ

data.english: They said: “We think thee and those with thee an evil omen.” He said: “Your evil omen is with God. The truth is, you are a people subjected to means of denial.”
data.arabic: قَالُوا۟ ٱطَّيَّرْنَا بِكَ وَبِمَن مَّعَكَ قَالَ طَـٰٓئِرُكُمْ عِندَ ٱللَّـهِ بَلْ أَنتُمْ قَوْمٌ تُفْتَنُونَ

data.english: And there were in the city nine men who wrought corruption in the land and did not right.
data.arabic: وَكَانَ فِى ٱلْمَدِينَةِ تِسْعَةُ رَهْطٍ يُفْسِدُونَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَلَا يُصْلِحُونَ

data.english: They said: “Swear one to another, by God, that we will attack him and his household by night. Then we will say to his ally: ‘We witnessed not the destruction of his household, and we are the truthful.’”
data.arabic: قَالُوا۟ تَقَاسَمُوا۟ بِٱللَّـهِ لَنُبَيِّتَنَّهُۥ وَأَهْلَهُۥ ثُمَّ لَنَقُولَنَّ لِوَلِيِّهِۦ مَا شَهِدْنَا مَهْلِكَ أَهْلِهِۦ وَإِنَّا لَصَـٰدِقُونَ

data.english: And they schemed a scheme, and We schemed a scheme; and they perceived not.
data.arabic: وَمَكَرُوا۟ مَكْرًا وَمَكَرْنَا مَكْرًا وَهُمْ لَا يَشْعُرُونَ

data.english: Then see thou how was the final outcome of their scheme: that We destroyed them and their people all together,
data.arabic: فَٱنظُرْ كَيْفَ كَانَ عَـٰقِبَةُ مَكْرِهِمْ أَنَّا دَمَّرْنَـٰهُمْ وَقَوْمَهُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ

data.english: So those are their houses, desolate because of the wrong they did; in that is a proof for people who know.
data.arabic: فَتِلْكَ بُيُوتُهُمْ خَاوِيَةًۢ بِمَا ظَلَمُوٓا۟ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَةً لِّقَوْمٍ يَعْلَمُونَ

data.english: And We delivered those who heeded warning and were in prudent fear.
data.arabic: وَأَنجَيْنَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَكَانُوا۟ يَتَّقُونَ

data.english: And Lot: when he said to his people: “Do you commit sexual immorality with open eyes?
data.arabic: وَلُوطًا إِذْ قَالَ لِقَوْمِهِۦٓ أَتَأْتُونَ ٱلْفَـٰحِشَةَ وَأَنتُمْ تُبْصِرُونَ

data.english: “Do you approach men with lust instead of women? The truth is, you are a people in ignorance.”
data.arabic: أَئِنَّكُمْ لَتَأْتُونَ ٱلرِّجَالَ شَهْوَةً مِّن دُونِ ٱلنِّسَآءِ بَلْ أَنتُمْ قَوْمٌ تَجْهَلُونَ

data.english: But the response of his people was only that they said: “Turn the family of Lot out of your city; they are men who keep themselves pure!”
data.arabic: فَمَا كَانَ جَوَابَ قَوْمِهِۦٓ إِلَّآ أَن قَالُوٓا۟ أَخْرِجُوٓا۟ ءَالَ لُوطٍ مِّن قَرْيَتِكُمْ إِنَّهُمْ أُنَاسٌ يَتَطَهَّرُونَ

data.english: And We delivered him and his household save his wife; We decreed her to be of those who stayed behind.
data.arabic: فَأَنجَيْنَـٰهُ وَأَهْلَهُۥٓ إِلَّا ٱمْرَأَتَهُۥ قَدَّرْنَـٰهَا مِنَ ٱلْغَـٰبِرِينَ

data.english: And We rained upon them a rain; and evil is the rain of those who were warned.
data.arabic: وَأَمْطَرْنَا عَلَيْهِم مَّطَرًا فَسَآءَ مَطَرُ ٱلْمُنذَرِينَ

data.english: Say thou: “Praise belongs to God, and peace be upon His servants whom He has chosen!” Is God better, or that to which they ascribe a partnership?
data.arabic: قُلِ ٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّـهِ وَسَلَـٰمٌ عَلَىٰ عِبَادِهِ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱصْطَفَىٰٓ ءَآللَّـهُ خَيْرٌ أَمَّا يُشْرِكُونَ

data.english: If: He who created the heavens and the earth: — and sent down for you water from the sky wherewith We cause to grow gardens full of delight whereof it was not for you to cause the trees to grow — is there any god with God? The truth is, they are a people who ascribe equals.
data.arabic: أَمَّنْ خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ وَأَنزَلَ لَكُم مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءً فَأَنۢبَتْنَا بِهِۦ حَدَآئِقَ ذَاتَ بَهْجَةٍ مَّا كَانَ لَكُمْ أَن تُنۢبِتُوا۟ شَجَرَهَآ أَءِلَـٰهٌ مَّعَ ٱللَّـهِ بَلْ هُمْ قَوْمٌ يَعْدِلُونَ

data.english: If: He who made the earth a fixed lodging, and made rivers in its midst, and made firm mountains therein, and made a barrier between the two seas: is there any god with God? The truth is, most of them know not.
data.arabic: أَمَّن جَعَلَ ٱلْأَرْضَ قَرَارًا وَجَعَلَ خِلَـٰلَهَآ أَنْهَـٰرًا وَجَعَلَ لَهَا رَوَٰسِىَ وَجَعَلَ بَيْنَ ٱلْبَحْرَيْنِ حَاجِزًا أَءِلَـٰهٌ مَّعَ ٱللَّـهِ بَلْ أَكْثَرُهُمْ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ

data.english: If: He who responds to one distressed when he calls to Him, and removes the evil, and makes you successors of the earth: is there any god with God? Little do you take heed.
data.arabic: أَمَّن يُجِيبُ ٱلْمُضْطَرَّ إِذَا دَعَاهُ وَيَكْشِفُ ٱلسُّوٓءَ وَيَجْعَلُكُمْ خُلَفَآءَ ٱلْأَرْضِ أَءِلَـٰهٌ مَّعَ ٱللَّـهِ قَلِيلًا مَّا تَذَكَّرُونَ

data.english: If: He who guides you in the darknesses of the land and the sea, and who sends the winds as glad tidings at the time of His mercy: is there any god with God? Exalted be God above that to which they ascribe a partnership!
data.arabic: أَمَّن يَهْدِيكُمْ فِى ظُلُمَـٰتِ ٱلْبَرِّ وَٱلْبَحْرِ وَمَن يُرْسِلُ ٱلرِّيَـٰحَ بُشْرًۢا بَيْنَ يَدَىْ رَحْمَتِهِۦٓ أَءِلَـٰهٌ مَّعَ ٱللَّـهِ تَعَـٰلَى ٱللَّـهُ عَمَّا يُشْرِكُونَ

data.english: If: He who begins creation, then repeats it, and provides for you from the heaven and the earth: is there any god with God? Say thou: “Bring your evidence, if you be truthful.”
data.arabic: أَمَّن يَبْدَؤُا۟ ٱلْخَلْقَ ثُمَّ يُعِيدُهُۥ وَمَن يَرْزُقُكُم مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ أَءِلَـٰهٌ مَّعَ ٱللَّـهِ قُلْ هَاتُوا۟ بُرْهَـٰنَكُمْ إِن كُنتُمْ صَـٰدِقِينَ

data.english: Say thou: “None in the heavens and the earth knows the Unseen save God.” And they perceive not when they will be raised.
data.arabic: قُل لَّا يَعْلَمُ مَن فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ٱلْغَيْبَ إِلَّا ٱللَّـهُ وَمَا يَشْعُرُونَ أَيَّانَ يُبْعَثُونَ

data.english: The truth is, their knowledge fails concerning the Hereafter. The truth is, they are in doubt about it. The truth is, they are blind to it.
data.arabic: بَلِ ٱدَّٰرَكَ عِلْمُهُمْ فِى ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ بَلْ هُمْ فِى شَكٍّۢ مِّنْهَا بَلْ هُم مِّنْهَا عَمُونَ

data.english: And those who ignore warning say: “When we are dust, and our fathers, will we be brought forth?
data.arabic: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓا۟ أَءِذَا كُنَّا تُرَٰبًا وَءَابَآؤُنَآ أَئِنَّا لَمُخْرَجُونَ

data.english: “We have been promised this, we and our fathers, before; this is only legends of the former peoples.”
data.arabic: لَقَدْ وُعِدْنَا هَـٰذَا نَحْنُ وَءَابَآؤُنَا مِن قَبْلُ إِنْ هَـٰذَآ إِلَّآ أَسَـٰطِيرُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ

data.english: Say thou: “Travel in the earth and see how was the final outcome of the lawbreakers.”
data.arabic: قُلْ سِيرُوا۟ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ فَٱنظُرُوا۟ كَيْفَ كَانَ عَـٰقِبَةُ ٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ

data.english: And grieve thou not over them, nor be thou in distress because of what they scheme.
data.arabic: وَلَا تَحْزَنْ عَلَيْهِمْ وَلَا تَكُن فِى ضَيْقٍ مِّمَّا يَمْكُرُونَ

data.english: And they say: “When is this promise, if you be truthful?”
data.arabic: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَـٰذَا ٱلْوَعْدُ إِن كُنتُمْ صَـٰدِقِينَ

data.english: Say thou: “It may be that close behind you is some of what you would hasten.”
data.arabic: قُلْ عَسَىٰٓ أَن يَكُونَ رَدِفَ لَكُم بَعْضُ ٱلَّذِى تَسْتَعْجِلُونَ

data.english: And thy Lord is bountiful to mankind, but most of them are not grateful.
data.arabic: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَذُو فَضْلٍ عَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ وَلَـٰكِنَّ أَكْثَرَهُمْ لَا يَشْكُرُونَ

data.english: And thy Lord knows what their breasts conceal, and what they make known.
data.arabic: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَيَعْلَمُ مَا تُكِنُّ صُدُورُهُمْ وَمَا يُعْلِنُونَ

data.english: And there is nothing hidden in the heaven and the earth save is in a clear writ.
data.arabic: وَمَا مِنْ غَآئِبَةٍ فِى ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ إِلَّا فِى كِتَـٰبٍ مُّبِينٍ

data.english: This Qur’an relates to the children of Israel most of that wherein they differ,
data.arabic: إِنَّ هَـٰذَا ٱلْقُرْءَانَ يَقُصُّ عَلَىٰ بَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ أَكْثَرَ ٱلَّذِى هُمْ فِيهِ يَخْتَلِفُونَ

data.english: And it is guidance, and a mercy for the believers.
data.arabic: وَإِنَّهُۥ لَهُدًى وَرَحْمَةٌ لِّلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
