data.english: And a proof for them is that We bore their progeny in the laden ship.
data.arabic: وَءَايَةٌ لَّهُمْ أَنَّا حَمَلْنَا ذُرِّيَّتَهُمْ فِى ٱلْفُلْكِ ٱلْمَشْحُونِ

data.english: And We created for them the like thereof which they ride.
data.arabic: وَخَلَقْنَا لَهُم مِّن مِّثْلِهِۦ مَا يَرْكَبُونَ

data.english: And if We will, We drown them; then none have they to cry to, nor are they rescued,
data.arabic: وَإِن نَّشَأْ نُغْرِقْهُمْ فَلَا صَرِيخَ لَهُمْ وَلَا هُمْ يُنقَذُونَ

data.english: Save as a mercy from Us, and as enjoyment for a time.
data.arabic: إِلَّا رَحْمَةً مِّنَّا وَمَتَـٰعًا إِلَىٰ حِينٍ

data.english: But when it is said to them: “Be in prudent fear of what is before you, and what is behind you, that you might obtain mercy[...].”
data.arabic: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ ٱتَّقُوا۟ مَا بَيْنَ أَيْدِيكُمْ وَمَا خَلْفَكُمْ لَعَلَّكُمْ تُرْحَمُونَ

data.english: And there comes not to them a proof among the proofs of their Lord save they turn away therefrom.
data.arabic: وَمَا تَأْتِيهِم مِّنْ ءَايَةٍ مِّنْ ءَايَـٰتِ رَبِّهِمْ إِلَّا كَانُوا۟ عَنْهَا مُعْرِضِينَ

data.english: And when it is said to them: “Spend of what God has provided you,” those who ignore warning say to those who heed warning: “Shall we feed one whom, had God willed, He would have fed? You are only in manifest error.”
data.arabic: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمْ أَنفِقُوا۟ مِمَّا رَزَقَكُمُ ٱللَّـهُ قَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ لِلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ أَنُطْعِمُ مَن لَّوْ يَشَآءُ ٱللَّـهُ أَطْعَمَهُۥٓ إِنْ أَنتُمْ إِلَّا فِى ضَلَـٰلٍ مُّبِينٍ

data.english: And they say: “When is this promise, if you be truthful?”
data.arabic: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَـٰذَا ٱلْوَعْدُ إِن كُنتُمْ صَـٰدِقِينَ

data.english: They look only for one Blast which will seize them while they are disputing —
data.arabic: مَا يَنظُرُونَ إِلَّا صَيْحَةً وَٰحِدَةً تَأْخُذُهُمْ وَهُمْ يَخِصِّمُونَ

data.english: They will not be able to make a bequest, nor will they return to their people.
data.arabic: فَلَا يَسْتَطِيعُونَ تَوْصِيَةً وَلَآ إِلَىٰٓ أَهْلِهِمْ يَرْجِعُونَ

data.english: And the Trumpet will be blown; and then from the graves will they hasten forth to their Lord.
data.arabic: وَنُفِخَ فِى ٱلصُّورِ فَإِذَا هُم مِّنَ ٱلْأَجْدَاثِ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِمْ يَنسِلُونَ

data.english: They will say: “Woe is us! Who has raised us from our sleeping place?” — “This is what the Almighty promised! And the emissaries spoke truth!”
data.arabic: قَالُوا۟ يَـٰوَيْلَنَا مَنۢ بَعَثَنَا مِن مَّرْقَدِنَا هَـٰذَا مَا وَعَدَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ وَصَدَقَ ٱلْمُرْسَلُونَ

data.english: It will be only one Blast — and then are they summoned before Us all together:
data.arabic: إِن كَانَتْ إِلَّا صَيْحَةً وَٰحِدَةً فَإِذَا هُمْ جَمِيعٌ لَّدَيْنَا مُحْضَرُونَ

data.english: “This day no soul will be wronged in anything, and you will not be rewarded save for what you did.”
data.arabic: فَٱلْيَوْمَ لَا تُظْلَمُ نَفْسٌ شَيْـًٔا وَلَا تُجْزَوْنَ إِلَّا مَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ

data.english: The companions of the Garden, this day, will be engaged in gladness,
data.arabic: إِنَّ أَصْحَـٰبَ ٱلْجَنَّةِ ٱلْيَوْمَ فِى شُغُلٍ فَـٰكِهُونَ

data.english: They and their wives, in shade, upon couches reclining.
data.arabic: هُمْ وَأَزْوَٰجُهُمْ فِى ظِلَـٰلٍ عَلَى ٱلْأَرَآئِكِ مُتَّكِـُٔونَ

data.english: They have therein fruit, and they have what they call for.
data.arabic: لَهُمْ فِيهَا فَـٰكِهَةٌ وَلَهُم مَّا يَدَّعُونَ

data.english: “Peace!” — as a word from a merciful Lord —
data.arabic: سَلَـٰمٌ قَوْلًا مِّن رَّبٍّۢ رَّحِيمٍ

data.english: “But separate yourselves this day, O you lawbreakers!
data.arabic: وَٱمْتَـٰزُوا۟ ٱلْيَوْمَ أَيُّهَا ٱلْمُجْرِمُونَ

data.english: “Did I not commission you, O children of Adam, that you serve not the satan,” — he is an open enemy to you —
data.arabic: أَلَمْ أَعْهَدْ إِلَيْكُمْ يَـٰبَنِىٓ ءَادَمَ أَن لَّا تَعْبُدُوا۟ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنَ إِنَّهُۥ لَكُمْ عَدُوٌّ مُّبِينٌ

data.english: “But that you serve Me? This is a straight path.
data.arabic: وَأَنِ ٱعْبُدُونِى هَـٰذَا صِرَٰطٌ مُّسْتَقِيمٌ

data.english: “And he led astray among you a great multitude. Did you then not use reason?
data.arabic: وَلَقَدْ أَضَلَّ مِنكُمْ جِبِلًّا كَثِيرًا أَفَلَمْ تَكُونُوا۟ تَعْقِلُونَ

data.english: “This is Gehenna: — which you were promised —
data.arabic: هَـٰذِهِۦ جَهَنَّمُ ٱلَّتِى كُنتُمْ تُوعَدُونَ

data.english: “Burn therein this day, for what you denied!”
data.arabic: ٱصْلَوْهَا ٱلْيَوْمَ بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَكْفُرُونَ

data.english: This day, will We seal their mouths, and their hands will speak to Us, and their feet will bear witness as to what they earned.
data.arabic: ٱلْيَوْمَ نَخْتِمُ عَلَىٰٓ أَفْوَٰهِهِمْ وَتُكَلِّمُنَآ أَيْدِيهِمْ وَتَشْهَدُ أَرْجُلُهُم بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَكْسِبُونَ

data.english: And had We willed, We would have blinded their eyes; then would they compete for the path, but how would they see?
data.arabic: وَلَوْ نَشَآءُ لَطَمَسْنَا عَلَىٰٓ أَعْيُنِهِمْ فَٱسْتَبَقُوا۟ ٱلصِّرَٰطَ فَأَنَّىٰ يُبْصِرُونَ

data.english: And had We willed, We would have so transformed them in their places, they could neither proceed nor return.
data.arabic: وَلَوْ نَشَآءُ لَمَسَخْنَـٰهُمْ عَلَىٰ مَكَانَتِهِمْ فَمَا ٱسْتَطَـٰعُوا۟ مُضِيًّا وَلَا يَرْجِعُونَ

data.english: And to whom We give long life, We reverse him in creation. Will you then not use reason!
data.arabic: وَمَن نُّعَمِّرْهُ نُنَكِّسْهُ فِى ٱلْخَلْقِ أَفَلَا يَعْقِلُونَ

data.english: And We taught him not poetry, and it does not behove him; it is only a remembrance and a clear recitation
data.arabic: وَمَا عَلَّمْنَـٰهُ ٱلشِّعْرَ وَمَا يَنۢبَغِى لَهُۥٓ إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكْرٌ وَقُرْءَانٌ مُّبِينٌ

data.english: To warn whoso is alive, and that the word might become binding against the false claimers of guidance.
data.arabic: لِّيُنذِرَ مَن كَانَ حَيًّا وَيَحِقَّ ٱلْقَوْلُ عَلَى ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ

data.english: Have they not considered that We created cattle for them of what Our hands made, then are they their masters?
data.arabic: أَوَلَمْ يَرَوْا۟ أَنَّا خَلَقْنَا لَهُم مِّمَّا عَمِلَتْ أَيْدِينَآ أَنْعَـٰمًا فَهُمْ لَهَا مَـٰلِكُونَ

data.english: And We subdued them to them, and some of them they ride, and some of them they eat;
data.arabic: وَذَلَّلْنَـٰهَا لَهُمْ فَمِنْهَا رَكُوبُهُمْ وَمِنْهَا يَأْكُلُونَ

data.english: And they have in them benefits and drinks. Will they then not be grateful?
data.arabic: وَلَهُمْ فِيهَا مَنَـٰفِعُ وَمَشَارِبُ أَفَلَا يَشْكُرُونَ

data.english: But they have taken gods other than God, that they might be helped.
data.arabic: وَٱتَّخَذُوا۟ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّـهِ ءَالِهَةً لَّعَلَّهُمْ يُنصَرُونَ

data.english: They cannot help them, and they are for them a force summoned.
data.arabic: لَا يَسْتَطِيعُونَ نَصْرَهُمْ وَهُمْ لَهُمْ جُندٌ مُّحْضَرُونَ

data.english: So let not their speech grieve thee; We know what they conceal and what they make known.
data.arabic: فَلَا يَحْزُنكَ قَوْلُهُمْ إِنَّا نَعْلَمُ مَا يُسِرُّونَ وَمَا يُعْلِنُونَ

data.english: Has man not considered that We created him from a sperm-drop? And then is he an open disputant.
data.arabic: أَوَلَمْ يَرَ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ أَنَّا خَلَقْنَـٰهُ مِن نُّطْفَةٍ فَإِذَا هُوَ خَصِيمٌ مُّبِينٌ

data.english: And he strikes for Us a similitude, and forgets his creation; he says: “Who will give life to the bones when they are rotted away?”
data.arabic: وَضَرَبَ لَنَا مَثَلًا وَنَسِىَ خَلْقَهُۥ قَالَ مَن يُحْىِ ٱلْعِظَـٰمَ وَهِىَ رَمِيمٌ

data.english: Say thou: “He will give them life who produced them the first time,” — and He knows all creation —
data.arabic: قُلْ يُحْيِيهَا ٱلَّذِىٓ أَنشَأَهَآ أَوَّلَ مَرَّةٍ وَهُوَ بِكُلِّ خَلْقٍ عَلِيمٌ

data.english: “Who made for you from the green tree fire, and then therefrom you kindle.”
data.arabic: ٱلَّذِى جَعَلَ لَكُم مِّنَ ٱلشَّجَرِ ٱلْأَخْضَرِ نَارًا فَإِذَآ أَنتُم مِّنْهُ تُوقِدُونَ

data.english: Is not He who created the heavens and the earth able to create the like of them? Verily; and He is the Knowing Creator.
data.arabic: أَوَلَيْسَ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ بِقَـٰدِرٍ عَلَىٰٓ أَن يَخْلُقَ مِثْلَهُم بَلَىٰ وَهُوَ ٱلْخَلَّـٰقُ ٱلْعَلِيمُ

data.english: His command, when He intends a thing, is that He says to it: “Be thou,” and it is.
data.arabic: إِنَّمَآ أَمْرُهُۥٓ إِذَآ أَرَادَ شَيْـًٔا أَن يَقُولَ لَهُۥ كُن فَيَكُونُ

data.english: So glory be to Him in whose hand is the dominion of all things! And to Him you will be returned.
data.arabic: فَسُبْحَـٰنَ ٱلَّذِى بِيَدِهِۦ مَلَكُوتُ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ وَإِلَيْهِ تُرْجَعُونَ

data.english: In the name of God, the Almighty, the Merciful.
data.arabic: بِسْمِ ٱللَّـهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ

data.english: By those lined up in rows,
data.arabic: وَٱلصَّـٰٓفَّـٰتِ صَفًّا

data.english: And those driving with force,
data.arabic: فَٱلزَّٰجِرَٰتِ زَجْرًا

data.english: And the reciters of a remembrance!
data.arabic: فَٱلتَّـٰلِيَـٰتِ ذِكْرًا

data.english: Your God is One:
data.arabic: إِنَّ إِلَـٰهَكُمْ لَوَٰحِدٌ

data.english: Lord of the Heavens and the Earth and what is between them, and the Lord of the Easts.
data.arabic: رَّبُّ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا وَرَبُّ ٱلْمَشَـٰرِقِ

data.english: We have adorned the lower heaven with the adornment of the stars
data.arabic: إِنَّا زَيَّنَّا ٱلسَّمَآءَ ٱلدُّنْيَا بِزِينَةٍ ٱلْكَوَاكِبِ

data.english: And as protection against every refractory satan.
data.arabic: وَحِفْظًا مِّن كُلِّ شَيْطَـٰنٍ مَّارِدٍ

data.english: They listen not to the exalted assembly, and they are pelted from every side,
data.arabic: لَّا يَسَّمَّعُونَ إِلَى ٱلْمَلَإِ ٱلْأَعْلَىٰ وَيُقْذَفُونَ مِن كُلِّ جَانِبٍ

data.english: Repelled — and they have a constant punishment —
data.arabic: دُحُورًا وَلَهُمْ عَذَابٌ وَاصِبٌ

data.english: Save he who snatches a fragment; and a piercing flame follows him.
data.arabic: إِلَّا مَنْ خَطِفَ ٱلْخَطْفَةَ فَأَتْبَعَهُۥ شِهَابٌ ثَاقِبٌ

data.english: So ask thou them: are they harder to create, or those We have created? We created them of clinging clay.
data.arabic: فَٱسْتَفْتِهِمْ أَهُمْ أَشَدُّ خَلْقًا أَم مَّنْ خَلَقْنَآ إِنَّا خَلَقْنَـٰهُم مِّن طِينٍ لَّازِبٍۭ

data.english: Yet thou dost marvel; and they deride
data.arabic: بَلْ عَجِبْتَ وَيَسْخَرُونَ

data.english: And, when they are reminded, bear not in mind
data.arabic: وَإِذَا ذُكِّرُوا۟ لَا يَذْكُرُونَ

data.english: And, when they see a proof, turn in derision.
data.arabic: وَإِذَا رَأَوْا۟ ءَايَةً يَسْتَسْخِرُونَ

data.english: And they say: “This is only obvious sorcery.
data.arabic: وَقَالُوٓا۟ إِنْ هَـٰذَآ إِلَّا سِحْرٌ مُّبِينٌ

data.english: “When we are dead and are dust and bones, will we be raised?
data.arabic: أَءِذَا مِتْنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابًا وَعِظَـٰمًا أَءِنَّا لَمَبْعُوثُونَ

data.english: “And will our forefathers?”
data.arabic: أَوَءَابَآؤُنَا ٱلْأَوَّلُونَ

data.english: Say thou: “Yea, and you will be abased.”
data.arabic: قُلْ نَعَمْ وَأَنتُمْ دَٰخِرُونَ

data.english: Then will it be but one cry — and then will they be looking on —
data.arabic: فَإِنَّمَا هِىَ زَجْرَةٌ وَٰحِدَةٌ فَإِذَا هُمْ يَنظُرُونَ

data.english: And they will say: “Woe is us! This is the Day of Judgment.”
data.arabic: وَقَالُوا۟ يَـٰوَيْلَنَا هَـٰذَا يَوْمُ ٱلدِّينِ

data.english: “This is the Day of Decision which you denied!
data.arabic: هَـٰذَا يَوْمُ ٱلْفَصْلِ ٱلَّذِى كُنتُم بِهِۦ تُكَذِّبُونَ

data.english: “Gather those who did wrong, and their wives, and what they served
data.arabic: ٱحْشُرُوا۟ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا۟ وَأَزْوَٰجَهُمْ وَمَا كَانُوا۟ يَعْبُدُونَ

data.english: “Instead of God, and guide them to the path of Hell!
data.arabic: مِن دُونِ ٱللَّـهِ فَٱهْدُوهُمْ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطِ ٱلْجَحِيمِ

data.english: “But stop them — they are to be questioned:
data.arabic: وَقِفُوهُمْ إِنَّهُم مَّسْـُٔولُونَ

data.english: “What ails you that you help not one another?”
data.arabic: مَا لَكُمْ لَا تَنَاصَرُونَ

data.english: The truth is they, this day, are in submission!
data.arabic: بَلْ هُمُ ٱلْيَوْمَ مُسْتَسْلِمُونَ

data.english: And they will draw near to one another, asking one of another,
data.arabic: وَأَقْبَلَ بَعْضُهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ يَتَسَآءَلُونَ

data.english: They will say: “You came to us from the right hand[...].”
data.arabic: قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّكُمْ كُنتُمْ تَأْتُونَنَا عَنِ ٱلْيَمِينِ

data.english: Those will say: “Nay, you were not believers,
data.arabic: قَالُوا۟ بَل لَّمْ تَكُونُوا۟ مُؤْمِنِينَ

data.english: “And we had over you no authority. The truth is, you were people transgressing all bounds,
data.arabic: وَمَا كَانَ لَنَا عَلَيْكُم مِّن سُلْطَـٰنٍۭ بَلْ كُنتُمْ قَوْمًا طَـٰغِينَ

data.english: “So the word of our Lord has become binding upon us: We are to taste[...].
data.arabic: فَحَقَّ عَلَيْنَا قَوْلُ رَبِّنَآ إِنَّا لَذَآئِقُونَ

data.english: “And we caused you to err — we were those who err.”
data.arabic: فَأَغْوَيْنَـٰكُمْ إِنَّا كُنَّا غَـٰوِينَ

data.english: And they, that day, are sharers in the punishment.
data.arabic: فَإِنَّهُمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ فِى ٱلْعَذَابِ مُشْتَرِكُونَ

data.english: Thus do We with the lawbreakers.
data.arabic: إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَفْعَلُ بِٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ

data.english: They — when it was said to them: “There is no god save God,” — waxed proud,
data.arabic: إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوٓا۟ إِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمْ لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا ٱللَّـهُ يَسْتَكْبِرُونَ

data.english: (And they said: “Are we to leave our gods for a possessed poet?”
data.arabic: وَيَقُولُونَ أَئِنَّا لَتَارِكُوٓا۟ ءَالِهَتِنَا لِشَاعِرٍ مَّجْنُونٍۭ

data.english: The truth is, he brought the truth and confirmed the emissaries:
data.arabic: بَلْ جَآءَ بِٱلْحَقِّ وَصَدَّقَ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ

data.english: “You are to taste the painful punishment
data.arabic: إِنَّكُمْ لَذَآئِقُوا۟ ٱلْعَذَابِ ٱلْأَلِيمِ

data.english: “And you will be rewarded only for what you did.”)
data.arabic: وَمَا تُجْزَوْنَ إِلَّا مَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ

data.english: Save the sincere servants of God.
data.arabic: إِلَّا عِبَادَ ٱللَّـهِ ٱلْمُخْلَصِينَ

data.english: Those will have a known provision:
data.arabic: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ لَهُمْ رِزْقٌ مَّعْلُومٌ

data.english: Fruits[...]. And they will be honoured;
data.arabic: فَوَٰكِهُ وَهُم مُّكْرَمُونَ

data.english: In the Gardens of Bliss
data.arabic: فِى جَنَّـٰتِ ٱلنَّعِيمِ

data.english: Upon couches, facing one another,
data.arabic: عَلَىٰ سُرُرٍ مُّتَقَـٰبِلِينَ

data.english: Circulated among them will be a cup from a running spring,
data.arabic: يُطَافُ عَلَيْهِم بِكَأْسٍ مِّن مَّعِينٍۭ

data.english: White, delightful to the drinkers,
data.arabic: بَيْضَآءَ لَذَّةٍ لِّلشَّـٰرِبِينَ

data.english: Wherein is no sickness, nor are they intoxicated thereby,
data.arabic: لَا فِيهَا غَوْلٌ وَلَا هُمْ عَنْهَا يُنزَفُونَ

data.english: And with them maidens of modest-eyed gaze,
data.arabic: وَعِندَهُمْ قَـٰصِرَٰتُ ٱلطَّرْفِ عِينٌ

data.english: As if they were eggs closely guarded.
data.arabic: كَأَنَّهُنَّ بَيْضٌ مَّكْنُونٌ

data.english: And they will draw near to one another, asking one of another:
data.arabic: فَأَقْبَلَ بَعْضُهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ يَتَسَآءَلُونَ

data.english: (A speaker among them will say: “I had a companion,
data.arabic: قَالَ قَآئِلٌ مِّنْهُمْ إِنِّى كَانَ لِى قَرِينٌ

data.english: “Said he: ‘Art thou in truth of those who give credence:
data.arabic: يَقُولُ أَءِنَّكَ لَمِنَ ٱلْمُصَدِّقِينَ

data.english: “‘When we are dead and dust and bones, will we be held to account?’”
data.arabic: أَءِذَا مِتْنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابًا وَعِظَـٰمًا أَءِنَّا لَمَدِينُونَ

data.english: He will say: “Will you look?”
data.arabic: قَالَ هَلْ أَنتُم مُّطَّلِعُونَ

data.english: Then will he look and see him in the midst of Hell.
data.arabic: فَٱطَّلَعَ فَرَءَاهُ فِى سَوَآءِ ٱلْجَحِيمِ

data.english: He will say: “By God, thou hadst almost brought me to ruin!
data.arabic: قَالَ تَٱللَّـهِ إِن كِدتَّ لَتُرْدِينِ

data.english: “And were it not for the favour of my Lord, I would have been among those summoned.”)
data.arabic: وَلَوْلَا نِعْمَةُ رَبِّى لَكُنتُ مِنَ ٱلْمُحْضَرِينَ

data.english: “Are we then not to die,
data.arabic: أَفَمَا نَحْنُ بِمَيِّتِينَ

data.english: “Save our former death, and are not to be punished?”
data.arabic: إِلَّا مَوْتَتَنَا ٱلْأُولَىٰ وَمَا نَحْنُ بِمُعَذَّبِينَ

data.english: That is the Great Achievement!
data.arabic: إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَهُوَ ٱلْفَوْزُ ٱلْعَظِيمُ

data.english: For the like of this let the workers work!
data.arabic: لِمِثْلِ هَـٰذَا فَلْيَعْمَلِ ٱلْعَـٰمِلُونَ

data.english: Is that better as a welcome, or the Tree of Zaqqūm?
data.arabic: أَذَٰلِكَ خَيْرٌ نُّزُلًا أَمْ شَجَرَةُ ٱلزَّقُّومِ

data.english: We have made it a means of denial for the wrongdoers.
data.arabic: إِنَّا جَعَلْنَـٰهَا فِتْنَةً لِّلظَّـٰلِمِينَ

data.english: It is a tree that comes forth in the root of Hell,
data.arabic: إِنَّهَا شَجَرَةٌ تَخْرُجُ فِىٓ أَصْلِ ٱلْجَحِيمِ

data.english: Its spathes are as the heads of satans,
data.arabic: طَلْعُهَا كَأَنَّهُۥ رُءُوسُ ٱلشَّيَـٰطِينِ

data.english: They will eat thereof, and fill thereof their bellies;
data.arabic: فَإِنَّهُمْ لَـَٔاكِلُونَ مِنْهَا فَمَالِـُٔونَ مِنْهَا ٱلْبُطُونَ

data.english: Then on top of it will they have a mixture of scalding water;
data.arabic: ثُمَّ إِنَّ لَهُمْ عَلَيْهَا لَشَوْبًا مِّنْ حَمِيمٍ

data.english: Then will their return be to Hell.
data.arabic: ثُمَّ إِنَّ مَرْجِعَهُمْ لَإِلَى ٱلْجَحِيمِ

data.english: They found their fathers astray,
data.arabic: إِنَّهُمْ أَلْفَوْا۟ ءَابَآءَهُمْ ضَآلِّينَ

data.english: And in their footsteps are they hastening.
data.arabic: فَهُمْ عَلَىٰٓ ءَاثَـٰرِهِمْ يُهْرَعُونَ

data.english: And most of the former peoples had gone astray before them,
data.arabic: وَلَقَدْ ضَلَّ قَبْلَهُمْ أَكْثَرُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ

data.english: And We had sent among them warners.
data.arabic: وَلَقَدْ أَرْسَلْنَا فِيهِم مُّنذِرِينَ

data.english: So see thou how was the final outcome of those who were warned,
data.arabic: فَٱنظُرْ كَيْفَ كَانَ عَـٰقِبَةُ ٱلْمُنذَرِينَ

data.english: Save the sincere servants of God.
data.arabic: إِلَّا عِبَادَ ٱللَّـهِ ٱلْمُخْلَصِينَ

data.english: And Noah called to Us — and how excellent were the responders!
data.arabic: وَلَقَدْ نَادَىٰنَا نُوحٌ فَلَنِعْمَ ٱلْمُجِيبُونَ

data.english: And We delivered him and his household from the great distress,
data.arabic: وَنَجَّيْنَـٰهُ وَأَهْلَهُۥ مِنَ ٱلْكَرْبِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ

data.english: And We made his progeny those remaining.
data.arabic: وَجَعَلْنَا ذُرِّيَّتَهُۥ هُمُ ٱلْبَاقِينَ

data.english: And We left for him among those who came later:
data.arabic: وَتَرَكْنَا عَلَيْهِ فِى ٱلْـَٔاخِرِينَ

data.english: “Peace be upon Noah among all mankind!”
data.arabic: سَلَـٰمٌ عَلَىٰ نُوحٍ فِى ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ

data.english: Thus reward We the doers of good;
data.arabic: إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِى ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ

data.english: He was among Our believing servants.
data.arabic: إِنَّهُۥ مِنْ عِبَادِنَا ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ

data.english: Then drowned We the others.
data.arabic: ثُمَّ أَغْرَقْنَا ٱلْـَٔاخَرِينَ

data.english: And of his kind was Abraham,
data.arabic: وَإِنَّ مِن شِيعَتِهِۦ لَإِبْرَٰهِيمَ

data.english: When he came to his Lord with a pure heart,
data.arabic: إِذْ جَآءَ رَبَّهُۥ بِقَلْبٍ سَلِيمٍ

data.english: When he said to his father and his people: “What do you serve?
data.arabic: إِذْ قَالَ لِأَبِيهِ وَقَوْمِهِۦ مَاذَا تَعْبُدُونَ

data.english: “Is it falsehood — gods besides God — you desire?
data.arabic: أَئِفْكًا ءَالِهَةً دُونَ ٱللَّـهِ تُرِيدُونَ

data.english: “So what is your thought about the Lord of All Creation?”
data.arabic: فَمَا ظَنُّكُم بِرَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ

data.english: (And he cast a look at the stars,
data.arabic: فَنَظَرَ نَظْرَةً فِى ٱلنُّجُومِ

data.english: And said: “I am sick.”)
data.arabic: فَقَالَ إِنِّى سَقِيمٌ

data.english: Then they turned away from him, and left.
data.arabic: فَتَوَلَّوْا۟ عَنْهُ مُدْبِرِينَ

data.english: Then he turned aside to their gods, and said: “Do you not eat?
data.arabic: فَرَاغَ إِلَىٰٓ ءَالِهَتِهِمْ فَقَالَ أَلَا تَأْكُلُونَ

data.english: “What ails you, that you speak not?”
data.arabic: مَا لَكُمْ لَا تَنطِقُونَ

data.english: And he turned upon them, striking with his right hand.
data.arabic: فَرَاغَ عَلَيْهِمْ ضَرْبًۢا بِٱلْيَمِينِ

data.english: Then came they towards him in haste.
data.arabic: فَأَقْبَلُوٓا۟ إِلَيْهِ يَزِفُّونَ

data.english: He said: “Serve you what you hew
data.arabic: قَالَ أَتَعْبُدُونَ مَا تَنْحِتُونَ

data.english: “When God created you and what you make?”
data.arabic: وَٱللَّـهُ خَلَقَكُمْ وَمَا تَعْمَلُونَ

data.english: They said: “Build for him a structure, and cast him into the blazing fire!”
data.arabic: قَالُوا۟ ٱبْنُوا۟ لَهُۥ بُنْيَـٰنًا فَأَلْقُوهُ فِى ٱلْجَحِيمِ

data.english: And they intended for him a plan; but We made them the lowest.
data.arabic: فَأَرَادُوا۟ بِهِۦ كَيْدًا فَجَعَلْنَـٰهُمُ ٱلْأَسْفَلِينَ

data.english: And he said: “I am going to my Lord; He will guide me.”
data.arabic: وَقَالَ إِنِّى ذَاهِبٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّى سَيَهْدِينِ

data.english: “My Lord: give Thou me from among the righteous.”
data.arabic: رَبِّ هَبْ لِى مِنَ ٱلصَّـٰلِحِينَ

data.english: So We gave him glad tidings of a clement lad;
data.arabic: فَبَشَّرْنَـٰهُ بِغُلَـٰمٍ حَلِيمٍ

data.english: And when he reached the age of working with him, he said: “O my son: I saw in a dream, that I was sacrificing thee. So look thou — what seest thou?” He said: “O my father: do thou what thou art commanded; thou wilt find me, if God wills, of the patient.”
data.arabic: فَلَمَّا بَلَغَ مَعَهُ ٱلسَّعْىَ قَالَ يَـٰبُنَىَّ إِنِّىٓ أَرَىٰ فِى ٱلْمَنَامِ أَنِّىٓ أَذْبَحُكَ فَٱنظُرْ مَاذَا تَرَىٰ قَالَ يَـٰٓأَبَتِ ٱفْعَلْ مَا تُؤْمَرُ سَتَجِدُنِىٓ إِن شَآءَ ٱللَّـهُ مِنَ ٱلصَّـٰبِرِينَ

data.english: And when they had submitted, and he had thrown him down upon his brow,
data.arabic: فَلَمَّآ أَسْلَمَا وَتَلَّهُۥ لِلْجَبِينِ

data.english: We called to him: “O Abraham:
data.arabic: وَنَـٰدَيْنَـٰهُ أَن يَـٰٓإِبْرَٰهِيمُ

data.english: “Thou hast confirmed the vision!” Thus reward We the doers of good;
data.arabic: قَدْ صَدَّقْتَ ٱلرُّءْيَآ إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِى ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ

data.english: This was the clear trial.
data.arabic: إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَهُوَ ٱلْبَلَـٰٓؤُا۟ ٱلْمُبِينُ

data.english: And We ransomed him with a great sacrifice,
data.arabic: وَفَدَيْنَـٰهُ بِذِبْحٍ عَظِيمٍ

data.english: And We left for him among those who came later:
data.arabic: وَتَرَكْنَا عَلَيْهِ فِى ٱلْـَٔاخِرِينَ

data.english: “Peace be upon Abraham!”
data.arabic: سَلَـٰمٌ عَلَىٰٓ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ

data.english: Thus reward We the doers of good;
data.arabic: كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِى ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ

data.english: He was among Our believing servants.
data.arabic: إِنَّهُۥ مِنْ عِبَادِنَا ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ

data.english: And We gave him glad tidings of Isaac, a prophet among the righteous.
data.arabic: وَبَشَّرْنَـٰهُ بِإِسْحَـٰقَ نَبِيًّا مِّنَ ٱلصَّـٰلِحِينَ

data.english: And We blessed him, and Isaac; and among their progeny is the doer of good and the manifest doer of wrong to himself.
data.arabic: وَبَـٰرَكْنَا عَلَيْهِ وَعَلَىٰٓ إِسْحَـٰقَ وَمِن ذُرِّيَّتِهِمَا مُحْسِنٌ وَظَالِمٌ لِّنَفْسِهِۦ مُبِينٌ

data.english: And We bestowed favour upon Moses and Aaron,
data.arabic: وَلَقَدْ مَنَنَّا عَلَىٰ مُوسَىٰ وَهَـٰرُونَ

data.english: And delivered them and their people from the great distress,
data.arabic: وَنَجَّيْنَـٰهُمَا وَقَوْمَهُمَا مِنَ ٱلْكَرْبِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ

data.english: And We helped them, so they were the victors.
data.arabic: وَنَصَرْنَـٰهُمْ فَكَانُوا۟ هُمُ ٱلْغَـٰلِبِينَ

data.english: And We gave them the Clarifying Writ,
data.arabic: وَءَاتَيْنَـٰهُمَا ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ ٱلْمُسْتَبِينَ

data.english: And We guided them to the straight path.
data.arabic: وَهَدَيْنَـٰهُمَا ٱلصِّرَٰطَ ٱلْمُسْتَقِيمَ

data.english: And We left for them among those who came later:
data.arabic: وَتَرَكْنَا عَلَيْهِمَا فِى ٱلْـَٔاخِرِينَ

data.english: “Peace be upon Moses and Aaron!”
data.arabic: سَلَـٰمٌ عَلَىٰ مُوسَىٰ وَهَـٰرُونَ

data.english: Thus reward We the doers of good;
data.arabic: إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِى ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ

data.english: They were among Our believing servants.
data.arabic: إِنَّهُمَا مِنْ عِبَادِنَا ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ

data.english: And Elijah was among the emissaries,
data.arabic: وَإِنَّ إِلْيَاسَ لَمِنَ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ

data.english: When he said to his people: “Will you not be in prudent fear?
data.arabic: إِذْ قَالَ لِقَوْمِهِۦٓ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ

data.english: “Will you call to Baal and leave the best of creators:
data.arabic: أَتَدْعُونَ بَعْلًا وَتَذَرُونَ أَحْسَنَ ٱلْخَـٰلِقِينَ

data.english: “God, your Lord, and the Lord of your fathers of old?”
data.arabic: ٱللَّـهَ رَبَّكُمْ وَرَبَّ ءَابَآئِكُمُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ

data.english: But they denied him; then are they those summoned,
data.arabic: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَإِنَّهُمْ لَمُحْضَرُونَ

data.english: Save the sincere servants of God.
data.arabic: إِلَّا عِبَادَ ٱللَّـهِ ٱلْمُخْلَصِينَ

data.english: And We left for him among those who came later:
data.arabic: وَتَرَكْنَا عَلَيْهِ فِى ٱلْـَٔاخِرِينَ

data.english: “Peace be upon Ilyāsīn!”
data.arabic: سَلَـٰمٌ عَلَىٰٓ إِلْ يَاسِينَ

data.english: Thus reward We the doers of good;
data.arabic: إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِى ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ

data.english: He was among Our believing servants.
data.arabic: إِنَّهُۥ مِنْ عِبَادِنَا ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ

data.english: And Lot was among the emissaries,
data.arabic: وَإِنَّ لُوطًا لَّمِنَ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ

data.english: When We delivered him and his household all together,
data.arabic: إِذْ نَجَّيْنَـٰهُ وَأَهْلَهُۥٓ أَجْمَعِينَ

data.english: Save an old woman among those who stayed behind;
data.arabic: إِلَّا عَجُوزًا فِى ٱلْغَـٰبِرِينَ

data.english: Then destroyed We the others.
data.arabic: ثُمَّ دَمَّرْنَا ٱلْـَٔاخَرِينَ

data.english: And you pass by them in the morning
data.arabic: وَإِنَّكُمْ لَتَمُرُّونَ عَلَيْهِم مُّصْبِحِينَ

data.english: And at night. Will you then not use reason!
data.arabic: وَبِٱلَّيْلِ أَفَلَا تَعْقِلُونَ

data.english: And Jonah was among the emissaries,
data.arabic: وَإِنَّ يُونُسَ لَمِنَ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ

data.english: When he fled to the laden ship,
data.arabic: إِذْ أَبَقَ إِلَى ٱلْفُلْكِ ٱلْمَشْحُونِ

data.english: Then he cast lots, and was among those refuted.
data.arabic: فَسَاهَمَ فَكَانَ مِنَ ٱلْمُدْحَضِينَ

data.english: Then the fish swallowed him, when he was blameworthy.
data.arabic: فَٱلْتَقَمَهُ ٱلْحُوتُ وَهُوَ مُلِيمٌ

data.english: And were he not among the givers of glory,
data.arabic: فَلَوْلَآ أَنَّهُۥ كَانَ مِنَ ٱلْمُسَبِّحِينَ

data.english: He would have tarried in its belly until the day they are raised.
data.arabic: لَلَبِثَ فِى بَطْنِهِۦٓ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ يُبْعَثُونَ

data.english: But We cast him on the bare shore when he was sick,
data.arabic: فَنَبَذْنَـٰهُ بِٱلْعَرَآءِ وَهُوَ سَقِيمٌ

data.english: And We caused to grow over him a tree of gourd;
data.arabic: وَأَنۢبَتْنَا عَلَيْهِ شَجَرَةً مِّن يَقْطِينٍ

data.english: And We sent him to a hundred thousand or more;
data.arabic: وَأَرْسَلْنَـٰهُ إِلَىٰ مِا۟ئَةِ أَلْفٍ أَوْ يَزِيدُونَ

data.english: And they believed, so We gave them enjoyment for a time.
data.arabic: فَـَٔامَنُوا۟ فَمَتَّعْنَـٰهُمْ إِلَىٰ حِينٍ

data.english: And ask thou them: has thy Lord daughters and they sons?
data.arabic: فَٱسْتَفْتِهِمْ أَلِرَبِّكَ ٱلْبَنَاتُ وَلَهُمُ ٱلْبَنُونَ

data.english: If We created the angels females, while they were witnesses:
data.arabic: أَمْ خَلَقْنَا ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةَ إِنَـٰثًا وَهُمْ شَـٰهِدُونَ

data.english: (In truth, it is of their falsehood that they say:
data.arabic: أَلَآ إِنَّهُم مِّنْ إِفْكِهِمْ لَيَقُولُونَ

data.english: “God has begotten,” and they are liars.)
data.arabic: وَلَدَ ٱللَّـهُ وَإِنَّهُمْ لَكَـٰذِبُونَ

data.english: Chose He daughters over sons?
data.arabic: أَصْطَفَى ٱلْبَنَاتِ عَلَى ٱلْبَنِينَ

data.english: What ails you? How judge you?
data.arabic: مَا لَكُمْ كَيْفَ تَحْكُمُونَ

data.english: Will you then not take heed!
data.arabic: أَفَلَا تَذَكَّرُونَ

data.english: If you have a clear authority,
data.arabic: أَمْ لَكُمْ سُلْطَـٰنٌ مُّبِينٌ

data.english: Then bring your writ, if you be truthful.
data.arabic: فَأْتُوا۟ بِكِتَـٰبِكُمْ إِن كُنتُمْ صَـٰدِقِينَ

data.english: And they have made between Him and the jinnaa kinship — when the jinna know they will be summoned —
data.arabic: وَجَعَلُوا۟ بَيْنَهُۥ وَبَيْنَ ٱلْجِنَّةِ نَسَبًا وَلَقَدْ عَلِمَتِ ٱلْجِنَّةُ إِنَّهُمْ لَمُحْضَرُونَ

data.english: (Glory be to God above what they describe!)
data.arabic: سُبْحَـٰنَ ٱللَّـهِ عَمَّا يَصِفُونَ

data.english: Save the sincere servants of God.
data.arabic: إِلَّا عِبَادَ ٱللَّـهِ ٱلْمُخْلَصِينَ

data.english: And you, and what you serve,
data.arabic: فَإِنَّكُمْ وَمَا تَعْبُدُونَ

data.english: You will not tempt against Him
data.arabic: مَآ أَنتُمْ عَلَيْهِ بِفَـٰتِنِينَ

data.english: Save him who is to burn in Hell.
data.arabic: إِلَّا مَنْ هُوَ صَالِ ٱلْجَحِيمِ

data.english: “And there is none among us save has an appointed station;
data.arabic: وَمَا مِنَّآ إِلَّا لَهُۥ مَقَامٌ مَّعْلُومٌ

data.english: “And we are those lined up;
data.arabic: وَإِنَّا لَنَحْنُ ٱلصَّآفُّونَ

data.english: “And we are the givers of glory.”
data.arabic: وَإِنَّا لَنَحْنُ ٱلْمُسَبِّحُونَ

data.english: And they say:
data.arabic: وَإِن كَانُوا۟ لَيَقُولُونَ

data.english: “Were we to have had a remembrance from the former peoples
data.arabic: لَوْ أَنَّ عِندَنَا ذِكْرًا مِّنَ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ

data.english: “We would have been the sincere servants of God!”
data.arabic: لَكُنَّا عِبَادَ ٱللَّـهِ ٱلْمُخْلَصِينَ

data.english: But they denied it; and they will come to know!
data.arabic: فَكَفَرُوا۟ بِهِۦ فَسَوْفَ يَعْلَمُونَ

data.english: And Our word has gone forth to Our servants, the emissaries:
data.arabic: وَلَقَدْ سَبَقَتْ كَلِمَتُنَا لِعِبَادِنَا ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ

data.english: They — they — will be those helped.
data.arabic: إِنَّهُمْ لَهُمُ ٱلْمَنصُورُونَ

data.english: And Our host — they will be the victors.
data.arabic: وَإِنَّ جُندَنَا لَهُمُ ٱلْغَـٰلِبُونَ

data.english: So turn thou from them for a time.
data.arabic: فَتَوَلَّ عَنْهُمْ حَتَّىٰ حِينٍ

data.english: And see thou them; for they will come to see!
data.arabic: وَأَبْصِرْهُمْ فَسَوْفَ يُبْصِرُونَ

data.english: Then is it Our punishment they wish to hasten?
data.arabic: أَفَبِعَذَابِنَا يَسْتَعْجِلُونَ

data.english: And when it descends in their courtyard, then evil is the morning of those who were warned!
data.arabic: فَإِذَا نَزَلَ بِسَاحَتِهِمْ فَسَآءَ صَبَاحُ ٱلْمُنذَرِينَ

data.english: And turn thou from them for a time.
data.arabic: وَتَوَلَّ عَنْهُمْ حَتَّىٰ حِينٍ

data.english: And see thou; for they will come to see!
data.arabic: وَأَبْصِرْ فَسَوْفَ يُبْصِرُونَ

data.english: Glory be to thy Lord, the Lord of Power and Glory, above what they describe!
data.arabic: سُبْحَـٰنَ رَبِّكَ رَبِّ ٱلْعِزَّةِ عَمَّا يَصِفُونَ

data.english: And peace be upon the emissaries!
data.arabic: وَسَلَـٰمٌ عَلَى ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ

data.english: And praise belongs to God, the Lord of All Creation!
data.arabic: وَٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّـهِ رَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ

data.english: In the name of God, the Almighty, the Merciful.
data.arabic: بِسْمِ ٱللَّـهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ

data.english: ṣād By the Qur’an full of remembrance!
data.arabic: صٓ وَٱلْقُرْءَانِ ذِى ٱلذِّكْرِ

data.english: The truth is, those who ignore warning are in pride and dissension.
data.arabic: بَلِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ فِى عِزَّةٍ وَشِقَاقٍ

data.english: (How many a generation We destroyed before them! And they cried out when there was no time to escape.)
data.arabic: كَمْ أَهْلَكْنَا مِن قَبْلِهِم مِّن قَرْنٍ فَنَادَوا۟ وَّلَاتَ حِينَ مَنَاصٍ

data.english: And they marvel that a warner has come to them from among them; and the false claimers of guidance say: “This is a sorcerer and a liar.
data.arabic: وَعَجِبُوٓا۟ أَن جَآءَهُم مُّنذِرٌ مِّنْهُمْ وَقَالَ ٱلْكَـٰفِرُونَ هَـٰذَا سَـٰحِرٌ كَذَّابٌ

data.english: “Has he made the gods One God? This is an amazing thing.”
data.arabic: أَجَعَلَ ٱلْـَٔالِهَةَ إِلَـٰهًا وَٰحِدًا إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَشَىْءٌ عُجَابٌ

data.english: And the eminent ones among them went forth: “Go and be steadfast to your gods — this is a thing desired.
data.arabic: وَٱنطَلَقَ ٱلْمَلَأُ مِنْهُمْ أَنِ ٱمْشُوا۟ وَٱصْبِرُوا۟ عَلَىٰٓ ءَالِهَتِكُمْ إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَشَىْءٌ يُرَادُ

data.english: “We heard not of this in the latter creed; this is only a fabrication.
data.arabic: مَا سَمِعْنَا بِهَـٰذَا فِى ٱلْمِلَّةِ ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ إِنْ هَـٰذَآ إِلَّا ٱخْتِلَـٰقٌ

data.english: “Is it that the remembrance was sent down upon him from among us?” The truth is, they are in doubt about My remembrance; the truth is, they have not tasted My punishment!
data.arabic: أَءُنزِلَ عَلَيْهِ ٱلذِّكْرُ مِنۢ بَيْنِنَا بَلْ هُمْ فِى شَكٍّۢ مِّن ذِكْرِى بَل لَّمَّا يَذُوقُوا۟ عَذَابِ

data.english: If they have the treasuries of the mercy of thy Lord, the Exalted in Might, the Bestower: —
data.arabic: أَمْ عِندَهُمْ خَزَآئِنُ رَحْمَةِ رَبِّكَ ٱلْعَزِيزِ ٱلْوَهَّابِ

data.english: Or if they have the dominion of the heavens and the earth and what is between them: — then let them ascend into the causes!
data.arabic: أَمْ لَهُم مُّلْكُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا فَلْيَرْتَقُوا۟ فِى ٱلْأَسْبَـٰبِ

data.english: Some force is thereupon defeated among the parties.
data.arabic: جُندٌ مَّا هُنَالِكَ مَهْزُومٌ مِّنَ ٱلْأَحْزَابِ

data.english: The people of Noah denied before them, and ʿĀd, and Pharaoh, the Lord of Stakes,
data.arabic: كَذَّبَتْ قَبْلَهُمْ قَوْمُ نُوحٍ وَعَادٌ وَفِرْعَوْنُ ذُو ٱلْأَوْتَادِ

data.english: And Thamūd, and the people of Lot, and the companions of the woods — those were the parties —
data.arabic: وَثَمُودُ وَقَوْمُ لُوطٍ وَأَصْحَـٰبُ لْـَٔيْكَةِ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلْأَحْزَابُ

data.english: Each only denied the messengers, so My retribution became binding.
data.arabic: إِن كُلٌّ إِلَّا كَذَّبَ ٱلرُّسُلَ فَحَقَّ عِقَابِ

data.english: And these look only for one Blast; it has no delay.
data.arabic: وَمَا يَنظُرُ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ إِلَّا صَيْحَةً وَٰحِدَةً مَّا لَهَا مِن فَوَاقٍ

data.english: And they say: “Our Lord: hasten Thou for us our lot before the Day of Reckoning!”
data.arabic: وَقَالُوا۟ رَبَّنَا عَجِّل لَّنَا قِطَّنَا قَبْلَ يَوْمِ ٱلْحِسَابِ

data.english: Be thou patient over what they say. And remember thou Our servant David, the possessor of strength: he was one turning in repentance.
data.arabic: ٱصْبِرْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَٱذْكُرْ عَبْدَنَا دَاوُۥدَ ذَا ٱلْأَيْدِ إِنَّهُۥٓ أَوَّابٌ

data.english: We made subject the mountains with him giving glory at evening and sunrise,
data.arabic: إِنَّا سَخَّرْنَا ٱلْجِبَالَ مَعَهُۥ يُسَبِّحْنَ بِٱلْعَشِىِّ وَٱلْإِشْرَاقِ

data.english: And the birds assembled, all turning in repentance to Him.
data.arabic: وَٱلطَّيْرَ مَحْشُورَةً كُلٌّ لَّهُۥٓ أَوَّابٌ

data.english: And We strengthened his dominion, and gave him wisdom and discernment of speech.
data.arabic: وَشَدَدْنَا مُلْكَهُۥ وَءَاتَيْنَـٰهُ ٱلْحِكْمَةَ وَفَصْلَ ٱلْخِطَابِ

data.english: And has the report of the litigant come to thee: — when they scaled the wall of the chamber?
data.arabic: وَهَلْ أَتَىٰكَ نَبَؤُا۟ ٱلْخَصْمِ إِذْ تَسَوَّرُوا۟ ٱلْمِحْرَابَ

data.english: When they entered upon David, and he was in terror of them, they said: “Fear thou not — two litigants, one of whom has oppressed the other. So judge thou between us with justice, and transgress thou not; and guide thou us to the right way.
data.arabic: إِذْ دَخَلُوا۟ عَلَىٰ دَاوُۥدَ فَفَزِعَ مِنْهُمْ قَالُوا۟ لَا تَخَفْ خَصْمَانِ بَغَىٰ بَعْضُنَا عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ فَٱحْكُم بَيْنَنَا بِٱلْحَقِّ وَلَا تُشْطِطْ وَٱهْدِنَآ إِلَىٰ سَوَآءِ ٱلصِّرَٰطِ

data.english: “This, my brother, has ninety-nine ewes, and I have one ewe; so he said: ‘Place thou her in my charge’; and he overcame me in speech.”
data.arabic: إِنَّ هَـٰذَآ أَخِى لَهُۥ تِسْعٌ وَتِسْعُونَ نَعْجَةً وَلِىَ نَعْجَةٌ وَٰحِدَةٌ فَقَالَ أَكْفِلْنِيهَا وَعَزَّنِى فِى ٱلْخِطَابِ

data.english: Said he: “He has wronged thee in asking thy ewe for his ewes; and many among acquaintances oppress one another save those who heed warning and do righteous deeds — and few are they.” And David understood that We had but subjected him to means of denial; and he asked forgiveness of his Lord, and fell down humbly and repented.
data.arabic: قَالَ لَقَدْ ظَلَمَكَ بِسُؤَالِ نَعْجَتِكَ إِلَىٰ نِعَاجِهِۦ وَإِنَّ كَثِيرًا مِّنَ ٱلْخُلَطَآءِ لَيَبْغِى بَعْضُهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ وَقَلِيلٌ مَّا هُمْ وَظَنَّ دَاوُۥدُ أَنَّمَا فَتَنَّـٰهُ فَٱسْتَغْفَرَ رَبَّهُۥ وَخَرَّ رَاكِعًا وَأَنَابَ

data.english: So We forgave him that; and he has nearness to Us and a good journey’s end.
data.arabic: فَغَفَرْنَا لَهُۥ ذَٰلِكَ وَإِنَّ لَهُۥ عِندَنَا لَزُلْفَىٰ وَحُسْنَ مَـَٔابٍ

data.english: “O David: We have appointed thee a successor in the earth; so judge thou between men with justice; and follow thou not vain desire lest it cause thee to stray from the path of God.” Those who stray from the path of God will have a severe punishment because they forgot the Day of Reckoning.
data.arabic: يَـٰدَاوُۥدُ إِنَّا جَعَلْنَـٰكَ خَلِيفَةً فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ فَٱحْكُم بَيْنَ ٱلنَّاسِ بِٱلْحَقِّ وَلَا تَتَّبِعِ ٱلْهَوَىٰ فَيُضِلَّكَ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّـهِ إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يَضِلُّونَ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّـهِ لَهُمْ عَذَابٌ شَدِيدٌۢ بِمَا نَسُوا۟ يَوْمَ ٱلْحِسَابِ

data.english: And We created not the heaven and the earth and what is between them to no purpose. That is the assumption of those who ignore warning. And woe to those who ignore warning from the Fire!
data.arabic: وَمَا خَلَقْنَا ٱلسَّمَآءَ وَٱلْأَرْضَ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا بَـٰطِلًا ذَٰلِكَ ظَنُّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ فَوَيْلٌ لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِنَ ٱلنَّارِ

data.english: If We make those who heed warning and do righteous deeds like the workers of corruption in the land:[...]. — Or if We make those of prudent fear like the licentious:[...].
data.arabic: أَمْ نَجْعَلُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ كَٱلْمُفْسِدِينَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ أَمْ نَجْعَلُ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ كَٱلْفُجَّارِ

data.english: A Writ We have sent down to thee, one blessed, that they might consider its proofs with care, and that those of insight might take heed.
data.arabic: كِتَـٰبٌ أَنزَلْنَـٰهُ إِلَيْكَ مُبَـٰرَكٌ لِّيَدَّبَّرُوٓا۟ ءَايَـٰتِهِۦ وَلِيَتَذَكَّرَ أُو۟لُوا۟ ٱلْأَلْبَـٰبِ

data.english: And We gave David Solomon — how excellent a servant! He was one turning in repentance.
data.arabic: وَوَهَبْنَا لِدَاوُۥدَ سُلَيْمَـٰنَ نِعْمَ ٱلْعَبْدُ إِنَّهُۥٓ أَوَّابٌ

data.english: When there were presented to him in the evening standing steeds,
data.arabic: إِذْ عُرِضَ عَلَيْهِ بِٱلْعَشِىِّ ٱلصَّـٰفِنَـٰتُ ٱلْجِيَادُ

data.english: He said: “I have loved the love of good out of remembrance of my Lord!” — until it disappeared behind the partition: —
data.arabic: فَقَالَ إِنِّىٓ أَحْبَبْتُ حُبَّ ٱلْخَيْرِ عَن ذِكْرِ رَبِّى حَتَّىٰ تَوَارَتْ بِٱلْحِجَابِ

data.english: “Return them to me!” Then he began to rub down their legs and necks.
data.arabic: رُدُّوهَا عَلَىَّ فَطَفِقَ مَسْحًۢا بِٱلسُّوقِ وَٱلْأَعْنَاقِ

data.english: And We subjected Solomon to means of denial, and cast upon his throne a body; then did he repent.
data.arabic: وَلَقَدْ فَتَنَّا سُلَيْمَـٰنَ وَأَلْقَيْنَا عَلَىٰ كُرْسِيِّهِۦ جَسَدًا ثُمَّ أَنَابَ

data.english: He said: “My Lord: forgive Thou me, and give Thou me a dominion such as behoves no one after me; Thou art the Bestower!”
data.arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ ٱغْفِرْ لِى وَهَبْ لِى مُلْكًا لَّا يَنۢبَغِى لِأَحَدٍ مِّنۢ بَعْدِىٓ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ ٱلْوَهَّابُ

data.english: So We made subject to him the wind — running by his command gently whithersoever he directed —
data.arabic: فَسَخَّرْنَا لَهُ ٱلرِّيحَ تَجْرِى بِأَمْرِهِۦ رُخَآءً حَيْثُ أَصَابَ

data.english: And the satans, every builder and diver,
data.arabic: وَٱلشَّيَـٰطِينَ كُلَّ بَنَّآءٍ وَغَوَّاصٍ

data.english: And others bound together in shackles.
data.arabic: وَءَاخَرِينَ مُقَرَّنِينَ فِى ٱلْأَصْفَادِ

data.english: “This is Our gift; so grant thou or withhold thou without reckoning!”
data.arabic: هَـٰذَا عَطَآؤُنَا فَٱمْنُنْ أَوْ أَمْسِكْ بِغَيْرِ حِسَابٍ

data.english: And he has nearness to Us, and a good journey’s end.
data.arabic: وَإِنَّ لَهُۥ عِندَنَا لَزُلْفَىٰ وَحُسْنَ مَـَٔابٍ

data.english: And remember thou Our servant Job, when he called to his Lord: “The satan has touched me with distress and punishment.”
data.arabic: وَٱذْكُرْ عَبْدَنَآ أَيُّوبَ إِذْ نَادَىٰ رَبَّهُۥٓ أَنِّى مَسَّنِىَ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنُ بِنُصْبٍ وَعَذَابٍ

data.english: “Stamp thou thy foot: — this is a cool bath and drink!”
data.arabic: ٱرْكُضْ بِرِجْلِكَ هَـٰذَا مُغْتَسَلٌۢ بَارِدٌ وَشَرَابٌ

data.english: And We gave him his household, and their like with them, as a mercy from Us, and as a reminder for men of understanding.
data.arabic: وَوَهَبْنَا لَهُۥٓ أَهْلَهُۥ وَمِثْلَهُم مَّعَهُمْ رَحْمَةً مِّنَّا وَذِكْرَىٰ لِأُو۟لِى ٱلْأَلْبَـٰبِ

data.english: And: “Take thou in thy hand a bouquet, and strike thou therewith, and break thou not thine oath!” We found him patient. How excellent a servant! He was one turning in repentance.
data.arabic: وَخُذْ بِيَدِكَ ضِغْثًا فَٱضْرِب بِّهِۦ وَلَا تَحْنَثْ إِنَّا وَجَدْنَـٰهُ صَابِرًا نِّعْمَ ٱلْعَبْدُ إِنَّهُۥٓ أَوَّابٌ

data.english: And remember thou Our servants Abraham, Isaac and Jacob — possessors of strength and vision.
data.arabic: وَٱذْكُرْ عِبَـٰدَنَآ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ وَإِسْحَـٰقَ وَيَعْقُوبَ أُو۟لِى ٱلْأَيْدِى وَٱلْأَبْصَـٰرِ

data.english: We purified them with a pure quality: the remembrance of the Abode.
data.arabic: إِنَّآ أَخْلَصْنَـٰهُم بِخَالِصَةٍ ذِكْرَى ٱلدَّارِ

data.english: And they are in Our sight among the chosen, the excellent.
data.arabic: وَإِنَّهُمْ عِندَنَا لَمِنَ ٱلْمُصْطَفَيْنَ ٱلْأَخْيَارِ

data.english: And remember thou Ishmael, and Elisha, and Dhūl-Kifl; and all were among the excellent.
data.arabic: وَٱذْكُرْ إِسْمَـٰعِيلَ وَٱلْيَسَعَ وَذَا ٱلْكِفْلِ وَكُلٌّ مِّنَ ٱلْأَخْيَارِ

data.english: This is a remembrance. And for those of prudent fear is a good journey’s end:
data.arabic: هَـٰذَا ذِكْرٌ وَإِنَّ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ لَحُسْنَ مَـَٔابٍ

data.english: Gardens of perpetual abode whose doors will be opened to them;
data.arabic: جَنَّـٰتِ عَدْنٍ مُّفَتَّحَةً لَّهُمُ ٱلْأَبْوَٰبُ

data.english: Reclining therein, they will call therein for plenteous fruit and drink;
data.arabic: مُتَّكِـِٔينَ فِيهَا يَدْعُونَ فِيهَا بِفَـٰكِهَةٍ كَثِيرَةٍ وَشَرَابٍ

data.english: And with them maidens of modest gaze, well-matched.
data.arabic: وَعِندَهُمْ قَـٰصِرَٰتُ ٱلطَّرْفِ أَتْرَابٌ

data.english: This is what you are promised for the Day of Reckoning.
data.arabic: هَـٰذَا مَا تُوعَدُونَ لِيَوْمِ ٱلْحِسَابِ

data.english: This is Our provision; it has no depletion.
data.arabic: إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَرِزْقُنَا مَا لَهُۥ مِن نَّفَادٍ

data.english: This! And for those transgressing all bounds is an evil journey’s end:
data.arabic: هَـٰذَا وَإِنَّ لِلطَّـٰغِينَ لَشَرَّ مَـَٔابٍ

data.english: Gehenna, wherein they will burn; and evil is the resting-place.
data.arabic: جَهَنَّمَ يَصْلَوْنَهَا فَبِئْسَ ٱلْمِهَادُ

data.english: This! So let them taste it: scalding water and purulence,
data.arabic: هَـٰذَا فَلْيَذُوقُوهُ حَمِيمٌ وَغَسَّاقٌ

data.english: And more of like categories.
data.arabic: وَءَاخَرُ مِن شَكْلِهِۦٓ أَزْوَٰجٌ

data.english: “This is a crowd rushing headlong with you!” — No welcome for them — they will burn in the Fire.
data.arabic: هَـٰذَا فَوْجٌ مُّقْتَحِمٌ مَّعَكُمْ لَا مَرْحَبًۢا بِهِمْ إِنَّهُمْ صَالُوا۟ ٱلنَّارِ

data.english: They will say: “The truth is, you — no welcome for you — you sent it ahead for us; and evil is the fixed lodging!”
data.arabic: قَالُوا۟ بَلْ أَنتُمْ لَا مَرْحَبًۢا بِكُمْ أَنتُمْ قَدَّمْتُمُوهُ لَنَا فَبِئْسَ ٱلْقَرَارُ

data.english: They will say: “Our Lord: whoso sent this ahead for us, increase Thou for him a double punishment in the Fire.”
data.arabic: قَالُوا۟ رَبَّنَا مَن قَدَّمَ لَنَا هَـٰذَا فَزِدْهُ عَذَابًا ضِعْفًا فِى ٱلنَّارِ

data.english: And they will say: “What ails us that we see not men we counted among the worst,
data.arabic: وَقَالُوا۟ مَا لَنَا لَا نَرَىٰ رِجَالًا كُنَّا نَعُدُّهُم مِّنَ ٱلْأَشْرَارِ

data.english: “Whom we took in derision — or does our sight miss them?”
data.arabic: أَتَّخَذْنَـٰهُمْ سِخْرِيًّا أَمْ زَاغَتْ عَنْهُمُ ٱلْأَبْصَـٰرُ

data.english: That is true: — the mutual recrimination of the people of the Fire.
data.arabic: إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ لَحَقٌّ تَخَاصُمُ أَهْلِ ٱلنَّارِ

data.english: Say thou: “I am only a warner; and there is no god save God, the One, the Vanquishing,
data.arabic: قُلْ إِنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ مُنذِرٌ وَمَا مِنْ إِلَـٰهٍ إِلَّا ٱللَّـهُ ٱلْوَٰحِدُ ٱلْقَهَّارُ

data.english: “Lord of the Heavens and the Earth and what is between them, the Exalted in Might, the Forgiver.”
data.arabic: رَبُّ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلْغَفَّـٰرُ

data.english: Say thou: “It is a tremendous report
data.arabic: قُلْ هُوَ نَبَؤٌا۟ عَظِيمٌ

data.english: “From which you turn away.
data.arabic: أَنتُمْ عَنْهُ مُعْرِضُونَ

data.english: “I had no knowledge of the exalted assembly when they disputed,
data.arabic: مَا كَانَ لِىَ مِنْ عِلْمٍۭ بِٱلْمَلَإِ ٱلْأَعْلَىٰٓ إِذْ يَخْتَصِمُونَ

data.english: “It is only revealed to me, that I am a clear warner.”
data.arabic: إِن يُوحَىٰٓ إِلَىَّ إِلَّآ أَنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ نَذِيرٌ مُّبِينٌ

data.english: When thy Lord said to the angels: “I am creating a mortal from clay,
data.arabic: إِذْ قَالَ رَبُّكَ لِلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةِ إِنِّى خَـٰلِقٌۢ بَشَرًا مِّن طِينٍ

data.english: “And when I have formed him, and breathed into him of My Spirit, then fall down, to him in submission.”
data.arabic: فَإِذَا سَوَّيْتُهُۥ وَنَفَخْتُ فِيهِ مِن رُّوحِى فَقَعُوا۟ لَهُۥ سَـٰجِدِينَ

data.english: Then the angels submitted, all of them together.
data.arabic: فَسَجَدَ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ كُلُّهُمْ أَجْمَعُونَ

data.english: Not so Iblīs; he had waxed proud, and was of the false claimers of guidance.
data.arabic: إِلَّآ إِبْلِيسَ ٱسْتَكْبَرَ وَكَانَ مِنَ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ

data.english: He said: “O Iblīs: what hindered thee from submitting to that which I have created with My hands? Hast thou waxed proud? Or art thou of the exalted?”
data.arabic: قَالَ يَـٰٓإِبْلِيسُ مَا مَنَعَكَ أَن تَسْجُدَ لِمَا خَلَقْتُ بِيَدَىَّ أَسْتَكْبَرْتَ أَمْ كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلْعَالِينَ

data.english: Said he: “I am better than he; Thou createdst me of fire, and Thou createdst him of clay.”
data.arabic: قَالَ أَنَا۠ خَيْرٌ مِّنْهُ خَلَقْتَنِى مِن نَّارٍ وَخَلَقْتَهُۥ مِن طِينٍ

data.english: He said: “Go thou forth from it; for thou art accursed;
data.arabic: قَالَ فَٱخْرُجْ مِنْهَا فَإِنَّكَ رَجِيمٌ

data.english: “And upon thee is My curse until the Day of Judgment.”
data.arabic: وَإِنَّ عَلَيْكَ لَعْنَتِىٓ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ ٱلدِّينِ

data.english: Said he: “My Lord: grant Thou me respite until the day they are raised.”
data.arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ فَأَنظِرْنِىٓ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ يُبْعَثُونَ

data.english: He said: “Thou art of those granted respite
data.arabic: قَالَ فَإِنَّكَ مِنَ ٱلْمُنظَرِينَ

data.english: “Until the day of the known time.”
data.arabic: إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ ٱلْوَقْتِ ٱلْمَعْلُومِ

data.english: Said he: “Then by Thy power and glory will I cause them to err all together,
data.arabic: قَالَ فَبِعِزَّتِكَ لَأُغْوِيَنَّهُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ

data.english: “Save Thy servants among them that are sincere.”
data.arabic: إِلَّا عِبَادَكَ مِنْهُمُ ٱلْمُخْلَصِينَ

data.english: He said: “Then the truth: — and the truth do I say —
data.arabic: قَالَ فَٱلْحَقُّ وَٱلْحَقَّ أَقُولُ

data.english: “I will fill Gehenna with thee, and whoso follows thee of them all together!”
data.arabic: لَأَمْلَأَنَّ جَهَنَّمَ مِنكَ وَمِمَّن تَبِعَكَ مِنْهُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ

data.english: Say thou: “I ask of you for it no reward; and I am not of those who claim things falsely.
data.arabic: قُلْ مَآ أَسْـَٔلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ أَجْرٍ وَمَآ أَنَا۠ مِنَ ٱلْمُتَكَلِّفِينَ

data.english: “It is only a reminder to all mankind,
data.arabic: إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكْرٌ لِّلْعَـٰلَمِينَ

data.english: “And you will come to know its report after a time.”
data.arabic: وَلَتَعْلَمُنَّ نَبَأَهُۥ بَعْدَ حِينٍۭ

data.english: In the name of God, the Almighty, the Merciful.
data.arabic: بِسْمِ ٱللَّـهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ

data.english: The revelation of the Writ is from God, the Exalted in Might, the Wise.
data.arabic: تَنزِيلُ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ مِنَ ٱللَّـهِ ٱلْعَزِيزِ ٱلْحَكِيمِ

data.english: We sent down to thee the Writ with the truth; so serve thou God, sincere to Him in doctrine.
data.arabic: إِنَّآ أَنزَلْنَآ إِلَيْكَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ بِٱلْحَقِّ فَٱعْبُدِ ٱللَّـهَ مُخْلِصًا لَّهُ ٱلدِّينَ

data.english: Does not the sincere doctrine belong to God? And those who take allies besides Him: — “We only serve them that they might bring us near to God in proximity!” — God will judge between them concerning that wherein they differ; God guides not him who is a liar and an ingrate.
data.arabic: أَلَا لِلَّـهِ ٱلدِّينُ ٱلْخَالِصُ وَٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّخَذُوا۟ مِن دُونِهِۦٓ أَوْلِيَآءَ مَا نَعْبُدُهُمْ إِلَّا لِيُقَرِّبُونَآ إِلَى ٱللَّـهِ زُلْفَىٰٓ إِنَّ ٱللَّـهَ يَحْكُمُ بَيْنَهُمْ فِى مَا هُمْ فِيهِ يَخْتَلِفُونَ إِنَّ ٱللَّـهَ لَا يَهْدِى مَنْ هُوَ كَـٰذِبٌ كَفَّارٌ

data.english: Had God willed to take a son, He would have chosen from what He created what He willed. Glory be to Him! He is God, the One, the Vanquishing!
data.arabic: لَّوْ أَرَادَ ٱللَّـهُ أَن يَتَّخِذَ وَلَدًا لَّٱصْطَفَىٰ مِمَّا يَخْلُقُ مَا يَشَآءُ سُبْحَـٰنَهُۥ هُوَ ٱللَّـهُ ٱلْوَٰحِدُ ٱلْقَهَّارُ

data.english: He created the heavens and the earth in truth. He wraps the night over the day, and He wraps the day over the night; and He made subject the sun and the moon, each running for a stated term. Is He not the Exalted in Might, the Forgiver?
data.arabic: خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ بِٱلْحَقِّ يُكَوِّرُ ٱلَّيْلَ عَلَى ٱلنَّهَارِ وَيُكَوِّرُ ٱلنَّهَارَ عَلَى ٱلَّيْلِ وَسَخَّرَ ٱلشَّمْسَ وَٱلْقَمَرَ كُلٌّ يَجْرِى لِأَجَلٍ مُّسَمًّى أَلَا هُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلْغَفَّـٰرُ

data.english: He created you from one soul; then He made from it its mate. And He sent down for you of the cattle eight pairs. He creates you in the wombs of your mothers — creation after creation — in three darknesses. That is God, your Lord; to Him belongs the dominion; there is no god save He. How then are you diverted?
data.arabic: خَلَقَكُم مِّن نَّفْسٍ وَٰحِدَةٍ ثُمَّ جَعَلَ مِنْهَا زَوْجَهَا وَأَنزَلَ لَكُم مِّنَ ٱلْأَنْعَـٰمِ ثَمَـٰنِيَةَ أَزْوَٰجٍ يَخْلُقُكُمْ فِى بُطُونِ أُمَّهَـٰتِكُمْ خَلْقًا مِّنۢ بَعْدِ خَلْقٍ فِى ظُلُمَـٰتٍ ثَلَـٰثٍ ذَٰلِكُمُ ٱللَّـهُ رَبُّكُمْ لَهُ ٱلْمُلْكُ لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ فَأَنَّىٰ تُصْرَفُونَ

data.english: If you deny — God is free from need of you. And He is not pleased, for His servants, with denial. And if you are grateful, He is pleased therewith for you. And no bearer bears the burden of another; then to your Lord is your return, and He will inform you of what you did; He knows what is in the breasts.
data.arabic: إِن تَكْفُرُوا۟ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّـهَ غَنِىٌّ عَنكُمْ وَلَا يَرْضَىٰ لِعِبَادِهِ ٱلْكُفْرَ وَإِن تَشْكُرُوا۟ يَرْضَهُ لَكُمْ وَلَا تَزِرُ وَازِرَةٌ وِزْرَ أُخْرَىٰ ثُمَّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكُم مَّرْجِعُكُمْ فَيُنَبِّئُكُم بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ إِنَّهُۥ عَلِيمٌۢ بِذَاتِ ٱلصُّدُورِ

data.english: And when affliction touches man, he calls to his Lord, turning to Him; then when He confers upon him favour from Him, he forgets that for which he called to Him before, and makes equals to God, to lead astray from His path. Say thou: “Enjoy thou thy denial a little — thou art of the companions of the Fire.”
data.arabic: وَإِذَا مَسَّ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ ضُرٌّ دَعَا رَبَّهُۥ مُنِيبًا إِلَيْهِ ثُمَّ إِذَا خَوَّلَهُۥ نِعْمَةً مِّنْهُ نَسِىَ مَا كَانَ يَدْعُوٓا۟ إِلَيْهِ مِن قَبْلُ وَجَعَلَ لِلَّـهِ أَندَادًا لِّيُضِلَّ عَن سَبِيلِهِۦ قُلْ تَمَتَّعْ بِكُفْرِكَ قَلِيلًا إِنَّكَ مِنْ أَصْحَـٰبِ ٱلنَّارِ

data.english: If he who is humbly obedient in the watches of the night, submitting and standing, fearing the Hereafter, and hoping for the mercy of his Lord[...]. Say thou: “Are they equal — those who know and those who know not?” There take heed but those of insight.
data.arabic: أَمَّنْ هُوَ قَـٰنِتٌ ءَانَآءَ ٱلَّيْلِ سَاجِدًا وَقَآئِمًا يَحْذَرُ ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةَ وَيَرْجُوا۟ رَحْمَةَ رَبِّهِۦ قُلْ هَلْ يَسْتَوِى ٱلَّذِينَ يَعْلَمُونَ وَٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ إِنَّمَا يَتَذَكَّرُ أُو۟لُوا۟ ٱلْأَلْبَـٰبِ

data.english: Say thou: “O My servants who heed warning: be in prudent fear of your Lord.” For those who do good in the World is good, and God’s earth is spacious. The patient will but be paid their reward without reckoning.
data.arabic: قُلْ يَـٰعِبَادِ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ ٱتَّقُوا۟ رَبَّكُمْ لِلَّذِينَ أَحْسَنُوا۟ فِى هَـٰذِهِ ٱلدُّنْيَا حَسَنَةٌ وَأَرْضُ ٱللَّـهِ وَٰسِعَةٌ إِنَّمَا يُوَفَّى ٱلصَّـٰبِرُونَ أَجْرَهُم بِغَيْرِ حِسَابٍ

data.english: Say thou: “I have been commanded to serve God, sincere to Him in doctrine.
data.arabic: قُلْ إِنِّىٓ أُمِرْتُ أَنْ أَعْبُدَ ٱللَّـهَ مُخْلِصًا لَّهُ ٱلدِّينَ

data.english: “And I have been commanded to be the first of those submitting.”
data.arabic: وَأُمِرْتُ لِأَنْ أَكُونَ أَوَّلَ ٱلْمُسْلِمِينَ

data.english: Say thou: “I fear, if I should disobey my Lord, the punishment of a tremendous day.”
data.arabic: قُلْ إِنِّىٓ أَخَافُ إِنْ عَصَيْتُ رَبِّى عَذَابَ يَوْمٍ عَظِيمٍ

data.english: Say thou: “God do I serve, sincere to Him in my doctrine,
data.arabic: قُلِ ٱللَّـهَ أَعْبُدُ مُخْلِصًا لَّهُۥ دِينِى

data.english: “So serve what you will besides Him.” Say thou: “The losers will be those who lose themselves and their families on the Day of Resurrection.” Is that not the clear loss?
data.arabic: فَٱعْبُدُوا۟ مَا شِئْتُم مِّن دُونِهِۦ قُلْ إِنَّ ٱلْخَـٰسِرِينَ ٱلَّذِينَ خَسِرُوٓا۟ أَنفُسَهُمْ وَأَهْلِيهِمْ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ أَلَا ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلْخُسْرَانُ ٱلْمُبِينُ

data.english: They will have above them canopies of the Fire, and beneath them canopies. By that does God put His servants in dread: “O My servants: be in prudent fear of Me!”
data.arabic: لَهُم مِّن فَوْقِهِمْ ظُلَلٌ مِّنَ ٱلنَّارِ وَمِن تَحْتِهِمْ ظُلَلٌ ذَٰلِكَ يُخَوِّفُ ٱللَّـهُ بِهِۦ عِبَادَهُۥ يَـٰعِبَادِ فَٱتَّقُونِ

data.english: And those who avoid idols lest they serve them and turn to God, for them are glad tidings. So give thou glad tidings to My servants:
data.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ ٱجْتَنَبُوا۟ ٱلطَّـٰغُوتَ أَن يَعْبُدُوهَا وَأَنَابُوٓا۟ إِلَى ٱللَّـهِ لَهُمُ ٱلْبُشْرَىٰ فَبَشِّرْ عِبَادِ

data.english: Those who hear the word and follow the best thereof, those are they whom God has guided; and it is they who are those possessed of insight.
data.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يَسْتَمِعُونَ ٱلْقَوْلَ فَيَتَّبِعُونَ أَحْسَنَهُۥٓ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ هَدَىٰهُمُ ٱللَّـهُ وَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمْ أُو۟لُوا۟ ٱلْأَلْبَـٰبِ

data.english: Is then he upon whom the word of punishment has become binding[...]? Art thou then to rescue him who is in the Fire?
data.arabic: أَفَمَنْ حَقَّ عَلَيْهِ كَلِمَةُ ٱلْعَذَابِ أَفَأَنتَ تُنقِذُ مَن فِى ٱلنَّارِ

data.english: But those who are in prudent fear of their Lord: they have high chambers above which are high chambers built, beneath which rivers flow; the promise of God — God will not break the appointment.
data.arabic: لَـٰكِنِ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّقَوْا۟ رَبَّهُمْ لَهُمْ غُرَفٌ مِّن فَوْقِهَا غُرَفٌ مَّبْنِيَّةٌ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ وَعْدَ ٱللَّـهِ لَا يُخْلِفُ ٱللَّـهُ ٱلْمِيعَادَ

data.english: Dost thou not see that God sent down from the sky water, and inserted it as springs in the earth? Then He brings forth a crop differing in its hues; then it withers, and thou seest it turned to yellow; then He makes it debris. In that is a reminder for men of understanding.
data.arabic: أَلَمْ تَرَ أَنَّ ٱللَّـهَ أَنزَلَ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءً فَسَلَكَهُۥ يَنَـٰبِيعَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ثُمَّ يُخْرِجُ بِهِۦ زَرْعًا مُّخْتَلِفًا أَلْوَٰنُهُۥ ثُمَّ يَهِيجُ فَتَرَىٰهُ مُصْفَرًّا ثُمَّ يَجْعَلُهُۥ حُطَـٰمًا إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَذِكْرَىٰ لِأُو۟لِى ٱلْأَلْبَـٰبِ

data.english: Is then he whose breast God has expanded to submission so that he follows light from His Lord[...]? Then woe to those whose hearts are hardened against the remembrance of God! Those are in manifest error.
data.arabic: أَفَمَن شَرَحَ ٱللَّـهُ صَدْرَهُۥ لِلْإِسْلَـٰمِ فَهُوَ عَلَىٰ نُورٍ مِّن رَّبِّهِۦ فَوَيْلٌ لِّلْقَـٰسِيَةِ قُلُوبُهُم مِّن ذِكْرِ ٱللَّـهِ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ فِى ضَلَـٰلٍ مُّبِينٍ

data.english: God has sent down the best narration: a Writ of paired comparison whereat shiver the skins of those who fear their Lord; then their skins and their hearts soften to the remembrance of God — that is the guidance of God wherewith He guides whom He wills; and whom God sends astray, for him there is no guide.
data.arabic: ٱللَّـهُ نَزَّلَ أَحْسَنَ ٱلْحَدِيثِ كِتَـٰبًا مُّتَشَـٰبِهًا مَّثَانِىَ تَقْشَعِرُّ مِنْهُ جُلُودُ ٱلَّذِينَ يَخْشَوْنَ رَبَّهُمْ ثُمَّ تَلِينُ جُلُودُهُمْ وَقُلُوبُهُمْ إِلَىٰ ذِكْرِ ٱللَّـهِ ذَٰلِكَ هُدَى ٱللَّـهِ يَهْدِى بِهِۦ مَن يَشَآءُ وَمَن يُضْلِلِ ٱللَّـهُ فَمَا لَهُۥ مِنْ هَادٍ

data.english: Is then he who has no prudent fear but his face against the evil of the punishment on the Day of Resurrection[...]? And it will be said to the wrongdoers: “Taste what you earned!”
data.arabic: أَفَمَن يَتَّقِى بِوَجْهِهِۦ سُوٓءَ ٱلْعَذَابِ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ وَقِيلَ لِلظَّـٰلِمِينَ ذُوقُوا۟ مَا كُنتُمْ تَكْسِبُونَ

data.english: Those before them denied, and the punishment came upon them whence they perceived not.
data.arabic: كَذَّبَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ فَأَتَىٰهُمُ ٱلْعَذَابُ مِنْ حَيْثُ لَا يَشْعُرُونَ

data.english: And God let them taste disgrace in the life of this world; but the punishment of the Hereafter is greater, had they but known.
data.arabic: فَأَذَاقَهُمُ ٱللَّـهُ ٱلْخِزْىَ فِى ٱلْحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنْيَا وَلَعَذَابُ ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ أَكْبَرُ لَوْ كَانُوا۟ يَعْلَمُونَ

data.english: And We have struck for mankind in this Qur’an every similitude, that they might take heed;
data.arabic: وَلَقَدْ ضَرَبْنَا لِلنَّاسِ فِى هَـٰذَا ٱلْقُرْءَانِ مِن كُلِّ مَثَلٍ لَّعَلَّهُمْ يَتَذَكَّرُونَ

data.english: An Arabic recitation, free of deviation, that they might be in prudent fear.
data.arabic: قُرْءَانًا عَرَبِيًّا غَيْرَ ذِى عِوَجٍ لَّعَلَّهُمْ يَتَّقُونَ

data.english: God has struck a similitude: — a man concerning whom are partners quarrelling, and a man in submission to one man. Are they equal in likeness? Praise belongs to God! The truth is, most of them know not.
data.arabic: ضَرَبَ ٱللَّـهُ مَثَلًا رَّجُلًا فِيهِ شُرَكَآءُ مُتَشَـٰكِسُونَ وَرَجُلًا سَلَمًا لِّرَجُلٍ هَلْ يَسْتَوِيَانِ مَثَلًا ٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّـهِ بَلْ أَكْثَرُهُمْ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ

data.english: Thou wilt die, and they will die,
data.arabic: إِنَّكَ مَيِّتٌ وَإِنَّهُم مَّيِّتُونَ

data.english: Then on the Day of Resurrection, before your Lord, will you dispute.
data.arabic: ثُمَّ إِنَّكُمْ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ عِندَ رَبِّكُمْ تَخْتَصِمُونَ

data.english: And who is more unjust than he who lies against God and denies the truth when it comes to him? Is then there not in Gehenna a home for the false claimers of guidance?
data.arabic: فَمَنْ أَظْلَمُ مِمَّن كَذَبَ عَلَى ٱللَّـهِ وَكَذَّبَ بِٱلصِّدْقِ إِذْ جَآءَهُۥٓ أَلَيْسَ فِى جَهَنَّمَ مَثْوًى لِّلْكَـٰفِرِينَ

data.english: And whoso comes with the truth and confirms it, it is they who are those of prudent fear:
data.arabic: وَٱلَّذِى جَآءَ بِٱلصِّدْقِ وَصَدَّقَ بِهِۦٓ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْمُتَّقُونَ

data.english: (For them is what they will with their Lord; that is the reward of the doers of good)
data.arabic: لَهُم مَّا يَشَآءُونَ عِندَ رَبِّهِمْ ذَٰلِكَ جَزَآءُ ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ

data.english: That God might remove from them the worst of what they did, and reward them with their reward for the best of what they did.
data.arabic: لِيُكَفِّرَ ٱللَّـهُ عَنْهُمْ أَسْوَأَ ٱلَّذِى عَمِلُوا۟ وَيَجْزِيَهُمْ أَجْرَهُم بِأَحْسَنِ ٱلَّذِى كَانُوا۟ يَعْمَلُونَ

data.english: Is then God not sufficient for His servant? And they would put thee in dread of those other than Him; and whom God sends astray, for him there is no guide.
data.arabic: أَلَيْسَ ٱللَّـهُ بِكَافٍ عَبْدَهُۥ وَيُخَوِّفُونَكَ بِٱلَّذِينَ مِن دُونِهِۦ وَمَن يُضْلِلِ ٱللَّـهُ فَمَا لَهُۥ مِنْ هَادٍ

data.english: And whom God guides, for him there is none to lead astray; is then God not exalted in might and able to requite?
data.arabic: وَمَن يَهْدِ ٱللَّـهُ فَمَا لَهُۥ مِن مُّضِلٍّ أَلَيْسَ ٱللَّـهُ بِعَزِيزٍ ذِى ٱنتِقَامٍ

data.english: And if thou askest them who created the heavens and the earth, they will say: “God.” Say thou: “Have you considered to what you call other than God? If God wills affliction for me, are they removers of His affliction? Or if He wills mercy for me, are they withholders of His mercy?” Say thou: “God is sufficient for me.” In Him place their trust those who would place their trust aright.
data.arabic: وَلَئِن سَأَلْتَهُم مَّنْ خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ لَيَقُولُنَّ ٱللَّـهُ قُلْ أَفَرَءَيْتُم مَّا تَدْعُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّـهِ إِنْ أَرَادَنِىَ ٱللَّـهُ بِضُرٍّ هَلْ هُنَّ كَـٰشِفَـٰتُ ضُرِّهِۦٓ أَوْ أَرَادَنِى بِرَحْمَةٍ هَلْ هُنَّ مُمْسِكَـٰتُ رَحْمَتِهِۦ قُلْ حَسْبِىَ ٱللَّـهُ عَلَيْهِ يَتَوَكَّلُ ٱلْمُتَوَكِّلُونَ

data.english: Say thou: “O my people: work according to your power — I am working; and you will come to know
data.arabic: قُلْ يَـٰقَوْمِ ٱعْمَلُوا۟ عَلَىٰ مَكَانَتِكُمْ إِنِّى عَـٰمِلٌ فَسَوْفَ تَعْلَمُونَ

data.english: “To whom there comes a punishment that disgraces him, and upon whom there descends a lasting punishment.”
data.arabic: مَن يَأْتِيهِ عَذَابٌ يُخْزِيهِ وَيَحِلُّ عَلَيْهِ عَذَابٌ مُّقِيمٌ

data.english: We sent down upon thee the Writ for mankind with the truth. And whoso is guided, it is for his soul; and whoso strays, he but strays against it. And thou art not a guardian over them.
data.arabic: إِنَّآ أَنزَلْنَا عَلَيْكَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ لِلنَّاسِ بِٱلْحَقِّ فَمَنِ ٱهْتَدَىٰ فَلِنَفْسِهِۦ وَمَن ضَلَّ فَإِنَّمَا يَضِلُّ عَلَيْهَا وَمَآ أَنتَ عَلَيْهِم بِوَكِيلٍ

data.english: God takes the souls at the time of their death, and that which has not died, in its sleep. Then He keeps that for which He has ordained death, and sends down the other to a stated term. In that are proofs for people who reflect.
data.arabic: ٱللَّـهُ يَتَوَفَّى ٱلْأَنفُسَ حِينَ مَوْتِهَا وَٱلَّتِى لَمْ تَمُتْ فِى مَنَامِهَا فَيُمْسِكُ ٱلَّتِى قَضَىٰ عَلَيْهَا ٱلْمَوْتَ وَيُرْسِلُ ٱلْأُخْرَىٰٓ إِلَىٰٓ أَجَلٍ مُّسَمًّى إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَـٰتٍ لِّقَوْمٍ يَتَفَكَّرُونَ

data.english: If they have taken intercessors besides God, say thou: “Even though they have not power over anything?” But they do not reason.
data.arabic: أَمِ ٱتَّخَذُوا۟ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّـهِ شُفَعَآءَ قُلْ أَوَلَوْ كَانُوا۟ لَا يَمْلِكُونَ شَيْـًٔا وَلَا يَعْقِلُونَ

data.english: Say thou: “Unto God belongs intercession altogether — His is the dominion of the heavens and the earth; then to Him will you be returned.”
data.arabic: قُل لِّلَّـهِ ٱلشَّفَـٰعَةُ جَمِيعًا لَّهُۥ مُلْكُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ثُمَّ إِلَيْهِ تُرْجَعُونَ

data.english: And when God alone is remembered, the hearts of those who believe not in the Hereafter shrink with aversion; but when those besides Him are remembered, then they rejoice.
data.arabic: وَإِذَا ذُكِرَ ٱللَّـهُ وَحْدَهُ ٱشْمَأَزَّتْ قُلُوبُ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ بِٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ وَإِذَا ذُكِرَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن دُونِهِۦٓ إِذَا هُمْ يَسْتَبْشِرُونَ

data.english: Say thou: “O God, the Creator of the Heavens and the Earth, the Knower of the Unseen and the Seen: Thou wilt judge between Thy servants concerning that wherein they differed.”
data.arabic: قُلِ ٱللَّـهُمَّ فَاطِرَ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ عَـٰلِمَ ٱلْغَيْبِ وَٱلشَّهَـٰدَةِ أَنتَ تَحْكُمُ بَيْنَ عِبَادِكَ فِى مَا كَانُوا۟ فِيهِ يَخْتَلِفُونَ

data.english: And were those who do wrong to possess all that is in the earth and the like of it with it, they would seek to ransom themselves thereby from the evil of the punishment on the Day of Resurrection; and there will appear to them from God that on which they had not reckoned,
data.arabic: وَلَوْ أَنَّ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا۟ مَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ جَمِيعًا وَمِثْلَهُۥ مَعَهُۥ لَٱفْتَدَوْا۟ بِهِۦ مِن سُوٓءِ ٱلْعَذَابِ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ وَبَدَا لَهُم مِّنَ ٱللَّـهِ مَا لَمْ يَكُونُوا۟ يَحْتَسِبُونَ

data.english: And there will appear to them the evil deeds they earned, and there will surround them that whereat they mocked.
data.arabic: وَبَدَا لَهُمْ سَيِّـَٔاتُ مَا كَسَبُوا۟ وَحَاقَ بِهِم مَّا كَانُوا۟ بِهِۦ يَسْتَهْزِءُونَ

data.english: And when affliction touches man, he calls to Us; then when We confer upon him favour from Us, he says: “I have only been given it according to knowledge.” The truth is, it is a means of denial, but most of them know not.
data.arabic: فَإِذَا مَسَّ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ ضُرٌّ دَعَانَا ثُمَّ إِذَا خَوَّلْنَـٰهُ نِعْمَةً مِّنَّا قَالَ إِنَّمَآ أُوتِيتُهُۥ عَلَىٰ عِلْمٍۭ بَلْ هِىَ فِتْنَةٌ وَلَـٰكِنَّ أَكْثَرَهُمْ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ

data.english: There had said it those before them; but there availed them not what they earned,
data.arabic: قَدْ قَالَهَا ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ فَمَآ أَغْنَىٰ عَنْهُم مَّا كَانُوا۟ يَكْسِبُونَ

data.english: And the evil deeds they earned befell them. And those who do wrong among these — there will befall them the evil deeds of what they have earned; and they will not escape.
data.arabic: فَأَصَابَهُمْ سَيِّـَٔاتُ مَا كَسَبُوا۟ وَٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا۟ مِنْ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ سَيُصِيبُهُمْ سَيِّـَٔاتُ مَا كَسَبُوا۟ وَمَا هُم بِمُعْجِزِينَ

data.english: Know they not that God expands provision for whom He wills, and He straitens? In that are proofs for people who believe.
data.arabic: أَوَلَمْ يَعْلَمُوٓا۟ أَنَّ ٱللَّـهَ يَبْسُطُ ٱلرِّزْقَ لِمَن يَشَآءُ وَيَقْدِرُ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَـٰتٍ لِّقَوْمٍ يُؤْمِنُونَ

data.english: Say thou: “O My servants who have committed excess against their souls: despair not of the mercy of God! God forgives transgressions altogether, — He is the Forgiving, the Merciful —
data.arabic: قُلْ يَـٰعِبَادِىَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَسْرَفُوا۟ عَلَىٰٓ أَنفُسِهِمْ لَا تَقْنَطُوا۟ مِن رَّحْمَةِ ٱللَّـهِ إِنَّ ٱللَّـهَ يَغْفِرُ ٱلذُّنُوبَ جَمِيعًا إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلْغَفُورُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

data.english: “And turn in repentance to your Lord, and submit to Him before there comes to you the punishment; then will you not be helped.”
data.arabic: وَأَنِيبُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكُمْ وَأَسْلِمُوا۟ لَهُۥ مِن قَبْلِ أَن يَأْتِيَكُمُ ٱلْعَذَابُ ثُمَّ لَا تُنصَرُونَ

data.english: And follow the best of what is sent down to you from your Lord, before the punishment comes upon you unexpectedly when you perceive not
data.arabic: وَٱتَّبِعُوٓا۟ أَحْسَنَ مَآ أُنزِلَ إِلَيْكُم مِّن رَّبِّكُم مِّن قَبْلِ أَن يَأْتِيَكُمُ ٱلْعَذَابُ بَغْتَةً وَأَنتُمْ لَا تَشْعُرُونَ

data.english: Lest a soul say: “Oh, my regret over what I neglected in what was due to God, and was of those who deride!”
data.arabic: أَن تَقُولَ نَفْسٌ يَـٰحَسْرَتَىٰ عَلَىٰ مَا فَرَّطتُ فِى جَنۢبِ ٱللَّـهِ وَإِن كُنتُ لَمِنَ ٱلسَّـٰخِرِينَ

data.english: Or it say: “Had God guided me, I would have been among those of prudent fear.”
data.arabic: أَوْ تَقُولَ لَوْ أَنَّ ٱللَّـهَ هَدَىٰنِى لَكُنتُ مِنَ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ

data.english: Or it say when it sees the punishment: “Would that I had returned, that I might be of the doers of good.”
data.arabic: أَوْ تَقُولَ حِينَ تَرَى ٱلْعَذَابَ لَوْ أَنَّ لِى كَرَّةً فَأَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ

data.english: “Verily, My proofs came to thee, but thou didst deny them, and waxedst proud, and wast among the false claimers of guidance.”
data.arabic: بَلَىٰ قَدْ جَآءَتْكَ ءَايَـٰتِى فَكَذَّبْتَ بِهَا وَٱسْتَكْبَرْتَ وَكُنتَ مِنَ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ

data.english: And on the Day of Resurrection, thou wilt see those who lied against God, their faces blackened; is then there not in Gehenna a home for the proud?
data.arabic: وَيَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ تَرَى ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَبُوا۟ عَلَى ٱللَّـهِ وُجُوهُهُم مُّسْوَدَّةٌ أَلَيْسَ فِى جَهَنَّمَ مَثْوًى لِّلْمُتَكَبِّرِينَ

data.english: And God will deliver those who were in prudent fear by their attainments; evil will not touch them, nor will they grieve.
data.arabic: وَيُنَجِّى ٱللَّـهُ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّقَوْا۟ بِمَفَازَتِهِمْ لَا يَمَسُّهُمُ ٱلسُّوٓءُ وَلَا هُمْ يَحْزَنُونَ

data.english: God is the creator of all things; and He is guardian over all things.
data.arabic: ٱللَّـهُ خَـٰلِقُ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ وَكِيلٌ

data.english: To Him belong the keys of the heavens and the earth. And those who deny the proofs of God, it is they who are the losers.
data.arabic: لَّهُۥ مَقَالِيدُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِ ٱللَّـهِ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْخَـٰسِرُونَ

data.english: (Say thou: “Is it other than God you command me to serve, O you who are ignorant?”
data.arabic: قُلْ أَفَغَيْرَ ٱللَّـهِ تَأْمُرُوٓنِّىٓ أَعْبُدُ أَيُّهَا ٱلْجَـٰهِلُونَ

data.english: And it has been revealed to thee and to those before thee: “If thou ascribe a partnership, thy deeds will be made vain, and thou wilt be among the losers.”
data.arabic: وَلَقَدْ أُوحِىَ إِلَيْكَ وَإِلَى ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِكَ لَئِنْ أَشْرَكْتَ لَيَحْبَطَنَّ عَمَلُكَ وَلَتَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلْخَـٰسِرِينَ

data.english: Nay, but God shalt thou serve; and be thou among the grateful.)
data.arabic: بَلِ ٱللَّـهَ فَٱعْبُدْ وَكُن مِّنَ ٱلشَّـٰكِرِينَ

data.english: And they measured God not with the measure due Him. And the earth altogether will be His handful on the Day of Resurrection, and the heavens will be folded up in His right hand. Glory be to Him! And exalted is He above that to which they ascribe a partnership!
data.arabic: وَمَا قَدَرُوا۟ ٱللَّـهَ حَقَّ قَدْرِهِۦ وَٱلْأَرْضُ جَمِيعًا قَبْضَتُهُۥ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ وَٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتُ مَطْوِيَّـٰتٌۢ بِيَمِينِهِۦ سُبْحَـٰنَهُۥ وَتَعَـٰلَىٰ عَمَّا يُشْرِكُونَ

data.english: And the Trumpet will be blown, and whoso is in the heavens and whoso is in the earth will fall down thunderstruck save whom God wills. Then will it be blown again; and then will they be standing, looking on.
data.arabic: وَنُفِخَ فِى ٱلصُّورِ فَصَعِقَ مَن فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَمَن فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ إِلَّا مَن شَآءَ ٱللَّـهُ ثُمَّ نُفِخَ فِيهِ أُخْرَىٰ فَإِذَا هُمْ قِيَامٌ يَنظُرُونَ

data.english: And the earth will shine with the light of its Lord; and the Writ will be set up, and the prophets and the witnesses will be brought, and it will be concluded between them with justice, and they will not be wronged.
data.arabic: وَأَشْرَقَتِ ٱلْأَرْضُ بِنُورِ رَبِّهَا وَوُضِعَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبُ وَجِا۟ىٓءَ بِٱلنَّبِيِّـۧنَ وَٱلشُّهَدَآءِ وَقُضِىَ بَيْنَهُم بِٱلْحَقِّ وَهُمْ لَا يُظْلَمُونَ

data.english: And every soul will be paid in full for what it did; and He best knows what they do.
data.arabic: وَوُفِّيَتْ كُلُّ نَفْسٍ مَّا عَمِلَتْ وَهُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِمَا يَفْعَلُونَ

data.english: And those who ignore warning will be driven into Gehenna in companies. When they have come to it, the gates thereof will be opened, and the keepers thereof will say to them: “Came there not to you messengers from among you, reciting to you the proofs of your Lord, and warning you of the meeting of this day of yours?” They will say: “Verily.” But the word of punishment is binding upon the false claimers of guidance.
data.arabic: وَسِيقَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰ جَهَنَّمَ زُمَرًا حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا جَآءُوهَا فُتِحَتْ أَبْوَٰبُهَا وَقَالَ لَهُمْ خَزَنَتُهَآ أَلَمْ يَأْتِكُمْ رُسُلٌ مِّنكُمْ يَتْلُونَ عَلَيْكُمْ ءَايَـٰتِ رَبِّكُمْ وَيُنذِرُونَكُمْ لِقَآءَ يَوْمِكُمْ هَـٰذَا قَالُوا۟ بَلَىٰ وَلَـٰكِنْ حَقَّتْ كَلِمَةُ ٱلْعَذَابِ عَلَى ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ

data.english: It will be said: “Enter the gates of Gehenna, abiding eternally therein”; and evil is the dwelling of the proud.
data.arabic: قِيلَ ٱدْخُلُوٓا۟ أَبْوَٰبَ جَهَنَّمَ خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا فَبِئْسَ مَثْوَى ٱلْمُتَكَبِّرِينَ

data.english: And those who were in prudent fear of their Lord will be driven towards the Garden in companies. When they have come to it and the gates thereof have been opened[...]. And the keepers thereof will say to them: “Peace be upon you! You did well; so enter it, abiding eternally.”
data.arabic: وَسِيقَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّقَوْا۟ رَبَّهُمْ إِلَى ٱلْجَنَّةِ زُمَرًا حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا جَآءُوهَا وَفُتِحَتْ أَبْوَٰبُهَا وَقَالَ لَهُمْ خَزَنَتُهَا سَلَـٰمٌ عَلَيْكُمْ طِبْتُمْ فَٱدْخُلُوهَا خَـٰلِدِينَ

data.english: And they will say: “Praise belongs to God who has fulfilled for us His promise and made us inherit the earth — we may settle in the Garden wheresoever we will!” And excellent is the reward of the workers!
data.arabic: وَقَالُوا۟ ٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّـهِ ٱلَّذِى صَدَقَنَا وَعْدَهُۥ وَأَوْرَثَنَا ٱلْأَرْضَ نَتَبَوَّأُ مِنَ ٱلْجَنَّةِ حَيْثُ نَشَآءُ فَنِعْمَ أَجْرُ ٱلْعَـٰمِلِينَ

data.english: And thou wilt see the angels surrounding the Throne, glorifying with the praise of their Lord; and it will be decided between them with justice; and it will be said: “Praise belongs to God, the Lord of All Creation!”
data.arabic: وَتَرَى ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةَ حَآفِّينَ مِنْ حَوْلِ ٱلْعَرْشِ يُسَبِّحُونَ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّهِمْ وَقُضِىَ بَيْنَهُم بِٱلْحَقِّ وَقِيلَ ٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّـهِ رَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ

data.english: In the name of God, the Almighty, the Merciful.
data.arabic: بِسْمِ ٱللَّـهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ

data.english: ḥā mīm
data.arabic: حمٓ

data.english: The revelation of the Writ is from God, the Exalted in Might, the Knowing,
data.arabic: تَنزِيلُ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ مِنَ ٱللَّـهِ ٱلْعَزِيزِ ٱلْعَلِيمِ

data.english: The Forgiver of Transgression, and the Accepter of Repentance, the Severe in Retribution, the Owner of Abundance. There is no god save He; unto Him is the journey’s end.
data.arabic: غَافِرِ ٱلذَّنۢبِ وَقَابِلِ ٱلتَّوْبِ شَدِيدِ ٱلْعِقَابِ ذِى ٱلطَّوْلِ لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ إِلَيْهِ ٱلْمَصِيرُ

data.english: None disputes concerning the proofs of God save those who ignore warning, so let not delude thee their going to and fro in the land.
data.arabic: مَا يُجَـٰدِلُ فِىٓ ءَايَـٰتِ ٱللَّـهِ إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ فَلَا يَغْرُرْكَ تَقَلُّبُهُمْ فِى ٱلْبِلَـٰدِ

data.english: There denied before them the people of Noah, and the parties after them; and every community purposed against their messenger to seize him, and disputed with falsehood to refute thereby the truth. Then I seized them — and how was My retribution!
data.arabic: كَذَّبَتْ قَبْلَهُمْ قَوْمُ نُوحٍ وَٱلْأَحْزَابُ مِنۢ بَعْدِهِمْ وَهَمَّتْ كُلُّ أُمَّةٍۭ بِرَسُولِهِمْ لِيَأْخُذُوهُ وَجَـٰدَلُوا۟ بِٱلْبَـٰطِلِ لِيُدْحِضُوا۟ بِهِ ٱلْحَقَّ فَأَخَذْتُهُمْ فَكَيْفَ كَانَ عِقَابِ

data.english: And thus became binding the word of thy Lord upon those who ignore warning, that they are the companions of the Fire.
data.arabic: وَكَذَٰلِكَ حَقَّتْ كَلِمَتُ رَبِّكَ عَلَى ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓا۟ أَنَّهُمْ أَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلنَّارِ

data.english: Those who bear the Throne and those round about it give glory with the praise of their Lord, and believe in Him, and ask forgiveness for those who heed warning: “Our Lord: Thou encompassest all things in mercy and knowledge, so forgive Thou those who have repented and followed Thy path, and protect Thou them from the punishment of Hell!
data.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يَحْمِلُونَ ٱلْعَرْشَ وَمَنْ حَوْلَهُۥ يُسَبِّحُونَ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّهِمْ وَيُؤْمِنُونَ بِهِۦ وَيَسْتَغْفِرُونَ لِلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ رَبَّنَا وَسِعْتَ كُلَّ شَىْءٍ رَّحْمَةً وَعِلْمًا فَٱغْفِرْ لِلَّذِينَ تَابُوا۟ وَٱتَّبَعُوا۟ سَبِيلَكَ وَقِهِمْ عَذَابَ ٱلْجَحِيمِ

data.english: “Our Lord: make Thou them enter the Gardens of Perpetual Abode which Thou hast promised them and whoso was righteous among their fathers, and their wives, and their progeny — Thou art the Exalted in Might, the Wise —
data.arabic: رَبَّنَا وَأَدْخِلْهُمْ جَنَّـٰتِ عَدْنٍ ٱلَّتِى وَعَدتَّهُمْ وَمَن صَلَحَ مِنْ ءَابَآئِهِمْ وَأَزْوَٰجِهِمْ وَذُرِّيَّـٰتِهِمْ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلْحَكِيمُ

data.english: “And protect Thou them from evil deeds; and he whom Thou protectest from evil deeds that day, upon him hast Thou had mercy.” And that is the Great Achievement.
data.arabic: وَقِهِمُ ٱلسَّيِّـَٔاتِ وَمَن تَقِ ٱلسَّيِّـَٔاتِ يَوْمَئِذٍ فَقَدْ رَحِمْتَهُۥ وَذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلْفَوْزُ ٱلْعَظِيمُ

data.english: Those who ignore warning will be called: “The hatred of God is greater than your hatred of yourselves — when you were invited to faith, but denied.”
data.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ يُنَادَوْنَ لَمَقْتُ ٱللَّـهِ أَكْبَرُ مِن مَّقْتِكُمْ أَنفُسَكُمْ إِذْ تُدْعَوْنَ إِلَى ٱلْإِيمَـٰنِ فَتَكْفُرُونَ

data.english: (They will say: “Our Lord: twice hast Thou given us death, and twice hast Thou given us life; and we have confessed our transgressions — is there to a way out any path?”)
data.arabic: قَالُوا۟ رَبَّنَآ أَمَتَّنَا ٱثْنَتَيْنِ وَأَحْيَيْتَنَا ٱثْنَتَيْنِ فَٱعْتَرَفْنَا بِذُنُوبِنَا فَهَلْ إِلَىٰ خُرُوجٍ مِّن سَبِيلٍ

data.english: “That is because, when God was called to alone, you denied; but if a partnership was ascribed to Him, you believed”; then judgment belongs to God, the Exalted, the Great.
data.arabic: ذَٰلِكُم بِأَنَّهُۥٓ إِذَا دُعِىَ ٱللَّـهُ وَحْدَهُۥ كَفَرْتُمْ وَإِن يُشْرَكْ بِهِۦ تُؤْمِنُوا۟ فَٱلْحُكْمُ لِلَّـهِ ٱلْعَلِىِّ ٱلْكَبِيرِ

data.english: (He it is that shows you His proofs and sends down for you from the sky provision; and there takes heed only whoso turns in repentance.
data.arabic: هُوَ ٱلَّذِى يُرِيكُمْ ءَايَـٰتِهِۦ وَيُنَزِّلُ لَكُم مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ رِزْقًا وَمَا يَتَذَكَّرُ إِلَّا مَن يُنِيبُ

data.english: So call to God, sincere to Him in doctrine, though the false claimers of guidance be averse.)
data.arabic: فَٱدْعُوا۟ ٱللَّـهَ مُخْلِصِينَ لَهُ ٱلدِّينَ وَلَوْ كَرِهَ ٱلْكَـٰفِرُونَ

data.english: The Raiser of Degrees, the Owner of the Throne; He casts the Spirit of His command upon whom He wills of His servants, that he might warn of the Day of Meeting:
data.arabic: رَفِيعُ ٱلدَّرَجَـٰتِ ذُو ٱلْعَرْشِ يُلْقِى ٱلرُّوحَ مِنْ أَمْرِهِۦ عَلَىٰ مَن يَشَآءُ مِنْ عِبَادِهِۦ لِيُنذِرَ يَوْمَ ٱلتَّلَاقِ

data.english: The day they emerge nothing of them will be hidden from God: “Whose is the dominion this day?” — “It belongs to God, the One, the Vanquishing:
data.arabic: يَوْمَ هُم بَـٰرِزُونَ لَا يَخْفَىٰ عَلَى ٱللَّـهِ مِنْهُمْ شَىْءٌ لِّمَنِ ٱلْمُلْكُ ٱلْيَوْمَ لِلَّـهِ ٱلْوَٰحِدِ ٱلْقَهَّارِ

data.english: “This day is each soul rewarded for what it earned! No injustice this day!” God is swift in reckoning.
data.arabic: ٱلْيَوْمَ تُجْزَىٰ كُلُّ نَفْسٍۭ بِمَا كَسَبَتْ لَا ظُلْمَ ٱلْيَوْمَ إِنَّ ٱللَّـهَ سَرِيعُ ٱلْحِسَابِ

data.english: And warn thou them of the Day of the Drawing Near, when the hearts will choke in the throats: — No loyal friend for the wrongdoers! No intercessor who is obeyed!
data.arabic: وَأَنذِرْهُمْ يَوْمَ ٱلْـَٔازِفَةِ إِذِ ٱلْقُلُوبُ لَدَى ٱلْحَنَاجِرِ كَـٰظِمِينَ مَا لِلظَّـٰلِمِينَ مِنْ حَمِيمٍ وَلَا شَفِيعٍ يُطَاعُ

data.english: He knows the treachery of the eyes and what the breasts conceal.
data.arabic: يَعْلَمُ خَآئِنَةَ ٱلْأَعْيُنِ وَمَا تُخْفِى ٱلصُّدُورُ

data.english: And God decides in justice. And those to whom they call besides Him decide not anything; God, He is the Hearer, the Seeing.
data.arabic: وَٱللَّـهُ يَقْضِى بِٱلْحَقِّ وَٱلَّذِينَ يَدْعُونَ مِن دُونِهِۦ لَا يَقْضُونَ بِشَىْءٍ إِنَّ ٱللَّـهَ هُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلْبَصِيرُ

data.english: Have they not travelled in the earth and seen how was the final outcome of those who were before them? They were stronger than them in power and impact in the earth; but God seized them for their transgressions; and they had not from God any defender,
data.arabic: أَوَلَمْ يَسِيرُوا۟ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ فَيَنظُرُوا۟ كَيْفَ كَانَ عَـٰقِبَةُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَانُوا۟ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ كَانُوا۟ هُمْ أَشَدَّ مِنْهُمْ قُوَّةً وَءَاثَارًا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ فَأَخَذَهُمُ ٱللَّـهُ بِذُنُوبِهِمْ وَمَا كَانَ لَهُم مِّنَ ٱللَّـهِ مِن وَاقٍ

data.english: For it is that their messengers brought them clear signs, but they denied, so God seized them. He is strong, and severe in retribution.
data.arabic: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمْ كَانَت تَّأْتِيهِمْ رُسُلُهُم بِٱلْبَيِّنَـٰتِ فَكَفَرُوا۟ فَأَخَذَهُمُ ٱللَّـهُ إِنَّهُۥ قَوِىٌّ شَدِيدُ ٱلْعِقَابِ

data.english: And We sent Moses with Our proofs and a clear authority
data.arabic: وَلَقَدْ أَرْسَلْنَا مُوسَىٰ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا وَسُلْطَـٰنٍ مُّبِينٍ

data.english: To Pharaoh and Hāmān and Qārūn; they said: “A sorcerer and a liar.”
data.arabic: إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ وَهَـٰمَـٰنَ وَقَـٰرُونَ فَقَالُوا۟ سَـٰحِرٌ كَذَّابٌ

data.english: And when he brought them the truth from Us, they said: “Kill the sons of those who heed warning with him, and spare their women.” But the plan of the false claimers of guidance is only in error.
