data.arabic: أَوْلَىٰ لَكَ فَأَوْلَىٰ

data.english: Then nearer to Thee and nearer!)
data.arabic: ثُمَّ أَوْلَىٰ لَكَ فَأَوْلَىٰٓ

data.english: Does man think that he is left to no purpose?
data.arabic: أَيَحْسَبُ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ أَن يُتْرَكَ سُدًى

data.english: Was he not a sperm-drop from semen emitted?
data.arabic: أَلَمْ يَكُ نُطْفَةً مِّن مَّنِىٍّۢ يُمْنَىٰ

data.english: Then he was a clinging thing — and He created, and fashioned,
data.arabic: ثُمَّ كَانَ عَلَقَةً فَخَلَقَ فَسَوَّىٰ

data.english: And made of it two kinds, the male and the female.
data.arabic: فَجَعَلَ مِنْهُ ٱلزَّوْجَيْنِ ٱلذَّكَرَ وَٱلْأُنثَىٰٓ

data.english: Is then He not able to give life to the dead?
data.arabic: أَلَيْسَ ذَٰلِكَ بِقَـٰدِرٍ عَلَىٰٓ أَن يُحْـِۧىَ ٱلْمَوْتَىٰ

data.english: In the name of God, the Almighty, the Merciful.
data.arabic: بِسْمِ ٱللَّـهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ

data.english: Has there come upon man a period of time he was not a thing remembered?
data.arabic: هَلْ أَتَىٰ عَلَى ٱلْإِنسَـٰنِ حِينٌ مِّنَ ٱلدَّهْرِ لَمْ يَكُن شَيْـًٔا مَّذْكُورًا

data.english: We created man from a sperm-drop — a mingling — that We might test him; and We made him hearing and seeing.
data.arabic: إِنَّا خَلَقْنَا ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ مِن نُّطْفَةٍ أَمْشَاجٍ نَّبْتَلِيهِ فَجَعَلْنَـٰهُ سَمِيعًۢا بَصِيرًا

data.english: We guided him on the path, be he grateful or be he ungrateful.
data.arabic: إِنَّا هَدَيْنَـٰهُ ٱلسَّبِيلَ إِمَّا شَاكِرًا وَإِمَّا كَفُورًا

data.english: We have prepared for the false claimers of guidance chains and yokes and an inferno.
data.arabic: إِنَّآ أَعْتَدْنَا لِلْكَـٰفِرِينَ سَلَـٰسِلَا۟ وَأَغْلَـٰلًا وَسَعِيرًا

data.english: The virtuous will drink of a cup whereof the mixture is of camphor,
data.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلْأَبْرَارَ يَشْرَبُونَ مِن كَأْسٍ كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا كَافُورًا

data.english: A spring whereat drink the servants of God, making it to gush forth abundantly:
data.arabic: عَيْنًا يَشْرَبُ بِهَا عِبَادُ ٱللَّـهِ يُفَجِّرُونَهَا تَفْجِيرًا

data.english: They fulfil the vow, and fear a day the evil of which will be widespread,
data.arabic: يُوفُونَ بِٱلنَّذْرِ وَيَخَافُونَ يَوْمًا كَانَ شَرُّهُۥ مُسْتَطِيرًا

data.english: And give food for love of Him to the needy, and the fatherless, and the prisoner,
data.arabic: وَيُطْعِمُونَ ٱلطَّعَامَ عَلَىٰ حُبِّهِۦ مِسْكِينًا وَيَتِيمًا وَأَسِيرًا

data.english: (“We feed you only for the face of God; we desire from you no reward or gratitude;
data.arabic: إِنَّمَا نُطْعِمُكُمْ لِوَجْهِ ٱللَّـهِ لَا نُرِيدُ مِنكُمْ جَزَآءً وَلَا شُكُورًا

data.english: “We fear from our Lord a stern and calamitous day.”)
data.arabic: إِنَّا نَخَافُ مِن رَّبِّنَا يَوْمًا عَبُوسًا قَمْطَرِيرًا

data.english: So God protected them from the evil of that day, and granted them radiance and happiness,
data.arabic: فَوَقَىٰهُمُ ٱللَّـهُ شَرَّ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلْيَوْمِ وَلَقَّىٰهُمْ نَضْرَةً وَسُرُورًا

data.english: And rewarded them for their patience with a Garden and silk;
data.arabic: وَجَزَىٰهُم بِمَا صَبَرُوا۟ جَنَّةً وَحَرِيرًا

data.english: Reclining therein upon couches; they will see therein neither sun nor biting cold;
data.arabic: مُّتَّكِـِٔينَ فِيهَا عَلَى ٱلْأَرَآئِكِ لَا يَرَوْنَ فِيهَا شَمْسًا وَلَا زَمْهَرِيرًا

data.english: And near above them will be the shade thereof, and the fruits thereof lowered in meekness.
data.arabic: وَدَانِيَةً عَلَيْهِمْ ظِلَـٰلُهَا وَذُلِّلَتْ قُطُوفُهَا تَذْلِيلًا

data.english: Circulated among them will be vessels of silver, and cups as of crystal!
data.arabic: وَيُطَافُ عَلَيْهِم بِـَٔانِيَةٍ مِّن فِضَّةٍ وَأَكْوَابٍ كَانَتْ قَوَارِيرَا۠

data.english: Crystal of silver, that they determined exactly.
data.arabic: قَوَارِيرَا۟ مِن فِضَّةٍ قَدَّرُوهَا تَقْدِيرًا

data.english: And they will be given to drink therein a cup whereof the mixture is of ginger,
data.arabic: وَيُسْقَوْنَ فِيهَا كَأْسًا كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا زَنجَبِيلًا

data.english: From a spring therein named Salsabīl.
data.arabic: عَيْنًا فِيهَا تُسَمَّىٰ سَلْسَبِيلًا

data.english: And there will circulate among them youths made eternal; when thou seest them, thou thinkest them scattered pearls.
data.arabic: وَيَطُوفُ عَلَيْهِمْ وِلْدَٰنٌ مُّخَلَّدُونَ إِذَا رَأَيْتَهُمْ حَسِبْتَهُمْ لُؤْلُؤًا مَّنثُورًا

data.english: And when thou seest there, thou seest bliss and great dominion: —
data.arabic: وَإِذَا رَأَيْتَ ثَمَّ رَأَيْتَ نَعِيمًا وَمُلْكًا كَبِيرًا

data.english: Upon them garments of fine green silk and brocade, and they adorned with bracelets of silver, and their Lord giving them to drink a purifying draught:
data.arabic: عَـٰلِيَهُمْ ثِيَابُ سُندُسٍ خُضْرٌ وَإِسْتَبْرَقٌ وَحُلُّوٓا۟ أَسَاوِرَ مِن فِضَّةٍ وَسَقَىٰهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ شَرَابًا طَهُورًا

data.english: “This is for you a reward, and your effort is appreciated.”
data.arabic: إِنَّ هَـٰذَا كَانَ لَكُمْ جَزَآءً وَكَانَ سَعْيُكُم مَّشْكُورًا

data.english: We have sent down upon thee the Qur’an in a successive revelation,
data.arabic: إِنَّا نَحْنُ نَزَّلْنَا عَلَيْكَ ٱلْقُرْءَانَ تَنزِيلًا

data.english: So be thou patient for the judgment of thy Lord, and obey thou not among them a sinner or an ingrate;
data.arabic: فَٱصْبِرْ لِحُكْمِ رَبِّكَ وَلَا تُطِعْ مِنْهُمْ ءَاثِمًا أَوْ كَفُورًا

data.english: And remember thou the name of thy Lord morning and evening.
data.arabic: وَٱذْكُرِ ٱسْمَ رَبِّكَ بُكْرَةً وَأَصِيلًا

data.english: And part of the night, submit thou to Him — and glorify thou Him the long night.
data.arabic: وَمِنَ ٱلَّيْلِ فَٱسْجُدْ لَهُۥ وَسَبِّحْهُ لَيْلًا طَوِيلًا

data.english: These love the immediate, and leave behind them a burdensome day.
data.arabic: إِنَّ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ يُحِبُّونَ ٱلْعَاجِلَةَ وَيَذَرُونَ وَرَآءَهُمْ يَوْمًا ثَقِيلًا

data.english: We created them, and strengthened their form and, when We will, We will change their likenesses completely.
data.arabic: نَّحْنُ خَلَقْنَـٰهُمْ وَشَدَدْنَآ أَسْرَهُمْ وَإِذَا شِئْنَا بَدَّلْنَآ أَمْثَـٰلَهُمْ تَبْدِيلًا

data.english: This is a reminder, so whoso wills may take to his Lord a path.
data.arabic: إِنَّ هَـٰذِهِۦ تَذْكِرَةٌ فَمَن شَآءَ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ سَبِيلًا

data.english: And you will not save that God wills; God is knowing and wise.
data.arabic: وَمَا تَشَآءُونَ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّـهُ إِنَّ ٱللَّـهَ كَانَ عَلِيمًا حَكِيمًا

data.english: He makes enter whom He wills into His mercy; and for the wrongdoers has He prepared a painful punishment.
data.arabic: يُدْخِلُ مَن يَشَآءُ فِى رَحْمَتِهِۦ وَٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ أَعَدَّ لَهُمْ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًۢا

data.english: In the name of God, the Almighty, the Merciful.
data.arabic: بِسْمِ ٱللَّـهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ

data.english: By those sent in succession,
data.arabic: وَٱلْمُرْسَلَـٰتِ عُرْفًا

data.english: And the tempestuous ones a-raging,
data.arabic: فَٱلْعَـٰصِفَـٰتِ عَصْفًا

data.english: And the scattering ones a-scattering,
data.arabic: وَٱلنَّـٰشِرَٰتِ نَشْرًا

data.english: And the dividing ones a-dividing,
data.arabic: فَٱلْفَـٰرِقَـٰتِ فَرْقًا

data.english: And those delivering a reminder
data.arabic: فَٱلْمُلْقِيَـٰتِ ذِكْرًا

data.english: As justification or warning!
data.arabic: عُذْرًا أَوْ نُذْرًا

data.english: What you are promised — it will befall.
data.arabic: إِنَّمَا تُوعَدُونَ لَوَٰقِعٌ

data.english: Then when the stars are put out,
data.arabic: فَإِذَا ٱلنُّجُومُ طُمِسَتْ

data.english: And when the heaven is cleft asunder,
data.arabic: وَإِذَا ٱلسَّمَآءُ فُرِجَتْ

data.english: And when the mountains are scattered,
data.arabic: وَإِذَا ٱلْجِبَالُ نُسِفَتْ

data.english: And when the messengers are brought to the time appointed––
data.arabic: وَإِذَا ٱلرُّسُلُ أُقِّتَتْ

data.english: “To what day will it be deferred?”
data.arabic: لِأَىِّ يَوْمٍ أُجِّلَتْ

data.english: “To the Day of Decision.”
data.arabic: لِيَوْمِ ٱلْفَصْلِ

data.english: And what will convey to thee what the Day of Decision is?
data.arabic: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا يَوْمُ ٱلْفَصْلِ

data.english: Woe, that day, to the deniers!
data.arabic: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ

data.english: Did We not destroy the former peoples?
data.arabic: أَلَمْ نُهْلِكِ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ

data.english: Then will We cause to follow them those who come later.
data.arabic: ثُمَّ نُتْبِعُهُمُ ٱلْـَٔاخِرِينَ

data.english: Thus do We with the lawbreakers.
data.arabic: كَذَٰلِكَ نَفْعَلُ بِٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ

data.english: Woe, that day, to the deniers!
data.arabic: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ

data.english: Did We not create you from a despised water?
data.arabic: أَلَمْ نَخْلُقكُّم مِّن مَّآءٍ مَّهِينٍ

data.english: And We placed it in a fixed lodging secure
data.arabic: فَجَعَلْنَـٰهُ فِى قَرَارٍ مَّكِينٍ

data.english: For a known measure.
data.arabic: إِلَىٰ قَدَرٍ مَّعْلُومٍ

data.english: So We determined; and how excellent are those who determine!
data.arabic: فَقَدَرْنَا فَنِعْمَ ٱلْقَـٰدِرُونَ

data.english: Woe, that day, to the deniers!
data.arabic: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ

data.english: Have We not made the earth a container
data.arabic: أَلَمْ نَجْعَلِ ٱلْأَرْضَ كِفَاتًا

data.english: Of the living and the dead?
data.arabic: أَحْيَآءً وَأَمْوَٰتًا

data.english: And We made therein high, firm mountains, and gave you to drink sweet water.
data.arabic: وَجَعَلْنَا فِيهَا رَوَٰسِىَ شَـٰمِخَـٰتٍ وَأَسْقَيْنَـٰكُم مَّآءً فُرَاتًا

data.english: Woe, that day, to the deniers!
data.arabic: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ

data.english: “Depart for what you denied!
data.arabic: ٱنطَلِقُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰ مَا كُنتُم بِهِۦ تُكَذِّبُونَ

data.english: “Depart to the threefold shadow,
data.arabic: ٱنطَلِقُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰ ظِلٍّۢ ذِى ثَلَـٰثِ شُعَبٍ

data.english: “Neither shading, nor availing against the flame!”
data.arabic: لَّا ظَلِيلٍ وَلَا يُغْنِى مِنَ ٱللَّـهَبِ

data.english: It throws sparks like logs,
data.arabic: إِنَّهَا تَرْمِى بِشَرَرٍ كَٱلْقَصْرِ

data.english: As if giant fiery ropes.
data.arabic: كَأَنَّهُۥ جِمَـٰلَتٌ صُفْرٌ

data.english: Woe, that day, to the deniers!
data.arabic: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ

data.english: This is the day they will not speak
data.arabic: هَـٰذَا يَوْمُ لَا يَنطِقُونَ

data.english: Nor be given leave, then put forth excuses.
data.arabic: وَلَا يُؤْذَنُ لَهُمْ فَيَعْتَذِرُونَ

data.english: Woe, that day, to the deniers!
data.arabic: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ

data.english: “This is the Day of Decision! We have gathered you and the former peoples!”
data.arabic: هَـٰذَا يَوْمُ ٱلْفَصْلِ جَمَعْنَـٰكُمْ وَٱلْأَوَّلِينَ

data.english: So if you have a plan, then plan against Me.
data.arabic: فَإِن كَانَ لَكُمْ كَيْدٌ فَكِيدُونِ

data.english: Woe, that day, to the deniers!
data.arabic: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ

data.english: Those of prudent fear will be among shades and springs,
data.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ فِى ظِلَـٰلٍ وَعُيُونٍ

data.english: And such fruits as they desire:
data.arabic: وَفَوَٰكِهَ مِمَّا يَشْتَهُونَ

data.english: “Eat and drink with satisfaction for what you did!”
data.arabic: كُلُوا۟ وَٱشْرَبُوا۟ هَنِيٓـًٔۢا بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ

data.english: Thus reward We the doers of good.
data.arabic: إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِى ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ

data.english: Woe, that day, to the deniers!
data.arabic: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ

data.english: Eat and enjoy yourselves a little — you are lawbreakers.
data.arabic: كُلُوا۟ وَتَمَتَّعُوا۟ قَلِيلًا إِنَّكُم مُّجْرِمُونَ

data.english: Woe, that day, to the deniers!
data.arabic: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ

data.english: And when it is said to them: “Be lowly,” they are not lowly.
data.arabic: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ ٱرْكَعُوا۟ لَا يَرْكَعُونَ

data.english: Woe, that day, to the deniers!
data.arabic: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ

data.english: Then in what narration after it will they believe?
data.arabic: فَبِأَىِّ حَدِيثٍۭ بَعْدَهُۥ يُؤْمِنُونَ

data.english: In the name of God, the Almighty, the Merciful.
data.arabic: بِسْمِ ٱللَّـهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ

data.english: About what are they asking one another?
data.arabic: عَمَّ يَتَسَآءَلُونَ

data.english: About the tremendous report
data.arabic: عَنِ ٱلنَّبَإِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ

data.english: About which they differ.
data.arabic: ٱلَّذِى هُمْ فِيهِ مُخْتَلِفُونَ

data.english: No, indeed! They will come to know!
data.arabic: كَلَّا سَيَعْلَمُونَ

data.english: Then no, indeed! They will come to know!
data.arabic: ثُمَّ كَلَّا سَيَعْلَمُونَ

data.english: Have We not made the earth a resting-place,
data.arabic: أَلَمْ نَجْعَلِ ٱلْأَرْضَ مِهَـٰدًا

data.english: And the mountains as stakes?
data.arabic: وَٱلْجِبَالَ أَوْتَادًا

data.english: And We created you in pairs,
data.arabic: وَخَلَقْنَـٰكُمْ أَزْوَٰجًا

data.english: And We made your sleep rest,
data.arabic: وَجَعَلْنَا نَوْمَكُمْ سُبَاتًا

data.english: And We made the night a garment,
data.arabic: وَجَعَلْنَا ٱلَّيْلَ لِبَاسًا

data.english: And We made the day a living,
data.arabic: وَجَعَلْنَا ٱلنَّهَارَ مَعَاشًا

data.english: And We built above you seven strong ones,
data.arabic: وَبَنَيْنَا فَوْقَكُمْ سَبْعًا شِدَادًا

data.english: And We made a blazing torch,
data.arabic: وَجَعَلْنَا سِرَاجًا وَهَّاجًا

data.english: And sent down, from the rain clouds, pouring water,
data.arabic: وَأَنزَلْنَا مِنَ ٱلْمُعْصِرَٰتِ مَآءً ثَجَّاجًا

data.english: That We might bring forth thereby grain and plants,
data.arabic: لِّنُخْرِجَ بِهِۦ حَبًّا وَنَبَاتًا

data.english: And densely growing gardens.
data.arabic: وَجَنَّـٰتٍ أَلْفَافًا

data.english: The Day of Decision is an appointed time: —
data.arabic: إِنَّ يَوْمَ ٱلْفَصْلِ كَانَ مِيقَـٰتًا

data.english: The day the Trumpet is blown, and you come in crowds,
data.arabic: يَوْمَ يُنفَخُ فِى ٱلصُّورِ فَتَأْتُونَ أَفْوَاجًا

data.english: And the heaven is opened and becomes gates,
data.arabic: وَفُتِحَتِ ٱلسَّمَآءُ فَكَانَتْ أَبْوَٰبًا

data.english: And the mountains are set in motion and become a mirage:
data.arabic: وَسُيِّرَتِ ٱلْجِبَالُ فَكَانَتْ سَرَابًا

data.english: Gehenna will be lying in wait,
data.arabic: إِنَّ جَهَنَّمَ كَانَتْ مِرْصَادًا

data.english: For those transgressing all bounds, a journey’s end.
data.arabic: لِّلطَّـٰغِينَ مَـَٔابًا

data.english: They will tarry therein long ages.
data.arabic: لَّـٰبِثِينَ فِيهَآ أَحْقَابًا

data.english: They will taste therein neither coolness nor drink
data.arabic: لَّا يَذُوقُونَ فِيهَا بَرْدًا وَلَا شَرَابًا

data.english: Save scalding water and purulence,
data.arabic: إِلَّا حَمِيمًا وَغَسَّاقًا

data.english: As meet reward.
data.arabic: جَزَآءً وِفَاقًا

data.english: They expected not a reckoning,
data.arabic: إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا۟ لَا يَرْجُونَ حِسَابًا

data.english: And they denied Our proofs completely,
data.arabic: وَكَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا كِذَّابًا

data.english: But everything have We counted in a writ.
data.arabic: وَكُلَّ شَىْءٍ أَحْصَيْنَـٰهُ كِتَـٰبًا

data.english: “So taste! And We will increase you not save in punishment!”
data.arabic: فَذُوقُوا۟ فَلَن نَّزِيدَكُمْ إِلَّا عَذَابًا

data.english: For those of prudent fear is a place of safety:
data.arabic: إِنَّ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ مَفَازًا

data.english: Gardens and grapevines,
data.arabic: حَدَآئِقَ وَأَعْنَـٰبًا

data.english: And well-matched maidens with swelling breasts,
data.arabic: وَكَوَاعِبَ أَتْرَابًا

data.english: And a cup overflowing.
data.arabic: وَكَأْسًا دِهَاقًا

data.english: They hear therein neither vain speech nor denial,
data.arabic: لَّا يَسْمَعُونَ فِيهَا لَغْوًا وَلَا كِذَّٰبًا

data.english: As reward from thy Lord — a gift, a reckoning —
data.arabic: جَزَآءً مِّن رَّبِّكَ عَطَآءً حِسَابًا

data.english: Lord of the Heavens and the Earth and what is between them, the Almighty. They have from Him no power to speak
data.arabic: رَّبِّ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ لَا يَمْلِكُونَ مِنْهُ خِطَابًا

data.english: The day the Spirit and the angels stand in ranks; they speak not save he whom the Almighty grants leave, and he will say what is right.
data.arabic: يَوْمَ يَقُومُ ٱلرُّوحُ وَٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ صَفًّا لَّا يَتَكَلَّمُونَ إِلَّا مَنْ أَذِنَ لَهُ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ وَقَالَ صَوَابًا

data.english: That is the True Day, so let him who wills take his Lord as a journey’s end.
data.arabic: ذَٰلِكَ ٱلْيَوْمُ ٱلْحَقُّ فَمَن شَآءَ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ مَـَٔابًا

data.english: We have warned you of a near punishment: the day a man will look on what his hands sent ahead, and the false claimer of guidance will say: “Would that I were dust!”
data.arabic: إِنَّآ أَنذَرْنَـٰكُمْ عَذَابًا قَرِيبًا يَوْمَ يَنظُرُ ٱلْمَرْءُ مَا قَدَّمَتْ يَدَاهُ وَيَقُولُ ٱلْكَافِرُ يَـٰلَيْتَنِى كُنتُ تُرَٰبًۢا

data.english: In the name of God, the Almighty, the Merciful.
data.arabic: بِسْمِ ٱللَّـهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ

data.english: By those who remove by drowning
data.arabic: وَٱلنَّـٰزِعَـٰتِ غَرْقًا

data.english: And those who draw forth by extracting!
data.arabic: وَٱلنَّـٰشِطَـٰتِ نَشْطًا

data.english: By those ever-swimming,
data.arabic: وَٱلسَّـٰبِحَـٰتِ سَبْحًا

data.english: And the foremost vanguard,
data.arabic: فَٱلسَّـٰبِقَـٰتِ سَبْقًا

data.english: And the arrangers of a matter!
data.arabic: فَٱلْمُدَبِّرَٰتِ أَمْرًا

data.english: On the day the convulsion convulses
data.arabic: يَوْمَ تَرْجُفُ ٱلرَّاجِفَةُ

data.english: There will follow it the second.
data.arabic: تَتْبَعُهَا ٱلرَّادِفَةُ

data.english: Hearts, that day, will tremble,
data.arabic: قُلُوبٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ وَاجِفَةٌ

data.english: Their eyes humbled.
data.arabic: أَبْصَـٰرُهَا خَـٰشِعَةٌ

data.english: (They say: “Are we to be returned to our former state,
data.arabic: يَقُولُونَ أَءِنَّا لَمَرْدُودُونَ فِى ٱلْحَافِرَةِ

data.english: Even when we are decayed bones?”
data.arabic: أَءِذَا كُنَّا عِظَـٰمًا نَّخِرَةً

data.english: They say: “That, then, would be a losing return!”)
data.arabic: قَالُوا۟ تِلْكَ إِذًا كَرَّةٌ خَاسِرَةٌ

data.english: And there will be but one cry
data.arabic: فَإِنَّمَا هِىَ زَجْرَةٌ وَٰحِدَةٌ

data.english: And then will they be awakened.
data.arabic: فَإِذَا هُم بِٱلسَّاهِرَةِ

data.english: Has there come to thee the account of Moses?
data.arabic: هَلْ أَتَىٰكَ حَدِيثُ مُوسَىٰٓ

data.english: When his Lord called him in the sacred valley of Ṭuwa:
data.arabic: إِذْ نَادَىٰهُ رَبُّهُۥ بِٱلْوَادِ ٱلْمُقَدَّسِ طُوًى

data.english: “Go thou to Pharaoh; he has transgressed.
data.arabic: ٱذْهَبْ إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ إِنَّهُۥ طَغَىٰ

data.english: “And say thou: ‘Wouldst thou purify thyself,
data.arabic: فَقُلْ هَل لَّكَ إِلَىٰٓ أَن تَزَكَّىٰ

data.english: “‘And that I guide thee to thy Lord, so thou shalt fear?’”
data.arabic: وَأَهْدِيَكَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ فَتَخْشَىٰ

data.english: And he showed him the greatest proof,
data.arabic: فَأَرَىٰهُ ٱلْـَٔايَةَ ٱلْكُبْرَىٰ

data.english: But he denied and opposed.
data.arabic: فَكَذَّبَ وَعَصَىٰ

data.english: Then turned he away in haste,
data.arabic: ثُمَّ أَدْبَرَ يَسْعَىٰ

data.english: And gathered and called,
data.arabic: فَحَشَرَ فَنَادَىٰ

data.english: And said: “I am your most high Lord.”
data.arabic: فَقَالَ أَنَا۠ رَبُّكُمُ ٱلْأَعْلَىٰ

data.english: So God seized him in exemplary punishment of the latter and the former.
data.arabic: فَأَخَذَهُ ٱللَّـهُ نَكَالَ ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ وَٱلْأُولَىٰٓ

data.english: In that is a lesson for him who fears.
data.arabic: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَعِبْرَةً لِّمَن يَخْشَىٰٓ

data.english: Are you harder in creation, or the sky? He built it;
data.arabic: ءَأَنتُمْ أَشَدُّ خَلْقًا أَمِ ٱلسَّمَآءُ بَنَىٰهَا

data.english: He raised the ceiling thereof, and fashioned it;
data.arabic: رَفَعَ سَمْكَهَا فَسَوَّىٰهَا

data.english: And He made dark its night, and brought forth its morning.
data.arabic: وَأَغْطَشَ لَيْلَهَا وَأَخْرَجَ ضُحَىٰهَا

data.english: And the earth, after that, He spread it out;
data.arabic: وَٱلْأَرْضَ بَعْدَ ذَٰلِكَ دَحَىٰهَآ

data.english: He brought forth therefrom its water and its pasture;
data.arabic: أَخْرَجَ مِنْهَا مَآءَهَا وَمَرْعَىٰهَا

data.english: And the mountains He set firmly
data.arabic: وَٱلْجِبَالَ أَرْسَىٰهَا

data.english: As enjoyment for you and for your cattle.
data.arabic: مَتَـٰعًا لَّكُمْ وَلِأَنْعَـٰمِكُمْ

data.english: Then, when the Greatest Calamity comes:
data.arabic: فَإِذَا جَآءَتِ ٱلطَّآمَّةُ ٱلْكُبْرَىٰ

data.english: The day man will remember for what he strove,
data.arabic: يَوْمَ يَتَذَكَّرُ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ مَا سَعَىٰ

data.english: And Hell will be made manifest to him who sees: —
data.arabic: وَبُرِّزَتِ ٱلْجَحِيمُ لِمَن يَرَىٰ

data.english: Then as for him who transgressed,
data.arabic: فَأَمَّا مَن طَغَىٰ

data.english: And preferred the life of this world:
data.arabic: وَءَاثَرَ ٱلْحَيَوٰةَ ٱلدُّنْيَا

data.english: Hell will be the shelter.
data.arabic: فَإِنَّ ٱلْجَحِيمَ هِىَ ٱلْمَأْوَىٰ

data.english: And as for him who feared the station of his Lord and restrained his soul from vain desire:
data.arabic: وَأَمَّا مَنْ خَافَ مَقَامَ رَبِّهِۦ وَنَهَى ٱلنَّفْسَ عَنِ ٱلْهَوَىٰ

data.english: The Garden will be the shelter.
data.arabic: فَإِنَّ ٱلْجَنَّةَ هِىَ ٱلْمَأْوَىٰ

data.english: They ask thee about the Hour: “When is its arrival?”
data.arabic: يَسْـَٔلُونَكَ عَنِ ٱلسَّاعَةِ أَيَّانَ مُرْسَىٰهَا

data.english: What is any reminder thereof to thee?
data.arabic: فِيمَ أَنتَ مِن ذِكْرَىٰهَآ

data.english: To thy Lord is the finality thereof.
data.arabic: إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ مُنتَهَىٰهَآ

data.english: Thou art but the warner of him who fears it.
data.arabic: إِنَّمَآ أَنتَ مُنذِرُ مَن يَخْشَىٰهَا

data.english: It will be, the day they see it, as though they had not tarried save a day’s end or a morning thereof.
data.arabic: كَأَنَّهُمْ يَوْمَ يَرَوْنَهَا لَمْ يَلْبَثُوٓا۟ إِلَّا عَشِيَّةً أَوْ ضُحَىٰهَا

data.english: In the name of God, the Almighty, the Merciful.
data.arabic: بِسْمِ ٱللَّـهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ

data.english: He frowned and turned away
data.arabic: عَبَسَ وَتَوَلَّىٰٓ

data.english: That the blind man came to him.
data.arabic: أَن جَآءَهُ ٱلْأَعْمَىٰ

data.english: And what can make thee know — he might purify himself,
data.arabic: وَمَا يُدْرِيكَ لَعَلَّهُۥ يَزَّكَّىٰٓ

data.english: Or take heed, and the reminder benefit him?
data.arabic: أَوْ يَذَّكَّرُ فَتَنفَعَهُ ٱلذِّكْرَىٰٓ

data.english: As for him who is self-sufficient:
data.arabic: أَمَّا مَنِ ٱسْتَغْنَىٰ

data.english: To him thou attendest,
data.arabic: فَأَنتَ لَهُۥ تَصَدَّىٰ

data.english: But not upon thee is it if he does not purify himself.
data.arabic: وَمَا عَلَيْكَ أَلَّا يَزَّكَّىٰ

data.english: And as for him who comes to thee, striving
data.arabic: وَأَمَّا مَن جَآءَكَ يَسْعَىٰ

data.english: And in fear:
data.arabic: وَهُوَ يَخْشَىٰ

data.english: From him thou art distracted.
data.arabic: فَأَنتَ عَنْهُ تَلَهَّىٰ

data.english: No, indeed! It is a reminder,
data.arabic: كَلَّآ إِنَّهَا تَذْكِرَةٌ

data.english: So whoso wills might remember it,
data.arabic: فَمَن شَآءَ ذَكَرَهُۥ

data.english: In honoured pages,
data.arabic: فِى صُحُفٍ مُّكَرَّمَةٍ

data.english: Exalted and purified,
data.arabic: مَّرْفُوعَةٍ مُّطَهَّرَةٍۭ

data.english: By the hands of scribes
data.arabic: بِأَيْدِى سَفَرَةٍ

data.english: Noble and virtuous.
data.arabic: كِرَامٍۭ بَرَرَةٍ

data.english: Damned be man! How denying he is!
data.arabic: قُتِلَ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ مَآ أَكْفَرَهُۥ

data.english: From what did He create him?
data.arabic: مِنْ أَىِّ شَىْءٍ خَلَقَهُۥ

data.english: From a sperm-drop He created him, and determined him;
data.arabic: مِن نُّطْفَةٍ خَلَقَهُۥ فَقَدَّرَهُۥ

data.english: Then He made the path easy for him;
data.arabic: ثُمَّ ٱلسَّبِيلَ يَسَّرَهُۥ

data.english: Then He gives him death and buries him;
data.arabic: ثُمَّ أَمَاتَهُۥ فَأَقْبَرَهُۥ

data.english: Then, when He wills, He resurrects him.
data.arabic: ثُمَّ إِذَا شَآءَ أَنشَرَهُۥ

data.english: No, indeed! He has not accomplished what He commanded him.
data.arabic: كَلَّا لَمَّا يَقْضِ مَآ أَمَرَهُۥ

data.english: So let man look at his food: —
data.arabic: فَلْيَنظُرِ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ إِلَىٰ طَعَامِهِۦٓ

data.english: That We poured water in showers;
data.arabic: أَنَّا صَبَبْنَا ٱلْمَآءَ صَبًّا

data.english: Then We split the earth in cracks,
data.arabic: ثُمَّ شَقَقْنَا ٱلْأَرْضَ شَقًّا

data.english: And We caused to grow therein grain,
data.arabic: فَأَنۢبَتْنَا فِيهَا حَبًّا

data.english: And grapes, and herbage,
data.arabic: وَعِنَبًا وَقَضْبًا

data.english: And olives, and date-palms,
data.arabic: وَزَيْتُونًا وَنَخْلًا

data.english: And gardens dense with foliage,
data.arabic: وَحَدَآئِقَ غُلْبًا

data.english: And fruits, and grass,
data.arabic: وَفَـٰكِهَةً وَأَبًّا

data.english: As enjoyment for you and your cattle.
data.arabic: مَّتَـٰعًا لَّكُمْ وَلِأَنْعَـٰمِكُمْ

data.english: Then when there comes the Blast:
data.arabic: فَإِذَا جَآءَتِ ٱلصَّآخَّةُ

data.english: The day a man will flee from his brother,
data.arabic: يَوْمَ يَفِرُّ ٱلْمَرْءُ مِنْ أَخِيهِ

data.english: And his mother, and his father,
data.arabic: وَأُمِّهِۦ وَأَبِيهِ

data.english: And his consort, and his sons,
data.arabic: وَصَـٰحِبَتِهِۦ وَبَنِيهِ

data.english: Every man of them, that day, will have an involvement to suffice him.
data.arabic: لِكُلِّ ٱمْرِئٍ مِّنْهُمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ شَأْنٌ يُغْنِيهِ

data.english: Faces, that day, will be bright,
data.arabic: وُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ مُّسْفِرَةٌ

data.english: Laughing, rejoicing at glad tidings.
data.arabic: ضَاحِكَةٌ مُّسْتَبْشِرَةٌ

data.english: And faces, that day, upon them will be dust,
data.arabic: وَوُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ عَلَيْهَا غَبَرَةٌ

data.english: Blackness will cover them;
data.arabic: تَرْهَقُهَا قَتَرَةٌ

data.english: It is they who are the deniers, the immoral.
data.arabic: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْكَفَرَةُ ٱلْفَجَرَةُ

data.english: In the name of God, the Almighty, the Merciful.
data.arabic: بِسْمِ ٱللَّـهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ

data.english: When the sun is wrapped up,
data.arabic: إِذَا ٱلشَّمْسُ كُوِّرَتْ

data.english: And when the stars fall,
data.arabic: وَإِذَا ٱلنُّجُومُ ٱنكَدَرَتْ

data.english: And when the mountains are set in motion,
data.arabic: وَإِذَا ٱلْجِبَالُ سُيِّرَتْ

data.english: And when the full-term she-camels are neglected,
data.arabic: وَإِذَا ٱلْعِشَارُ عُطِّلَتْ

data.english: And when the wild beasts are gathered,
data.arabic: وَإِذَا ٱلْوُحُوشُ حُشِرَتْ

data.english: And when the seas are made to overflow,
data.arabic: وَإِذَا ٱلْبِحَارُ سُجِّرَتْ

data.english: And when the souls are coupled,
data.arabic: وَإِذَا ٱلنُّفُوسُ زُوِّجَتْ

data.english: And when the infant girl buried alive is asked
data.arabic: وَإِذَا ٱلْمَوْءُۥدَةُ سُئِلَتْ

data.english: For what transgression she was killed,
data.arabic: بِأَىِّ ذَنۢبٍ قُتِلَتْ

data.english: And when the pages are spread,
data.arabic: وَإِذَا ٱلصُّحُفُ نُشِرَتْ

data.english: And when the sky is pulled away,
data.arabic: وَإِذَا ٱلسَّمَآءُ كُشِطَتْ

data.english: And when Hell is set ablaze,
data.arabic: وَإِذَا ٱلْجَحِيمُ سُعِّرَتْ

data.english: And when the Garden is brought near: —
data.arabic: وَإِذَا ٱلْجَنَّةُ أُزْلِفَتْ

data.english: A soul will know what it has brought.
data.arabic: عَلِمَتْ نَفْسٌ مَّآ أَحْضَرَتْ

data.english: Then do I swear by those retreating:
data.arabic: فَلَآ أُقْسِمُ بِٱلْخُنَّسِ

data.english: The ships withdrawing from view!
data.arabic: ٱلْجَوَارِ ٱلْكُنَّسِ

data.english: And the night when it darkens!
data.arabic: وَٱلَّيْلِ إِذَا عَسْعَسَ

data.english: And the dawn when it breathes!
data.arabic: وَٱلصُّبْحِ إِذَا تَنَفَّسَ

data.english: It is the word of a noble messenger,
data.arabic: إِنَّهُۥ لَقَوْلُ رَسُولٍ كَرِيمٍ

data.english: Possessor of power, with the Lord of the Throne secure,
data.arabic: ذِى قُوَّةٍ عِندَ ذِى ٱلْعَرْشِ مَكِينٍ

data.english: Obeyed there, and trustworthy.
data.arabic: مُّطَاعٍ ثَمَّ أَمِينٍ

data.english: And your companion is not possessed;
data.arabic: وَمَا صَاحِبُكُم بِمَجْنُونٍ

data.english: And he saw him on the clear horizon;
data.arabic: وَلَقَدْ رَءَاهُ بِٱلْأُفُقِ ٱلْمُبِينِ

data.english: And he is not niggardly of the Unseen.
data.arabic: وَمَا هُوَ عَلَى ٱلْغَيْبِ بِضَنِينٍ

data.english: And it is not the word of an accursed satan
data.arabic: وَمَا هُوَ بِقَوْلِ شَيْطَـٰنٍ رَّجِيمٍ

data.english: — So whither are you going? —
data.arabic: فَأَيْنَ تَذْهَبُونَ

data.english: It is only a reminder to all mankind,
data.arabic: إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكْرٌ لِّلْعَـٰلَمِينَ

data.english: For whom among you wills to take a straight path.
data.arabic: لِمَن شَآءَ مِنكُمْ أَن يَسْتَقِيمَ

data.english: And you will not save that God wills, the Lord of All Creation.
data.arabic: وَمَا تَشَآءُونَ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّـهُ رَبُّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ

data.english: In the name of God, the Almighty, the Merciful.
data.arabic: بِسْمِ ٱللَّـهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ

data.english: When the sky splits open,
data.arabic: إِذَا ٱلسَّمَآءُ ٱنفَطَرَتْ

data.english: And when the stars are scattered,
data.arabic: وَإِذَا ٱلْكَوَاكِبُ ٱنتَثَرَتْ

data.english: And when the seas are made to gush forth,
data.arabic: وَإِذَا ٱلْبِحَارُ فُجِّرَتْ

data.english: And when the graves are overturned,
data.arabic: وَإِذَا ٱلْقُبُورُ بُعْثِرَتْ

data.english: A soul will know what it has sent ahead and held back.
data.arabic: عَلِمَتْ نَفْسٌ مَّا قَدَّمَتْ وَأَخَّرَتْ

data.english: O man: what deluded thee concerning thy Lord, the Noble,
data.arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ مَا غَرَّكَ بِرَبِّكَ ٱلْكَرِيمِ

data.english: Who created thee and fashioned thee and proportioned thee in balance,
data.arabic: ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَكَ فَسَوَّىٰكَ فَعَدَلَكَ

data.english: In what form He willed assembling thee?
data.arabic: فِىٓ أَىِّ صُورَةٍ مَّا شَآءَ رَكَّبَكَ

data.english: No, indeed! The truth is, you deny the Judgment.
data.arabic: كَلَّا بَلْ تُكَذِّبُونَ بِٱلدِّينِ

data.english: And there are over you custodians,
data.arabic: وَإِنَّ عَلَيْكُمْ لَحَـٰفِظِينَ

data.english: Noble and writing.
data.arabic: كِرَامًا كَـٰتِبِينَ

data.english: They know what you do.
data.arabic: يَعْلَمُونَ مَا تَفْعَلُونَ

data.english: The virtuous will be in bliss,
data.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلْأَبْرَارَ لَفِى نَعِيمٍ

data.english: And the licentious will be in Hell.
data.arabic: وَإِنَّ ٱلْفُجَّارَ لَفِى جَحِيمٍ

data.english: They will burn therein on the Day of Judgment,
data.arabic: يَصْلَوْنَهَا يَوْمَ ٱلدِّينِ

data.english: And they will not therefrom be absent.
data.arabic: وَمَا هُمْ عَنْهَا بِغَآئِبِينَ

data.english: And what will convey to thee what the Day of Judgment is?
data.arabic: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا يَوْمُ ٱلدِّينِ

data.english: Then what will convey to thee what the Day of Judgment is! —
data.arabic: ثُمَّ مَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا يَوْمُ ٱلدِّينِ

data.english: The day no soul will possess power for another soul in anything, and the command, that day, belongs to God.
data.arabic: يَوْمَ لَا تَمْلِكُ نَفْسٌ لِّنَفْسٍ شَيْـًٔا وَٱلْأَمْرُ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلَّـهِ

data.english: In the name of God, the Almighty, the Merciful.
data.arabic: بِسْمِ ٱللَّـهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ

data.english: Woe to the unfair traders: —
data.arabic: وَيْلٌ لِّلْمُطَفِّفِينَ

data.english: Those who, when they take measure from men, take in full,
data.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ إِذَا ٱكْتَالُوا۟ عَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ يَسْتَوْفُونَ

data.english: But when they give them by measure or give them by weight, cause loss.
data.arabic: وَإِذَا كَالُوهُمْ أَو وَّزَنُوهُمْ يُخْسِرُونَ

data.english: Do those not think that they will be raised
data.arabic: أَلَا يَظُنُّ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ أَنَّهُم مَّبْعُوثُونَ

data.english: To a tremendous day: —
data.arabic: لِيَوْمٍ عَظِيمٍ

data.english: A day men will stand before the Lord of All Creation?
data.arabic: يَوْمَ يَقُومُ ٱلنَّاسُ لِرَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ

data.english: No, indeed! The writ of the licentious is in Sijjīn.
data.arabic: كَلَّآ إِنَّ كِتَـٰبَ ٱلْفُجَّارِ لَفِى سِجِّينٍ

data.english: And what will convey to thee what Sijjīn is?
data.arabic: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا سِجِّينٌ

data.english: A writ inscribed!
data.arabic: كِتَـٰبٌ مَّرْقُومٌ

data.english: Woe, that day, to the deniers,
data.arabic: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ

data.english: Those who deny the Day of Judgment!
data.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يُكَذِّبُونَ بِيَوْمِ ٱلدِّينِ

data.english: And none denies it save every sinful transgressor.
data.arabic: وَمَا يُكَذِّبُ بِهِۦٓ إِلَّا كُلُّ مُعْتَدٍ أَثِيمٍ

data.english: When Our proofs are recited to him, he says: “Legends of the former peoples.”
data.arabic: إِذَا تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْهِ ءَايَـٰتُنَا قَالَ أَسَـٰطِيرُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ

data.english: No, indeed! The truth is, what they earned conquered their hearts.
data.arabic: كَلَّا بَلْ رَانَ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِم مَّا كَانُوا۟ يَكْسِبُونَ

data.english: No, indeed! From their Lord, that day, will they be veiled;
data.arabic: كَلَّآ إِنَّهُمْ عَن رَّبِّهِمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ لَّمَحْجُوبُونَ

data.english: Then will they burn in Hell;
data.arabic: ثُمَّ إِنَّهُمْ لَصَالُوا۟ ٱلْجَحِيمِ

data.english: Then will it be said: “This is that which you denied.”
data.arabic: ثُمَّ يُقَالُ هَـٰذَا ٱلَّذِى كُنتُم بِهِۦ تُكَذِّبُونَ

data.english: No, indeed! The writ of the virtuous is in ʿIlliyyūn.
data.arabic: كَلَّآ إِنَّ كِتَـٰبَ ٱلْأَبْرَارِ لَفِى عِلِّيِّينَ

data.english: And what will convey to thee what ʿIlliyyūn is?
data.arabic: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا عِلِّيُّونَ

data.english: A writ inscribed
data.arabic: كِتَـٰبٌ مَّرْقُومٌ

data.english: To which bear witness those brought near!
data.arabic: يَشْهَدُهُ ٱلْمُقَرَّبُونَ

data.english: The virtuous will be in bliss,
data.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلْأَبْرَارَ لَفِى نَعِيمٍ

data.english: Upon couches looking on.
data.arabic: عَلَى ٱلْأَرَآئِكِ يَنظُرُونَ

data.english: Thou wilt recognise in their faces the radiance of bliss.
data.arabic: تَعْرِفُ فِى وُجُوهِهِمْ نَضْرَةَ ٱلنَّعِيمِ

data.english: They will be given to drink of a wine sealed,
data.arabic: يُسْقَوْنَ مِن رَّحِيقٍ مَّخْتُومٍ

data.english: Whose seal is musk — and for that let aspire those who aspire —
data.arabic: خِتَـٰمُهُۥ مِسْكٌ وَفِى ذَٰلِكَ فَلْيَتَنَافَسِ ٱلْمُتَنَـٰفِسُونَ

data.english: And its mixture of Tasnīm:
data.arabic: وَمِزَاجُهُۥ مِن تَسْنِيمٍ

data.english: A spring whereat drink those brought near.
data.arabic: عَيْنًا يَشْرَبُ بِهَا ٱلْمُقَرَّبُونَ

data.english: Those who were lawbreakers laughed at those who heeded warning,
data.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ أَجْرَمُوا۟ كَانُوا۟ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ يَضْحَكُونَ

data.english: And when they passed by them, they winked at one another.
data.arabic: وَإِذَا مَرُّوا۟ بِهِمْ يَتَغَامَزُونَ

data.english: And when they returned to their people, they returned delighting.
data.arabic: وَإِذَا ٱنقَلَبُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰٓ أَهْلِهِمُ ٱنقَلَبُوا۟ فَكِهِينَ

data.english: And when they saw them, they said: “These have gone astray.”
data.arabic: وَإِذَا رَأَوْهُمْ قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ لَضَآلُّونَ

data.english: But they were not sent as custodians over them.
data.arabic: وَمَآ أُرْسِلُوا۟ عَلَيْهِمْ حَـٰفِظِينَ

data.english: And this day those who heed warning laugh at the atheists,
data.arabic: فَٱلْيَوْمَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ مِنَ ٱلْكُفَّارِ يَضْحَكُونَ

data.english: Upon couches looking on.
data.arabic: عَلَى ٱلْأَرَآئِكِ يَنظُرُونَ

data.english: Are not the atheists requited for what they did?
data.arabic: هَلْ ثُوِّبَ ٱلْكُفَّارُ مَا كَانُوا۟ يَفْعَلُونَ

data.english: In the name of God, the Almighty, the Merciful.
data.arabic: بِسْمِ ٱللَّـهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ

data.english: When the sky is split asunder
data.arabic: إِذَا ٱلسَّمَآءُ ٱنشَقَّتْ

data.english: And hearkens to its Lord, as it must,
data.arabic: وَأَذِنَتْ لِرَبِّهَا وَحُقَّتْ

data.english: And when the earth is spread out
data.arabic: وَإِذَا ٱلْأَرْضُ مُدَّتْ

data.english: And casts forth all that is in it and is empty,
data.arabic: وَأَلْقَتْ مَا فِيهَا وَتَخَلَّتْ

data.english: And hearkens to its Lord, as it must––
data.arabic: وَأَذِنَتْ لِرَبِّهَا وَحُقَّتْ

data.english: O man: thou art toiling towards thy Lord with labour, and wilt meet Him!
data.arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ إِنَّكَ كَادِحٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ كَدْحًا فَمُلَـٰقِيهِ

data.english: Then as for him who is given his writ in his right hand:
data.arabic: فَأَمَّا مَنْ أُوتِىَ كِتَـٰبَهُۥ بِيَمِينِهِۦ

data.english: He will be called to account with an easy reckoning,
data.arabic: فَسَوْفَ يُحَاسَبُ حِسَابًا يَسِيرًا

data.english: And he will return to his people in happiness.
data.arabic: وَيَنقَلِبُ إِلَىٰٓ أَهْلِهِۦ مَسْرُورًا

data.english: And as for him who is given his writ behind his back:
data.arabic: وَأَمَّا مَنْ أُوتِىَ كِتَـٰبَهُۥ وَرَآءَ ظَهْرِهِۦ

data.english: He will call for destruction,
data.arabic: فَسَوْفَ يَدْعُوا۟ ثُبُورًا

data.english: And burn in an inferno.
data.arabic: وَيَصْلَىٰ سَعِيرًا

data.english: He was among his people in happiness;
data.arabic: إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ فِىٓ أَهْلِهِۦ مَسْرُورًا

data.english: He thought he would never return.
data.arabic: إِنَّهُۥ ظَنَّ أَن لَّن يَحُورَ

data.english: Verily, his Lord saw him.
data.arabic: بَلَىٰٓ إِنَّ رَبَّهُۥ كَانَ بِهِۦ بَصِيرًا

data.english: Then do I swear by the twilight glow!
data.arabic: فَلَآ أُقْسِمُ بِٱلشَّفَقِ

data.english: And by the night and what it envelops!
data.arabic: وَٱلَّيْلِ وَمَا وَسَقَ

data.english: And by the moon when it is full!
data.arabic: وَٱلْقَمَرِ إِذَا ٱتَّسَقَ

data.english: You will embark upon stage after stage.
data.arabic: لَتَرْكَبُنَّ طَبَقًا عَن طَبَقٍ

data.english: Then what ails them that they do not believe,
data.arabic: فَمَا لَهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ

data.english: And when the Qur’an is recited to them, do not submit?
data.arabic: وَإِذَا قُرِئَ عَلَيْهِمُ ٱلْقُرْءَانُ لَا يَسْجُدُونَ

data.english: The truth is, those who ignore warning deny,
data.arabic: بَلِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ يُكَذِّبُونَ

data.english: And God best knows what they hoard.
data.arabic: وَٱللَّـهُ أَعْلَمُ بِمَا يُوعُونَ

data.english: So give thou them tidings of a painful punishment,
data.arabic: فَبَشِّرْهُم بِعَذَابٍ أَلِيمٍ

data.english: Save those who heed warning and do righteous deeds — they have a reward unending.
data.arabic: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ لَهُمْ أَجْرٌ غَيْرُ مَمْنُونٍۭ

data.english: In the name of God, the Almighty, the Merciful.
data.arabic: بِسْمِ ٱللَّـهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ

data.english: By the sky full of constellations!
data.arabic: وَٱلسَّمَآءِ ذَاتِ ٱلْبُرُوجِ

data.english: And by the Promised Day!
data.arabic: وَٱلْيَوْمِ ٱلْمَوْعُودِ

data.english: And by the witness and the witnessed!
data.arabic: وَشَاهِدٍ وَمَشْهُودٍ

data.english: Damned be the companions of the trench,
data.arabic: قُتِلَ أَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلْأُخْدُودِ

data.english: Of the fuel-filled fire,
data.arabic: ٱلنَّارِ ذَاتِ ٱلْوَقُودِ

data.english: When they sit over it
data.arabic: إِذْ هُمْ عَلَيْهَا قُعُودٌ

data.english: And are, of what they do with the believers, witnesses.
data.arabic: وَهُمْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَفْعَلُونَ بِٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ شُهُودٌ

data.english: And they resent them only that they believe in God, the Exalted in Might, the Praiseworthy,
data.arabic: وَمَا نَقَمُوا۟ مِنْهُمْ إِلَّآ أَن يُؤْمِنُوا۟ بِٱللَّـهِ ٱلْعَزِيزِ ٱلْحَمِيدِ

data.english: To whom belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth; and God is witness over all things.
data.arabic: ٱلَّذِى لَهُۥ مُلْكُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَٱللَّـهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ شَهِيدٌ

data.english: Those who subject the believing men and the believing women to means of denial, then repent not: they have the punishment of Gehenna — and they have the punishment of the consuming fire.
data.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ فَتَنُوا۟ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَٱلْمُؤْمِنَـٰتِ ثُمَّ لَمْ يَتُوبُوا۟ فَلَهُمْ عَذَابُ جَهَنَّمَ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابُ ٱلْحَرِيقِ

data.english: Those who heed warning and do righteous deeds: they have gardens beneath which rivers flow; that is the Great Achievement.
data.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ لَهُمْ جَنَّـٰتٌ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلْفَوْزُ ٱلْكَبِيرُ

data.english: The might of thy Lord is strong.
data.arabic: إِنَّ بَطْشَ رَبِّكَ لَشَدِيدٌ

data.english: He is it who originates, and He repeats.
data.arabic: إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ يُبْدِئُ وَيُعِيدُ

data.english: And He is the Forgiving, the Loving,
data.arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلْغَفُورُ ٱلْوَدُودُ

data.english: Owner of the Throne, the Glorious,
data.arabic: ذُو ٱلْعَرْشِ ٱلْمَجِيدُ

data.english: Doer of what He intends.
data.arabic: فَعَّالٌ لِّمَا يُرِيدُ

data.english: Has there come to thee the account of the forces
data.arabic: هَلْ أَتَىٰكَ حَدِيثُ ٱلْجُنُودِ

data.english: Of Pharaoh, and of Thamūd?
data.arabic: فِرْعَوْنَ وَثَمُودَ

data.english: The truth is, those who ignore warning are in denial,
data.arabic: بَلِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ فِى تَكْذِيبٍ

data.english: But God is behind them, encompassing.
data.arabic: وَٱللَّـهُ مِن وَرَآئِهِم مُّحِيطٌۢ

data.english: The truth is, it is a glorious recitation
data.arabic: بَلْ هُوَ قُرْءَانٌ مَّجِيدٌ

data.english: In a protected tablet.
data.arabic: فِى لَوْحٍ مَّحْفُوظٍۭ

data.english: In the name of God, the Almighty, the Merciful.
data.arabic: بِسْمِ ٱللَّـهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ

data.english: By the sky and the night-comer!
data.arabic: وَٱلسَّمَآءِ وَٱلطَّارِقِ

data.english: And what will convey to thee what the night-comer is?
data.arabic: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا ٱلطَّارِقُ

data.english: The piercing star!
data.arabic: ٱلنَّجْمُ ٱلثَّاقِبُ

data.english: There is no soul but has over it a custodian.
data.arabic: إِن كُلُّ نَفْسٍ لَّمَّا عَلَيْهَا حَافِظٌ

data.english: So let man look from what he was created:
data.arabic: فَلْيَنظُرِ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ مِمَّ خُلِقَ

data.english: He was created from a gushing water,
data.arabic: خُلِقَ مِن مَّآءٍ دَافِقٍ

data.english: Issuing forth from between the loins and the breast-bones.
data.arabic: يَخْرُجُ مِنۢ بَيْنِ ٱلصُّلْبِ وَٱلتَّرَآئِبِ

data.english: He is able to return him.
data.arabic: إِنَّهُۥ عَلَىٰ رَجْعِهِۦ لَقَادِرٌ

data.english: The day the secrets are tried,
data.arabic: يَوْمَ تُبْلَى ٱلسَّرَآئِرُ

data.english: Then will he have neither power nor helper.
data.arabic: فَمَا لَهُۥ مِن قُوَّةٍ وَلَا نَاصِرٍ

data.english: By the sky full of returning!
data.arabic: وَٱلسَّمَآءِ ذَاتِ ٱلرَّجْعِ

data.english: And by the earth full of cracks!
data.arabic: وَٱلْأَرْضِ ذَاتِ ٱلصَّدْعِ

data.english: It is a decisive word,
data.arabic: إِنَّهُۥ لَقَوْلٌ فَصْلٌ

data.english: And it is not in jest.
data.arabic: وَمَا هُوَ بِٱلْهَزْلِ

data.english: They plan a plan —
data.arabic: إِنَّهُمْ يَكِيدُونَ كَيْدًا

data.english: And I plan a plan.
data.arabic: وَأَكِيدُ كَيْدًا

data.english: So grant thou respite to the false claimers of guidance; grant thou them respite awhile.
data.arabic: فَمَهِّلِ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ أَمْهِلْهُمْ رُوَيْدًۢا

data.english: In the name of God, the Almighty, the Merciful.
data.arabic: بِسْمِ ٱللَّـهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ

data.english: Glorify thou the name of thy Lord, the Most High,
data.arabic: سَبِّحِ ٱسْمَ رَبِّكَ ٱلْأَعْلَى

data.english: Who created and fashioned,
data.arabic: ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ فَسَوَّىٰ

data.english: And who determined and guided,
data.arabic: وَٱلَّذِى قَدَّرَ فَهَدَىٰ

data.english: And who brought forth the pasture
data.arabic: وَٱلَّذِىٓ أَخْرَجَ ٱلْمَرْعَىٰ

data.english: Then made it blackening decaying herbage
data.arabic: فَجَعَلَهُۥ غُثَآءً أَحْوَىٰ

data.english: (We will make thee recite, and thou wilt not forget.)
data.arabic: سَنُقْرِئُكَ فَلَا تَنسَىٰٓ

data.english: Save that God should will; He knows the apparent and the hidden.
data.arabic: إِلَّا مَا شَآءَ ٱللَّـهُ إِنَّهُۥ يَعْلَمُ ٱلْجَهْرَ وَمَا يَخْفَىٰ

data.english: And We will ease thee towards ease.
data.arabic: وَنُيَسِّرُكَ لِلْيُسْرَىٰ

data.english: So remind thou; if the reminder should benefit
data.arabic: فَذَكِّرْ إِن نَّفَعَتِ ٱلذِّكْرَىٰ

data.english: He will take heed who fears.
data.arabic: سَيَذَّكَّرُ مَن يَخْشَىٰ

data.english: But the most wretched will avoid it,
data.arabic: وَيَتَجَنَّبُهَا ٱلْأَشْقَى

data.english: Who will burn in the Great Fire,
data.arabic: ٱلَّذِى يَصْلَى ٱلنَّارَ ٱلْكُبْرَىٰ

data.english: Then will he neither die therein nor live.
data.arabic: ثُمَّ لَا يَمُوتُ فِيهَا وَلَا يَحْيَىٰ

data.english: He is successful who has purified himself,
data.arabic: قَدْ أَفْلَحَ مَن تَزَكَّىٰ

data.english: And remembers the name of his Lord and performs the duty.
data.arabic: وَذَكَرَ ٱسْمَ رَبِّهِۦ فَصَلَّىٰ

data.english: The truth is, you prefer the life of this world
data.arabic: بَلْ تُؤْثِرُونَ ٱلْحَيَوٰةَ ٱلدُّنْيَا

data.english: When the Hereafter is better and more enduring.
data.arabic: وَٱلْـَٔاخِرَةُ خَيْرٌ وَأَبْقَىٰٓ

data.english: This is in the former scriptures,
data.arabic: إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَفِى ٱلصُّحُفِ ٱلْأُولَىٰ

data.english: The scriptures of Abraham and Moses.
data.arabic: صُحُفِ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ وَمُوسَىٰ

data.english: In the name of God, the Almighty, the Merciful.
data.arabic: بِسْمِ ٱللَّـهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ

data.english: Has there come to thee the narrative of the Enveloping?
data.arabic: هَلْ أَتَىٰكَ حَدِيثُ ٱلْغَـٰشِيَةِ

data.english: Faces, that day, will be humbled:
data.arabic: وُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ خَـٰشِعَةٌ

data.english: Toiling, exhausted,
data.arabic: عَامِلَةٌ نَّاصِبَةٌ

data.english: Burning in a scorching Fire,
data.arabic: تَصْلَىٰ نَارًا حَامِيَةً

data.english: Watered from a boiling spring.
data.arabic: تُسْقَىٰ مِنْ عَيْنٍ ءَانِيَةٍ

data.english: They have no food save of poisonous thorns:
data.arabic: لَّيْسَ لَهُمْ طَعَامٌ إِلَّا مِن ضَرِيعٍ

data.english: Neither sustaining, nor availing against hunger.
data.arabic: لَّا يُسْمِنُ وَلَا يُغْنِى مِن جُوعٍ

data.english: Faces, that day, will be joyous:
data.arabic: وُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ نَّاعِمَةٌ

data.english: With their striving well-pleased,
data.arabic: لِّسَعْيِهَا رَاضِيَةٌ

data.english: In a high garden.
data.arabic: فِى جَنَّةٍ عَالِيَةٍ

data.english: They hear therein no vain speech;
data.arabic: لَّا تَسْمَعُ فِيهَا لَـٰغِيَةً

data.english: Therein — a flowing spring;
data.arabic: فِيهَا عَيْنٌ جَارِيَةٌ

data.english: Therein — couches raised,
data.arabic: فِيهَا سُرُرٌ مَّرْفُوعَةٌ

data.english: And cups set,
data.arabic: وَأَكْوَابٌ مَّوْضُوعَةٌ

data.english: And cushions arrayed,
data.arabic: وَنَمَارِقُ مَصْفُوفَةٌ

data.english: And carpets outspread.
data.arabic: وَزَرَابِىُّ مَبْثُوثَةٌ

data.english: Will they then not look at the camels — how they were created!
data.arabic: أَفَلَا يَنظُرُونَ إِلَى ٱلْإِبِلِ كَيْفَ خُلِقَتْ

data.english: And at the sky — how it was raised!
data.arabic: وَإِلَى ٱلسَّمَآءِ كَيْفَ رُفِعَتْ

data.english: And at the mountains — how they were erected!
data.arabic: وَإِلَى ٱلْجِبَالِ كَيْفَ نُصِبَتْ

data.english: And at the earth — how it was spread out!
data.arabic: وَإِلَى ٱلْأَرْضِ كَيْفَ سُطِحَتْ

data.english: So remind thou; thou art but one reminding,
data.arabic: فَذَكِّرْ إِنَّمَآ أَنتَ مُذَكِّرٌ

data.english: Thou art not over them an overseer.
data.arabic: لَّسْتَ عَلَيْهِم بِمُصَيْطِرٍ

data.english: But whoso turns away and denies,
data.arabic: إِلَّا مَن تَوَلَّىٰ وَكَفَرَ

data.english: God will punish him with the greatest punishment.
data.arabic: فَيُعَذِّبُهُ ٱللَّـهُ ٱلْعَذَابَ ٱلْأَكْبَرَ

data.english: To Us is their return;
data.arabic: إِنَّ إِلَيْنَآ إِيَابَهُمْ

data.english: Then upon Us is their reckoning.
data.arabic: ثُمَّ إِنَّ عَلَيْنَا حِسَابَهُم

data.english: In the name of God, the Almighty, the Merciful.
data.arabic: بِسْمِ ٱللَّـهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ

data.english: By the dawn,
data.arabic: وَٱلْفَجْرِ

data.english: And ten nights,
data.arabic: وَلَيَالٍ عَشْرٍ

data.english: And the even and the odd,
data.arabic: وَٱلشَّفْعِ وَٱلْوَتْرِ

data.english: And the night when he departs!
data.arabic: وَٱلَّيْلِ إِذَا يَسْرِ

data.english: Is there not in that an oath for one of intelligence?
data.arabic: هَلْ فِى ذَٰلِكَ قَسَمٌ لِّذِى حِجْرٍ

data.english: Hast thou not considered how thy Lord did with ʿĀd,
data.arabic: أَلَمْ تَرَ كَيْفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِعَادٍ

data.english: Iram of the pillars,
data.arabic: إِرَمَ ذَاتِ ٱلْعِمَادِ

data.english: The like of which had never been created in the land,
data.arabic: ٱلَّتِى لَمْ يُخْلَقْ مِثْلُهَا فِى ٱلْبِلَـٰدِ

data.english: And Thamūd, who hollowed the rocks in the valley,
data.arabic: وَثَمُودَ ٱلَّذِينَ جَابُوا۟ ٱلصَّخْرَ بِٱلْوَادِ

data.english: And Pharaoh, the Lord of Stakes
data.arabic: وَفِرْعَوْنَ ذِى ٱلْأَوْتَادِ

data.english: Who transgressed all bounds in the lands,
data.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ طَغَوْا۟ فِى ٱلْبِلَـٰدِ

data.english: And increased corruption therein?
data.arabic: فَأَكْثَرُوا۟ فِيهَا ٱلْفَسَادَ

data.english: So thy Lord poured upon them a scourge of punishment.
data.arabic: فَصَبَّ عَلَيْهِمْ رَبُّكَ سَوْطَ عَذَابٍ

data.english: Thy Lord is ever watchful.
data.arabic: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَبِٱلْمِرْصَادِ

data.english: And as for man, when his Lord tries him, and honours him, and favours him, he says: “My Lord has honoured me.”
data.arabic: فَأَمَّا ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ إِذَا مَا ٱبْتَلَىٰهُ رَبُّهُۥ فَأَكْرَمَهُۥ وَنَعَّمَهُۥ فَيَقُولُ رَبِّىٓ أَكْرَمَنِ

data.english: But when He tries him, and straitens his provision, he says: “My Lord has humiliated me.”
data.arabic: وَأَمَّآ إِذَا مَا ٱبْتَلَىٰهُ فَقَدَرَ عَلَيْهِ رِزْقَهُۥ فَيَقُولُ رَبِّىٓ أَهَـٰنَنِ

data.english: No, indeed! The truth is, you honour not the fatherless,
data.arabic: كَلَّا بَل لَّا تُكْرِمُونَ ٱلْيَتِيمَ

data.english: Nor encourage one another to feed the needy,
data.arabic: وَلَا تَحَـٰٓضُّونَ عَلَىٰ طَعَامِ ٱلْمِسْكِينِ

data.english: But consume the inheritance with greed,
data.arabic: وَتَأْكُلُونَ ٱلتُّرَاثَ أَكْلًا لَّمًّا

data.english: And love wealth with much love.
data.arabic: وَتُحِبُّونَ ٱلْمَالَ حُبًّا جَمًّا

data.english: No, indeed! When the earth is ground to powder,
data.arabic: كَلَّآ إِذَا دُكَّتِ ٱلْأَرْضُ دَكًّا دَكًّا

data.english: And thy Lord comes — and the angels, rank upon rank —
data.arabic: وَجَآءَ رَبُّكَ وَٱلْمَلَكُ صَفًّا صَفًّا

data.english: And Gehenna, that day, is brought: that day will man take heed; but how will the reminder be for him?
data.arabic: وَجِا۟ىٓءَ يَوْمَئِذٍۭ بِجَهَنَّمَ يَوْمَئِذٍ يَتَذَكَّرُ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ وَأَنَّىٰ لَهُ ٱلذِّكْرَىٰ

data.english: He will say: “Would that I had sent ahead for my life!”
data.arabic: يَقُولُ يَـٰلَيْتَنِى قَدَّمْتُ لِحَيَاتِى

data.english: And — that day — none will punish as His punishment,
data.arabic: فَيَوْمَئِذٍ لَّا يُعَذِّبُ عَذَابَهُۥٓ أَحَدٌ

data.english: And none will bind as His binding.
data.arabic: وَلَا يُوثِقُ وَثَاقَهُۥٓ أَحَدٌ

data.english: “O thou soul at peace:
data.arabic: يَـٰٓأَيَّتُهَا ٱلنَّفْسُ ٱلْمُطْمَئِنَّةُ

data.english: “Return thou to thy Lord — well-pleased and well-pleasing,
data.arabic: ٱرْجِعِىٓ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكِ رَاضِيَةً مَّرْضِيَّةً

data.english: “And enter thou among My servants.
data.arabic: فَٱدْخُلِى فِى عِبَـٰدِى

data.english: “And enter thou My Garden.”
data.arabic: وَٱدْخُلِى جَنَّتِى

data.english: In the name of God, the Almighty, the Merciful.
data.arabic: بِسْمِ ٱللَّـهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ

data.english: I swear by this land!
data.arabic: لَآ أُقْسِمُ بِهَـٰذَا ٱلْبَلَدِ

data.english: — And thou art a freeman in this land —
data.arabic: وَأَنتَ حِلٌّۢ بِهَـٰذَا ٱلْبَلَدِ

data.english: And by the begetter and what he begot!
data.arabic: وَوَالِدٍ وَمَا وَلَدَ

data.english: We have created man into adversity.
data.arabic: لَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ فِى كَبَدٍ

data.english: Thinks he that none has power over him?
data.arabic: أَيَحْسَبُ أَن لَّن يَقْدِرَ عَلَيْهِ أَحَدٌ

data.english: He says: “I have spent abundant wealth!”
data.arabic: يَقُولُ أَهْلَكْتُ مَالًا لُّبَدًا

data.english: Thinks he that none has seen him?
data.arabic: أَيَحْسَبُ أَن لَّمْ يَرَهُۥٓ أَحَدٌ

data.english: Have We not made for him two eyes,
data.arabic: أَلَمْ نَجْعَل لَّهُۥ عَيْنَيْنِ

data.english: And a tongue, and two lips,
data.arabic: وَلِسَانًا وَشَفَتَيْنِ

data.english: And guided him on the two highways?
data.arabic: وَهَدَيْنَـٰهُ ٱلنَّجْدَيْنِ

data.english: But he has not attempted the steep path.
data.arabic: فَلَا ٱقْتَحَمَ ٱلْعَقَبَةَ

data.english: And what will convey to thee what the steep path is?
data.arabic: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا ٱلْعَقَبَةُ

data.english: The freeing of a slave,
data.arabic: فَكُّ رَقَبَةٍ

data.english: Or feeding in a day of starvation
data.arabic: أَوْ إِطْعَـٰمٌ فِى يَوْمٍ ذِى مَسْغَبَةٍ

data.english: A fatherless relation
data.arabic: يَتِيمًا ذَا مَقْرَبَةٍ

data.english: Or one needy in misery
data.arabic: أَوْ مِسْكِينًا ذَا مَتْرَبَةٍ

data.english: Then being among those who heed warning, and counsel one another to patience, and counsel one another to compassion.
data.arabic: ثُمَّ كَانَ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَتَوَاصَوْا۟ بِٱلصَّبْرِ وَتَوَاصَوْا۟ بِٱلْمَرْحَمَةِ

data.english: Those are the companions of the right.
data.arabic: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ أَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلْمَيْمَنَةِ

data.english: But those who deny Our proofs — they are the companions of the left.
data.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا هُمْ أَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلْمَشْـَٔمَةِ

data.english: Upon them will a Fire be closed in.
data.arabic: عَلَيْهِمْ نَارٌ مُّؤْصَدَةٌۢ

data.english: In the name of God, the Almighty, the Merciful.
data.arabic: بِسْمِ ٱللَّـهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ

data.english: By the sun and its morning brightness!
data.arabic: وَٱلشَّمْسِ وَضُحَىٰهَا

data.english: And by the moon when it follows it!
data.arabic: وَٱلْقَمَرِ إِذَا تَلَىٰهَا

data.english: And by the day when it reveals it!
data.arabic: وَٱلنَّهَارِ إِذَا جَلَّىٰهَا

data.english: And by the night when it covers it!
data.arabic: وَٱلَّيْلِ إِذَا يَغْشَىٰهَا

data.english: And by the sky and Him that built it!
data.arabic: وَٱلسَّمَآءِ وَمَا بَنَىٰهَا

data.english: And by the earth and Him that extended it!
data.arabic: وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا طَحَىٰهَا

data.english: And by a soul and Him that fashioned it,
data.arabic: وَنَفْسٍ وَمَا سَوَّىٰهَا

data.english: And inspired it with its immorality and its prudent fear!
data.arabic: فَأَلْهَمَهَا فُجُورَهَا وَتَقْوَىٰهَا

data.english: He has succeeded who increased it in purity,
data.arabic: قَدْ أَفْلَحَ مَن زَكَّىٰهَا

data.english: And he has failed who buried it
data.arabic: وَقَدْ خَابَ مَن دَسَّىٰهَا

data.english: (Thamūd denied in its transgression
data.arabic: كَذَّبَتْ ثَمُودُ بِطَغْوَىٰهَآ

data.english: When its most wretched was sent forth.
data.arabic: إِذِ ٱنۢبَعَثَ أَشْقَىٰهَا

data.english: The messenger of God said to them: “The she-camel of God — let her drink.”
data.arabic: فَقَالَ لَهُمْ رَسُولُ ٱللَّـهِ نَاقَةَ ٱللَّـهِ وَسُقْيَـٰهَا

data.english: Then they denied him, and hamstrung her; and their Lord destroyed them for their transgression, and He levelled them.)
data.arabic: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَعَقَرُوهَا فَدَمْدَمَ عَلَيْهِمْ رَبُّهُم بِذَنۢبِهِمْ فَسَوَّىٰهَا

data.english: And fears not its final outcome.
data.arabic: وَلَا يَخَافُ عُقْبَـٰهَا

data.english: In the name of God, the Almighty, the Merciful.
data.arabic: بِسْمِ ٱللَّـهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ

data.english: By the night when it covers!
data.arabic: وَٱلَّيْلِ إِذَا يَغْشَىٰ

data.english: And by the day when it shines forth!
data.arabic: وَٱلنَّهَارِ إِذَا تَجَلَّىٰ

data.english: And by Him that created the male and the female!
data.arabic: وَمَا خَلَقَ ٱلذَّكَرَ وَٱلْأُنثَىٰٓ

data.english: Your efforts are diverse.
data.arabic: إِنَّ سَعْيَكُمْ لَشَتَّىٰ

data.english: And as for him who gives and is in prudent fear,
data.arabic: فَأَمَّا مَنْ أَعْطَىٰ وَٱتَّقَىٰ

data.english: And confirms the best:
data.arabic: وَصَدَّقَ بِٱلْحُسْنَىٰ

data.english: We will ease him towards ease.
data.arabic: فَسَنُيَسِّرُهُۥ لِلْيُسْرَىٰ

data.english: And as for him who is miserly, and self-sufficient,
data.arabic: وَأَمَّا مَنۢ بَخِلَ وَٱسْتَغْنَىٰ

data.english: And denies the best:
data.arabic: وَكَذَّبَ بِٱلْحُسْنَىٰ

data.english: We will ease him towards hardship,
data.arabic: فَسَنُيَسِّرُهُۥ لِلْعُسْرَىٰ

data.english: And his wealth will not avail him when he falls.
data.arabic: وَمَا يُغْنِى عَنْهُ مَالُهُۥٓ إِذَا تَرَدَّىٰٓ

data.english: Upon Us is the guidance,
data.arabic: إِنَّ عَلَيْنَا لَلْـهُدَىٰ

data.english: And to Us belong the latter and the former.
data.arabic: وَإِنَّ لَنَا لَلْـَٔاخِرَةَ وَٱلْأُولَىٰ

data.english: So I have warned you of a raging Fire
data.arabic: فَأَنذَرْتُكُمْ نَارًا تَلَظَّىٰ

data.english: In which burns only the most wretched:
data.arabic: لَا يَصْلَىٰهَآ إِلَّا ٱلْأَشْقَى

data.english: Who denied and turned away.
data.arabic: ٱلَّذِى كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ

data.english: And the most prudent in fear will be kept from it:
data.arabic: وَسَيُجَنَّبُهَا ٱلْأَتْقَى

data.english: Who gives his wealth to purify himself,
data.arabic: ٱلَّذِى يُؤْتِى مَالَهُۥ يَتَزَكَّىٰ

data.english: And not that any have a favour to be rewarded,
data.arabic: وَمَا لِأَحَدٍ عِندَهُۥ مِن نِّعْمَةٍ تُجْزَىٰٓ

data.english: Only seeking the face of his Lord, the Most High;
data.arabic: إِلَّا ٱبْتِغَآءَ وَجْهِ رَبِّهِ ٱلْأَعْلَىٰ

data.english: And he will be satisfied.
data.arabic: وَلَسَوْفَ يَرْضَىٰ

data.english: In the name of God, the Almighty, the Merciful.
data.arabic: بِسْمِ ٱللَّـهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ

data.english: By the morning light!
data.arabic: وَٱلضُّحَىٰ

data.english: And by the night when it shrouds in darkness!
data.arabic: وَٱلَّيْلِ إِذَا سَجَىٰ

data.english: Thy Lord has neither forsaken nor loathed thee.
data.arabic: مَا وَدَّعَكَ رَبُّكَ وَمَا قَلَىٰ

data.english: And the latter will be better for thee than the former.
data.arabic: وَلَلْـَٔاخِرَةُ خَيْرٌ لَّكَ مِنَ ٱلْأُولَىٰ

data.english: And thy Lord will give to thee, and thou wilt be satisfied.
data.arabic: وَلَسَوْفَ يُعْطِيكَ رَبُّكَ فَتَرْضَىٰٓ

data.english: Did He not find thee fatherless, and give shelter,
data.arabic: أَلَمْ يَجِدْكَ يَتِيمًا فَـَٔاوَىٰ

data.english: And find thee astray, and guide,
data.arabic: وَوَجَدَكَ ضَآلًّا فَهَدَىٰ

data.english: And find thee in need, and make sufficient?
data.arabic: وَوَجَدَكَ عَآئِلًا فَأَغْنَىٰ

data.english: Then as for the fatherless: oppress thou not.
data.arabic: فَأَمَّا ٱلْيَتِيمَ فَلَا تَقْهَرْ

data.english: And as for the petitioner: repel thou not.
data.arabic: وَأَمَّا ٱلسَّآئِلَ فَلَا تَنْهَرْ

data.english: And as for the favour of thy Lord: recount thou!
data.arabic: وَأَمَّا بِنِعْمَةِ رَبِّكَ فَحَدِّثْ

data.english: In the name of God, the Almighty, the Merciful.
data.arabic: بِسْمِ ٱللَّـهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ

data.english: Did We not expand thy breast for thee,
data.arabic: أَلَمْ نَشْرَحْ لَكَ صَدْرَكَ

data.english: And lay down from thee thy burden
data.arabic: وَوَضَعْنَا عَنكَ وِزْرَكَ

data.english: Which weighed down thy back?
data.arabic: ٱلَّذِىٓ أَنقَضَ ظَهْرَكَ

data.english: And We raised for thee thy remembrance.
data.arabic: وَرَفَعْنَا لَكَ ذِكْرَكَ

data.english: And with hardship is ease.
data.arabic: فَإِنَّ مَعَ ٱلْعُسْرِ يُسْرًا

data.english: With hardship is ease.
data.arabic: إِنَّ مَعَ ٱلْعُسْرِ يُسْرًا

data.english: So when thou art unoccupied, make thou ready,
data.arabic: فَإِذَا فَرَغْتَ فَٱنصَبْ

data.english: And to thy Lord turn thou thy desire.
data.arabic: وَإِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ فَٱرْغَب

data.english: In the name of God, the Almighty, the Merciful.
data.arabic: بِّسْمِ ٱللَّـهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ

data.english: By the fig and the olive!
data.arabic: وَٱلتِّينِ وَٱلزَّيْتُونِ

data.english: By Mount Sīnīn!
data.arabic: وَطُورِ سِينِينَ

data.english: By this land secure!
data.arabic: وَهَـٰذَا ٱلْبَلَدِ ٱلْأَمِينِ

data.english: We have created man in the best form,
data.arabic: لَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ فِىٓ أَحْسَنِ تَقْوِيمٍ

data.english: Then We return him to the lowest of the low,
data.arabic: ثُمَّ رَدَدْنَـٰهُ أَسْفَلَ سَـٰفِلِينَ

data.english: Save those who heed warning and do righteous deeds — they will have a reward unending.
data.arabic: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ فَلَهُمْ أَجْرٌ غَيْرُ مَمْنُونٍ

data.english: And what yet causes thee to deny the Doctrine?
data.arabic: فَمَا يُكَذِّبُكَ بَعْدُ بِٱلدِّينِ

data.english: Is then God not the most just of judges?
data.arabic: أَلَيْسَ ٱللَّـهُ بِأَحْكَمِ ٱلْحَـٰكِمِينَ

data.english: In the name of God, the Almighty, the Merciful.
data.arabic: بِسْمِ ٱللَّـهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ

data.english: Recite thou in the name of thy Lord who created,
data.arabic: ٱقْرَأْ بِٱسْمِ رَبِّكَ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ

data.english: Created man from a clinging thing.
data.arabic: خَلَقَ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ مِنْ عَلَقٍ

data.english: Recite thou, and thy Lord is the Most Noble,
data.arabic: ٱقْرَأْ وَرَبُّكَ ٱلْأَكْرَمُ

data.english: Who taught by the pen,
data.arabic: ٱلَّذِى عَلَّمَ بِٱلْقَلَمِ

data.english: Taught man what he knew not.
data.arabic: عَلَّمَ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ مَا لَمْ يَعْلَمْ

data.english: No, indeed! Man transgresses,
data.arabic: كَلَّآ إِنَّ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ لَيَطْغَىٰٓ

data.english: That he considers himself self-sufficient.
data.arabic: أَن رَّءَاهُ ٱسْتَغْنَىٰٓ

data.english: To thy Lord is the return.
data.arabic: إِنَّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ ٱلرُّجْعَىٰٓ

data.english: Hast thou seen him who forbids
data.arabic: أَرَءَيْتَ ٱلَّذِى يَنْهَىٰ

data.english: A servant when he performs the duty?
data.arabic: عَبْدًا إِذَا صَلَّىٰٓ

data.english: Hast thou considered if he is upon guidance,
data.arabic: أَرَءَيْتَ إِن كَانَ عَلَى ٱلْهُدَىٰٓ

data.english: Or enjoins prudent fear?
data.arabic: أَوْ أَمَرَ بِٱلتَّقْوَىٰٓ

data.english: Hast thou considered if he denies and turns away?
data.arabic: أَرَءَيْتَ إِن كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰٓ

data.english: Knows he not that God sees?
data.arabic: أَلَمْ يَعْلَم بِأَنَّ ٱللَّـهَ يَرَىٰ

data.english: No, indeed! If he cease not, We will drag him by the forelock,
data.arabic: كَلَّا لَئِن لَّمْ يَنتَهِ لَنَسْفَعًۢا بِٱلنَّاصِيَةِ

data.english: The lying, offending forelock.
data.arabic: نَاصِيَةٍ كَـٰذِبَةٍ خَاطِئَةٍ

data.english: Then let him call his council.
data.arabic: فَلْيَدْعُ نَادِيَهُۥ

data.english: We will call the guards of Hell.
data.arabic: سَنَدْعُ ٱلزَّبَانِيَةَ

data.english: No, indeed! Obey thou not him, but submit thou, and draw thou near.
data.arabic: كَلَّا لَا تُطِعْهُ وَٱسْجُدْ وَٱقْتَرِب

data.english: In the name of God, the Almighty, the Merciful.
data.arabic: بِّسْمِ ٱللَّـهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ

data.english: We sent it down on the Night of Determination.
data.arabic: إِنَّآ أَنزَلْنَـٰهُ فِى لَيْلَةِ ٱلْقَدْرِ

data.english: And what will convey to thee what the Night of Determination is?
data.arabic: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا لَيْلَةُ ٱلْقَدْرِ

data.english: The Night of Determination is better than a thousand months —
data.arabic: لَيْلَةُ ٱلْقَدْرِ خَيْرٌ مِّنْ أَلْفِ شَهْرٍ

data.english: (The angels and the Spirit descend therein by the leave of their Lord) — of every sort of affair.
data.arabic: تَنَزَّلُ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ وَٱلرُّوحُ فِيهَا بِإِذْنِ رَبِّهِم مِّن كُلِّ أَمْرٍ

data.english: “Peace!” It is until the emergence of dawn.
data.arabic: سَلَـٰمٌ هِىَ حَتَّىٰ مَطْلَعِ ٱلْفَجْرِ

data.english: In the name of God, the Almighty, the Merciful.
data.arabic: بِسْمِ ٱللَّـهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ

data.english: Those who ignore warning among the doctors of the Law and the idolaters were not to desist until the clear evidence came to them:
data.arabic: لَمْ يَكُنِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِنْ أَهْلِ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ وَٱلْمُشْرِكِينَ مُنفَكِّينَ حَتَّىٰ تَأْتِيَهُمُ ٱلْبَيِّنَةُ

data.english: A messenger from God, reciting purified pages
data.arabic: رَسُولٌ مِّنَ ٱللَّـهِ يَتْلُوا۟ صُحُفًا مُّطَهَّرَةً

data.english: In which are upright writs.
data.arabic: فِيهَا كُتُبٌ قَيِّمَةٌ

data.english: And those given the Writ were divided only after the clear evidence had come to them.
data.arabic: وَمَا تَفَرَّقَ ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُوا۟ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ إِلَّا مِنۢ بَعْدِ مَا جَآءَتْهُمُ ٱلْبَيِّنَةُ

data.english: And they were commanded only to serve God, sincere to Him in doctrine, inclining to truth; and to uphold the duty, and to render the purity — and that is the doctrine of the upright.
data.arabic: وَمَآ أُمِرُوٓا۟ إِلَّا لِيَعْبُدُوا۟ ٱللَّـهَ مُخْلِصِينَ لَهُ ٱلدِّينَ حُنَفَآءَ وَيُقِيمُوا۟ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَيُؤْتُوا۟ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَذَٰلِكَ دِينُ ٱلْقَيِّمَةِ

data.english: Those who ignore warning among the doctors of the Law and the idolaters will be in the fire of Gehenna, they abiding eternally therein — it is they who are the worst of creatures.
data.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِنْ أَهْلِ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ وَٱلْمُشْرِكِينَ فِى نَارِ جَهَنَّمَ خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمْ شَرُّ ٱلْبَرِيَّةِ

data.english: Those who heed warning and do righteous deeds — it is they who are the best of creatures,
data.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمْ خَيْرُ ٱلْبَرِيَّةِ

data.english: Their reward is with their Lord: gardens of perpetual abode beneath which rivers flow, they abiding eternally therein forever; God is pleased with them, and they pleased with Him; that is for him who fears his Lord.
data.arabic: جَزَآؤُهُمْ عِندَ رَبِّهِمْ جَنَّـٰتُ عَدْنٍ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدًا رَّضِىَ ٱللَّـهُ عَنْهُمْ وَرَضُوا۟ عَنْهُ ذَٰلِكَ لِمَنْ خَشِىَ رَبَّهُۥ

data.english: In the name of God, the Almighty, the Merciful.
data.arabic: بِسْمِ ٱللَّـهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ

data.english: When the earth is shaken with great shaking,
data.arabic: إِذَا زُلْزِلَتِ ٱلْأَرْضُ زِلْزَالَهَا

data.english: And the earth brings forth its burdens,
data.arabic: وَأَخْرَجَتِ ٱلْأَرْضُ أَثْقَالَهَا

data.english: And man says: “What ails it?”
data.arabic: وَقَالَ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ مَا لَهَا

data.english: That day, it will recount its news
data.arabic: يَوْمَئِذٍ تُحَدِّثُ أَخْبَارَهَا

data.english: Because thy Lord has instructed it.
data.arabic: بِأَنَّ رَبَّكَ أَوْحَىٰ لَهَا

data.english: That day, men will come out separately to be shown their deeds.
data.arabic: يَوْمَئِذٍ يَصْدُرُ ٱلنَّاسُ أَشْتَاتًا لِّيُرَوْا۟ أَعْمَـٰلَهُمْ

data.english: And whoso does the weight of an atom of good will see it.
data.arabic: فَمَن يَعْمَلْ مِثْقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ خَيْرًا يَرَهُۥ

data.english: And whoso does the weight of an atom of evil will see it.
data.arabic: وَمَن يَعْمَلْ مِثْقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ شَرًّا يَرَهُۥ

data.english: In the name of God, the Almighty, the Merciful.
data.arabic: بِسْمِ ٱللَّـهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ

data.english: By the chargers snorting!
data.arabic: وَٱلْعَـٰدِيَـٰتِ ضَبْحًا

data.english: And by the strikers of sparks of fire!
data.arabic: فَٱلْمُورِيَـٰتِ قَدْحًا

data.english: And by the raiders at dawn
data.arabic: فَٱلْمُغِيرَٰتِ صُبْحًا

data.english: Raising thereby dust
data.arabic: فَأَثَرْنَ بِهِۦ نَقْعًا

data.english: Then breaching thereby the midst together!
data.arabic: فَوَسَطْنَ بِهِۦ جَمْعًا

data.english: Man is ungrateful to his Lord,
data.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ لِرَبِّهِۦ لَكَنُودٌ

data.english: And he is to that a witness.
data.arabic: وَإِنَّهُۥ عَلَىٰ ذَٰلِكَ لَشَهِيدٌ

data.english: But in love of wealth is he strong.
data.arabic: وَإِنَّهُۥ لِحُبِّ ٱلْخَيْرِ لَشَدِيدٌ

data.english: Does he then not know when what is in the graves is overturned
data.arabic: أَفَلَا يَعْلَمُ إِذَا بُعْثِرَ مَا فِى ٱلْقُبُورِ

data.english: And what is in the breasts obtained
data.arabic: وَحُصِّلَ مَا فِى ٱلصُّدُورِ

data.english: Their Lord of them, that day, will be aware!
data.arabic: إِنَّ رَبَّهُم بِهِمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ لَّخَبِيرٌۢ

data.english: In the name of God, the Almighty, the Merciful.
data.arabic: بِسْمِ ٱللَّـهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ

data.english: The Calamity!
data.arabic: ٱلْقَارِعَةُ

data.english: What is the Calamity?
data.arabic: مَا ٱلْقَارِعَةُ

data.english: And what will convey to thee what the Calamity is?
data.arabic: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا ٱلْقَارِعَةُ

data.english: The day men will be as moths dispersed,
data.arabic: يَوْمَ يَكُونُ ٱلنَّاسُ كَٱلْفَرَاشِ ٱلْمَبْثُوثِ

data.english: And the mountains as wool fluffed up.
data.arabic: وَتَكُونُ ٱلْجِبَالُ كَٱلْعِهْنِ ٱلْمَنفُوشِ

data.english: Then as for him whose balances are heavy:
data.arabic: فَأَمَّا مَن ثَقُلَتْ مَوَٰزِينُهُۥ

data.english: He is in a pleasing life.
data.arabic: فَهُوَ فِى عِيشَةٍ رَّاضِيَةٍ

data.english: And as for him whose balances are light:
data.arabic: وَأَمَّا مَنْ خَفَّتْ مَوَٰزِينُهُۥ

data.english: His embrace is an abyss.
data.arabic: فَأُمُّهُۥ هَاوِيَةٌ

data.english: And what will convey to thee what it is?
data.arabic: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا هِيَهْ

data.english: A scorching Fire.
data.arabic: نَارٌ حَامِيَةٌۢ

data.english: In the name of God, the Almighty, the Merciful.
data.arabic: بِسْمِ ٱللَّـهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ

data.english: The competition for increase diverts you
data.arabic: أَلْهَىٰكُمُ ٱلتَّكَاثُرُ

data.english: Until you visit the graves.
data.arabic: حَتَّىٰ زُرْتُمُ ٱلْمَقَابِرَ

data.english: No, indeed! You will come to know.
data.arabic: كَلَّا سَوْفَ تَعْلَمُونَ

data.english: Then no, indeed! You will come to know.
data.arabic: ثُمَّ كَلَّا سَوْفَ تَعْلَمُونَ

data.english: No, indeed! If you had known with the knowledge of certainty[...].
data.arabic: كَلَّا لَوْ تَعْلَمُونَ عِلْمَ ٱلْيَقِينِ

data.english: You will see Hell.
data.arabic: لَتَرَوُنَّ ٱلْجَحِيمَ

data.english: Then will you see it with the eye of certainty.
data.arabic: ثُمَّ لَتَرَوُنَّهَا عَيْنَ ٱلْيَقِينِ

data.english: Then, that day, will you be questioned about bliss.
data.arabic: ثُمَّ لَتُسْـَٔلُنَّ يَوْمَئِذٍ عَنِ ٱلنَّعِيمِ

data.english: In the name of God, the Almighty, the Merciful.
data.arabic: بِسْمِ ٱللَّـهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ

data.english: By the span of time!
data.arabic: وَٱلْعَصْرِ

data.english: Man is in loss,
data.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ لَفِى خُسْرٍ

data.english: Save those who heed warning and do righteous deeds, and counsel one another to truth, and counsel one another to patience.
data.arabic: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ وَتَوَاصَوْا۟ بِٱلْحَقِّ وَتَوَاصَوْا۟ بِٱلصَّبْرِ

data.english: In the name of God, the Almighty, the Merciful.
data.arabic: بِسْمِ ٱللَّـهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ

data.english: Woe to every slanderer, fault-finder,
data.arabic: وَيْلٌ لِّكُلِّ هُمَزَةٍ لُّمَزَةٍ

data.english: Who accumulated wealth and counted it
data.arabic: ٱلَّذِى جَمَعَ مَالًا وَعَدَّدَهُۥ

data.english: Thinking that his wealth made him immortal!
data.arabic: يَحْسَبُ أَنَّ مَالَهُۥٓ أَخْلَدَهُۥ

data.english: No, indeed! He will be cast into the Crusher.
data.arabic: كَلَّا لَيُنۢبَذَنَّ فِى ٱلْحُطَمَةِ

data.english: And what will convey to thee what the Crusher is?
data.arabic: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا ٱلْحُطَمَةُ

data.english: The Fire of God fuelled
data.arabic: نَارُ ٱللَّـهِ ٱلْمُوقَدَةُ

data.english: Which will look down upon the hearts.
data.arabic: ٱلَّتِى تَطَّلِعُ عَلَى ٱلْأَفْـِٔدَةِ

data.english: It will be upon them closed in
data.arabic: إِنَّهَا عَلَيْهِم مُّؤْصَدَةٌ

data.english: In extended pillars.
data.arabic: فِى عَمَدٍ مُّمَدَّدَةٍۭ

data.english: In the name of God, the Almighty, the Merciful.
data.arabic: بِسْمِ ٱللَّـهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ

data.english: Hast thou not considered how thy Lord did with the companions of one weak in judgment?
data.arabic: أَلَمْ تَرَ كَيْفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِأَصْحَـٰبِ ٱلْفِيلِ

data.english: Did He not make their plan go astray?
data.arabic: أَلَمْ يَجْعَلْ كَيْدَهُمْ فِى تَضْلِيلٍ

data.english: And He sent against them flights in droves
data.arabic: وَأَرْسَلَ عَلَيْهِمْ طَيْرًا أَبَابِيلَ

data.english: Striking them with stones of baked clay.
data.arabic: تَرْمِيهِم بِحِجَارَةٍ مِّن سِجِّيلٍ

data.english: Then He made them like eaten straw.
data.arabic: فَجَعَلَهُمْ كَعَصْفٍ مَّأْكُولٍۭ

data.english: In the name of God, the Almighty, the Merciful.
data.arabic: بِسْمِ ٱللَّـهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ

data.english: For the accustomed security of Quraysh:
data.arabic: لِإِيلَـٰفِ قُرَيْشٍ

data.english: Their accustomed security of the journey of winter and summer.
data.arabic: إِۦلَـٰفِهِمْ رِحْلَةَ ٱلشِّتَآءِ وَٱلصَّيْفِ

data.english: Then let them serve the Lord of this house
data.arabic: فَلْيَعْبُدُوا۟ رَبَّ هَـٰذَا ٱلْبَيْتِ

data.english: Who fed them against hunger, and made them safe against fear.
data.arabic: ٱلَّذِىٓ أَطْعَمَهُم مِّن جُوعٍ وَءَامَنَهُم مِّنْ خَوْفٍۭ

data.english: In the name of God, the Almighty, the Merciful.
data.arabic: بِسْمِ ٱللَّـهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ

data.english: Hast thou seen him who denies the Doctrine?
data.arabic: أَرَءَيْتَ ٱلَّذِى يُكَذِّبُ بِٱلدِّينِ

data.english: That is he who repels the fatherless
data.arabic: فَذَٰلِكَ ٱلَّذِى يَدُعُّ ٱلْيَتِيمَ

data.english: And encourages not the feeding of the needy.
data.arabic: وَلَا يَحُضُّ عَلَىٰ طَعَامِ ٱلْمِسْكِينِ

data.english: Then woe to the performers of duty: —
data.arabic: فَوَيْلٌ لِّلْمُصَلِّينَ

data.english: Those who are of their duty heedless;
data.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ عَن صَلَاتِهِمْ سَاهُونَ

data.english: Those who make show
data.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ يُرَآءُونَ

data.english: And refuse small things!
data.arabic: وَيَمْنَعُونَ ٱلْمَاعُونَ

data.english: In the name of God, the Almighty, the Merciful.
data.arabic: بِسْمِ ٱللَّـهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ

data.english: We have given thee abundance,
data.arabic: إِنَّآ أَعْطَيْنَـٰكَ ٱلْكَوْثَرَ

data.english: So perform thou the duty to thy Lord, and attain thou mastery.
data.arabic: فَصَلِّ لِرَبِّكَ وَٱنْحَرْ

data.english: He that hates thee — he is the one cut off.
data.arabic: إِنَّ شَانِئَكَ هُوَ ٱلْأَبْتَرُ

data.english: In the name of God, the Almighty, the Merciful.
data.arabic: بِسْمِ ٱللَّـهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ

data.english: Say thou: “O you false claimers of guidance:
data.arabic: قُلْ يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلْكَـٰفِرُونَ

data.english: “I serve not what you serve,
data.arabic: لَآ أَعْبُدُ مَا تَعْبُدُونَ

data.english: “And you are not serving what I serve,
data.arabic: وَلَآ أَنتُمْ عَـٰبِدُونَ مَآ أَعْبُدُ

data.english: “Nor am I serving what you have served,
data.arabic: وَلَآ أَنَا۠ عَابِدٌ مَّا عَبَدتُّمْ

data.english: “Neither are you serving what I serve.
data.arabic: وَلَآ أَنتُمْ عَـٰبِدُونَ مَآ أَعْبُدُ

data.english: “To you, your doctrine; and to me, my doctrine.”
data.arabic: لَكُمْ دِينُكُمْ وَلِىَ دِينِ

data.english: In the name of God, the Almighty, the Merciful.
data.arabic: بِسْمِ ٱللَّـهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ

data.english: When the help of God and the victory come,
data.arabic: إِذَا جَآءَ نَصْرُ ٱللَّـهِ وَٱلْفَتْحُ

data.english: And thou seest mankind enter the doctrine of God in crowds,
data.arabic: وَرَأَيْتَ ٱلنَّاسَ يَدْخُلُونَ فِى دِينِ ٱللَّـهِ أَفْوَاجًا

data.english: Give thou glory with the praise of thy Lord, and ask thou forgiveness of Him; He is accepting of repentance.
data.arabic: فَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ وَٱسْتَغْفِرْهُ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ تَوَّابًۢا

data.english: In the name of God, the Almighty, the Merciful.
data.arabic: بِسْمِ ٱللَّـهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ

data.english: Perish the hands of the father of flame, and perish he!
data.arabic: تَبَّتْ يَدَآ أَبِى لَهَبٍ وَتَبَّ

data.english: His wealth will not avail him, nor will what he earned.
data.arabic: مَآ أَغْنَىٰ عَنْهُ مَالُهُۥ وَمَا كَسَبَ

data.english: He will burn in a fire of flame,
data.arabic: سَيَصْلَىٰ نَارًا ذَاتَ لَهَبٍ

data.english: And his wife: — the carrier of firewood —
data.arabic: وَٱمْرَأَتُهُۥ حَمَّالَةَ ٱلْحَطَبِ

data.english: Around her neck a rope of twisted strands.
data.arabic: فِى جِيدِهَا حَبْلٌ مِّن مَّسَدٍۭ

data.english: In the name of God, the Almighty, the Merciful.
data.arabic: بِسْمِ ٱللَّـهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ

data.english: Say thou: “He is God, One!
data.arabic: قُلْ هُوَ ٱللَّـهُ أَحَدٌ

data.english: “God, the Everlasting Refuge!
data.arabic: ٱللَّـهُ ٱلصَّمَدُ

data.english: “He neither begets, nor is He begotten,
data.arabic: لَمْ يَلِدْ وَلَمْ يُولَدْ

data.english: “Nor is there to Him any equal.”
data.arabic: وَلَمْ يَكُن لَّهُۥ كُفُوًا أَحَدٌۢ

data.english: In the name of God, the Almighty, the Merciful.
data.arabic: بِسْمِ ٱللَّـهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ

data.english: Say thou: “I seek refuge in the Lord of the Daybreak
data.arabic: قُلْ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ ٱلْفَلَقِ

data.english: “From the evil of what He created;
data.arabic: مِن شَرِّ مَا خَلَقَ

data.english: “And from the evil of darkness when it gathers;
data.arabic: وَمِن شَرِّ غَاسِقٍ إِذَا وَقَبَ

data.english: “And from the evil of the blowers on knots;
data.arabic: وَمِن شَرِّ ٱلنَّفَّـٰثَـٰتِ فِى ٱلْعُقَدِ

data.english: “And from the evil of an envier when he envies.”
data.arabic: وَمِن شَرِّ حَاسِدٍ إِذَا حَسَدَ

data.english: In the name of God, the Almighty, the Merciful.
data.arabic: بِسْمِ ٱللَّـهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ

data.english: Say thou: “I seek refuge in the Lord of mankind,
data.arabic: قُلْ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ ٱلنَّاسِ

data.english: “The King of mankind,
data.arabic: مَلِكِ ٱلنَّاسِ

data.english: “The God of mankind,
data.arabic: إِلَـٰهِ ٱلنَّاسِ

data.english: “From the evil of the retreating whisperer
data.arabic: مِن شَرِّ ٱلْوَسْوَاسِ ٱلْخَنَّاسِ

data.english: “Who whispers in the breasts of mankind;
data.arabic: ٱلَّذِى يُوَسْوِسُ فِى صُدُورِ ٱلنَّاسِ

data.english: “From the jinna and mankind.”
data.arabic: مِنَ ٱلْجِنَّةِ وَٱلنَّاسِ
